84Iyi nye afɔrmbukyia no ho oyimadze a ofi Israel mbapɔmba no hɔ bae wɔ da a wɔseraa hɔn ngo no: ndwetɛboyaa duebien, ndwetɛkora duebien, sika ntser duebien: 85dwetɛboyaa kor n’ano tow dwetɛbona ɔha eduasa, na kora kor biara so yɛ eduosuon: ndzɛmba no no dwetɛ nyinara yɛ dwetɛbona mpemebien ahaanan, dɛ mbrɛ ahotseweebea dwetɛbona tse; 86sika ntser a eduhuam ayeyɛ no amaama duebien, kor n’ano tow dwetɛbona du, dɛ mbrɛ ahotseweebea dwetɛbona tse: ntser no ne sika nyinara yɛ dwetɛbona ɔha eduonu: 87ɔhyew afɔr anantwi no nyinara yɛ anantwisaa duebien, nguannyin no duebien, nguambaanyin a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia no duebien; mpɔnkye mu enyin a wɔdze rokɔbɔ bɔn ho afɔr duebien: 88Na asomdwee afɔr anantwi no nyinara yɛ anantwisaa eduonu anan, nguannyin no eduosia, mpɔnkyenyin no eduosia na nguambaanyin a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia no eduosia. Iyi nye afɔrmbukyia no no ngosera ekyir oyimadze. 89Na aber a Moses hɛɛn ehyiadzibuw no mu dɛ ɔnye no rekɛkasa no, nna ɔtsee ndze a ɔrekasa kyerɛ no fi mbɔbɔrhu egua a ɔwɔ dasedaka no do no do, wɔ kerobim ebien no ntamu: na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ no.

Title: NKANEE 8
Content:
Nkandzea No Ne Nsisii
1Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 2Kasa kyerɛ Aaron na se no dɛ, Sɛ esosɔ nkandzea no a, nkandzea esuon no ngyegye kandzeadua no enyim. 3Na Aaron yɛɛ dɛm; ɔsosɔɔ ne nkandzea ma ɔgyegyee kandzeadua no enyim, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no. 4Na iyi nye kandzeadua no ne yɛbea, sika a ɔabor ara nko; fi n’ase dze kodu ne nhyiren do nyinara yɛ ɔbor edwuma: dɛ mbrɛ nsusudo a EWURADZE dze kyerɛɛ Moses no tse no, dɛmara na ɔyɛɛ kandzeadua no.
Levifo No Ho Ntsewee
5Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 6Yi Levifo no wɔ Israelmba mu, na tsew hɔn ho. 7Dɛm na yɛ hɔn fa tsew hɔn ho: fa bɔnyi ho nsu petse hɔn do, na ma wɔmfa oyindam nyiyi hɔnho nyinara, na ma wɔnhor hɔn ntar mfa ntsew hɔnho. 8Nna ma wɔmfa ɔnantwisaa eburwa, nye n’edziban afɔr, isiam pa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw, na fa ɔnantwisaa eburwa kor so bɔ bɔn ho afɔr. 9Na fa Levifo no bra ehyiadzibuw no enyim: na ma Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara mbɔbɔ ngua: 10na fa Levifo no bra EWURADZE enyim: na Israelmba mfa hɔn nsa ngu Levifo no do. 11Afei Aaron ntu Levifo no nsi hɔ dɛ ɔtow afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim, mfa ngyina Israelmba no ananmu, ma wɔntsena hɔ nyɛ EWURADZE n’edwuma. 12Na Levifo no mfa hɔn nsa ngu anantwisaa no etsifi: na fa kor bɔ bɔn ho afɔr, na fa kor so bɔ ɔhyew afɔr ma EWURADZE, ma ɔnyɛ mpata mma Levifo no. 13Na fa Levifo no gyina Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no enyim, na tu hɔn si hɔ dɛ ɔtow afɔr ma EWURADZE. 14Dɛm na tsew Levifo no fi Israelmba mu: na Levifo no mbɛyɛ medze. 15Na n’ekyir no Levifo no nkɔ nkɛyɛ ehyiadzibuw no ho edwuma: na tsew hɔn ho, na tu hɔn si hɔ dɛ ɔtow afɔr. 16Osiandɛ wɔdze hɔn ama me koraa efi Israelmba no mu; medze hɔn ahyɛ dza obue yafun nyinara, mekyerɛ Israelmba mu mbakan nyinara ananmu mafa. 17Na Israelmba mu mbakan nyinara yɛ medze, nyimpa nye mbowa nyina da a mobobɔɔ Egypt asaase do mbakan nyinara no na metseew hɔn ho maa moho. 18Na mafa Levifo no ahyɛ Israelmba mu mbakan nyinara ananmu. 19Na medze Levifo no ama Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no dɛ akyɛdze a ofi Israelmba mu dɛ wɔnyɛ edwuma wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu, na wɔmpata mma Israelmba ama sɛ Israelmba no rotwe bɛn ahotseweebea no a, ɔyardɔm bi aammba Israelmba no mu. 20Dɛm na Moses, nye Aaron, nye Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara, yɛɛ Levifo no. Dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses wɔ Levifo no ho nyinara no, dɛmara na Israelmba no yɛɛ hɔn. 21Na Levifo no tseew hɔnho fii bɔn ho, na wɔhoor hɔn ntar; na Aaron tuu hɔn sii hɔ yɛɛ ɔtow afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim; na Aaron patae maa hɔn dze tseew hɔn ho. 22Na n’ekyir no Levifo no kɔree kɛyɛɛ hɔn edwuma wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu wɔ Aaron, nye ne mbabanyin no enyim: na dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses wɔ Levifo no ho no, dɛmara na wɔyɛɛ hɔn.
23Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 24Dza ɔyɛ Levifo dze no nye yi: hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu enum nye ekyir no nkɔ nkɔsom wɔ ehyiadzibuw no edwuma no mu: 25na ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonum do no ngyaa edwuma yɛ, na mma wɔnnkɔsom bio; 26mbom wɔnye hɔn nuanom nsom wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu, nhwɛ ahwɛdodze no, na ɔsom edwuma no na mma wɔnnyɛ. Dɛm na yɛ ma Levifo no wɔ hɔn ahwɛdodze ho afamu.

Title: NKANEE 9
Content:
Apaho A Otsia Ebien No
1Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses wɔ Sinai sar do, wofii Egypt asaase do firii no n’ekyir afe a otsia ebien no no bosoom a odzi kan no mu dɛ, 2Nkyii so ma Israelmba ndzi apaho no wɔ n’aber a wɔahyɛ mu, 3bosoom yi ne da a otsia duanan no mu ewimbir, na hom ndzi: dɛ mbrɛ n’ahyɛdze nyinara tse, na mbrɛ no ho mmom nyinara tse no, na hom ndzi. 4Na Moses kasaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba no dɛ wondzi apaho no. 5Na wodzii apaho no wɔ bosoom a odzi kan no ne da a otsia duanan no mu, ewimbir, wɔ Sinai sar do: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no nyinara, dɛmara na Israelmba no yɛe. 6Na mbanyin bi wɔ hɔ a hɔn ho egu fi wɔ nyimpa bi no fun ho, ma dɛm ntsi woenntum enndzi apaho no da no ara: 7na mbanyin no see no dɛ, Hɛn ho egu fi wɔ nyimpa bi no fun ho: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na wɔakam hɛn, dɛ mma yɛmmfa EWURADZE ayɛyɛdze mmba wɔ n’aber a wɔahyɛ mu wɔ Israelmba no mu? 8Na Moses see hɔn dɛ, Hom ngyina hɔ; ma minketsie dza EWURADZE bɛhyɛ wɔ hom ho.
9Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 10Kasa kyerɛ Israelmba dɛ, Sɛ nyimpa bi no ho gu fi wɔ fun bi ho, anaa ɔwɔ ekyirekyir akwantu mu, wɔ hom mu, anaa hom ebusuasantsen mu a, ondzi apaho no mma EWURADZE ara: 11bosoom a otsia ebien no mu da a otsia duanan no ewimbir na wondzi; epitsi boodoo nye fan wenwen na wɔmfa ndzi: 12mma wonngya mu bi mma onnkodu anapa, na mma wommbu ne biew bi mu so: na dɛ mbrɛ apaho no no ho ahyɛdze no nyinara tse na wondzi. 13Mbom nyimpa no a no ho tsew, na orunntu kwan, na ogyaa dɛ odzi apaho no dze, ɔkra no wobotwa no efi ne man mu akyen osiandɛ ɔammfa EWURADZE ayɛyɛdze no ammba wɔ n’aber a wɔahyɛ mu, dɛm nyimpa no nsoa no bɔn. 14Na sɛ ɔhɔho bi bɔsoɛ hom mu na oridzi apaho no ama EWURADZE a ɔno dɛ mbrɛ apaho ahyɛdze no tse, na mbrɛ no ho mbra no tse no, na ɔnyɛ: hom nya ahyɛdze kor mfa mma ɔhɔho nye nyia wɔawo no wɔ asaase no do nyina.
Ogya Na Mununkum Fadum No
(Eksodɔs 40.34-38)
15Na da a wɔmaa ntamadan no do sii hɔ no mununkum no bɛkataa ntamadan no do, mekyerɛ dasebuw no: na ewimbir no na ɔwɔ ntamadan no do epue tse dɛ ogya dze kodu anapa. 16Dɛm na ɔtse daa: mununkum no kataa do, na ogya no puee anadwe. 17Na aber biara a wɔma mununkum no do ma ɔma noho do fi Buw no do no, ɔno n’ekyir no Israelmba tu kwan, na beebi mbrɛ mununkum no gyinae no, hɔ na Israelmba kyeer nsera. 18EWURADZE mbrasɛm do na Israelmba nam tuu kwan, na EWURADZE mbrasɛm do na wɔnam kyeer nsera: aber tsentsen biara a mununkum no tsena ntamadan no do no nyinara wɔtsena nserakyer mu. 19Na sɛ mununkum no kyinkyim ntamadan no do nda pii a, ɔno Israelmba hwɛ EWURADZE ahwɛdodze no do, na wonntu kwan. 20Na ɔtɔfabi a mununkum no dzi nda kakrabaa bi wɔ ntamadan no do; nna dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE mbrasɛm tse no wɔatsena nsera no mu, na dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE mbrasɛm tse no, nna wɔnam do etu. 21Na ɔtɔfabi so a mununkum no wɔ hɔ araa fi ewimbir kodu anapa; na sɛ mununkum no ma noho do anapa a, na woetu: anaa sɛ ɔwɔw do adzekyee nye adzesaa, na sɛ mununkum no ma no ho do a, na woetu. 22Sɛ nda ebien o, bosoom o, afrenhyia o, nna mununkum no kyinkyim wɔ ntamadan no do tsena do a, Israelmba no tsena nsera no mu, na wonntu: na sɛ ɔma no ho do a, nna woetu. 23EWURADZE ne mbrasɛm na wɔnam do kyeer nsera, na EWURADZE ne mbrasɛm na wɔnam do tui: wɔhwɛɛ EWURADZE n’ahwɛdodze do, wɔ EWURADZE ne mbrasɛm a ɔnam Moses ne nsa do hyɛɛ no do.

Title: NKANEE 10
Content:
Dwetɛ Ntotorobɛnto No
1Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 2Yɛ dwetɛ ntotorobɛnto ebien fa ma woho: ɔbor edwuma na fa yɛ: na dze aafrɛ mboanofo no aba, na dze ama woeetutu nseraban no akɔ. 3Na sɛ wɔhɛn n’ebien nyina a, mboanofo no nyinara hɔn ano nhyia wo nkyɛn wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano. 4Na sɛ wɔhɛn kor a, ɔno mbapɔmba no, Israel mpempem mu etsitsir no, hɔn ano nhyia wo nkyɛn. 5Na sɛ hom hɛn ewubɔ a, nseraban a ɔdeda boka afamu no ntutu nkɔ. 6Na sɛ hom hɛn ewubɔ toa do ebien a, nseraban a ɔdeda pomu afamu no ntutu nkɔ: worubotu no, wɔnhɛn ewubɔ. 7Mbom sɛ bagua no ribehyia a, hom nhɛn, na mma hom nnhɛn ewubɔ. 8Na Aaron ne mbabanyin asɔfo no, na wɔmfa ntotorobɛnto no nhɛn; na ɔnyɛ daa ahyɛdze mma hom wɔ hom ebusuasantsen nyinara mu. 9Na sɛ hom rokɔ ɔsa wɔ hom asaase do nye ɔtamfo a ohiahia hom ho akɔko a, ɔno hom mfa ntotorobɛnto no nhɛn ewubɔ; na wɔnkaa hom wɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn enyim, na wɔngye hom nkwa wɔ hom atamfo nsamu. 10Na hom enyigye nda mu, nye hom afahyɛ a wɔahyehyɛ mu, na hom abosoom ahyɛse mu so, hom mfa ntotorobɛnto no nhɛn no wɔ hom ɔhyew afɔr nye hom asomdwee afɔr no do; na ɔnyɛ nkaa mma hom wɔ hom Nyankopɔn enyim: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn.
Israelmba no Tu Fi Sinai Asaase Do
11Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a otsia ebien no, bosoom a otsia ebien no, wɔ bosoom no ne da a otsia eduonu no mu no, mununkum no maa noho do fii dase ntamadan no do. 12Na Israelmba no sii mu fii Sinai sar do dɛ mbrɛ hɔn akwantu no tse: na mununkum no kegyinaa Paran sar do. 13Na wodzii kan tuu hɔn akwantu no dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE mbrasɛm a ɔwɔ Moses nsamu no tse. 14Na Judamba nseraban do frankaa na odzii kan tui dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm no tsetsee: na Aminadab ne babanyin Nahson na ɔhwɛɛ no dɔm no do. 15Na Zuar ne babanyin Netanel na ɔhwɛɛ Isakarmba ebusuakuw dɔm no do. 16Na Helon ne babanyin Eliab na ɔhwɛɛ Zebulunmba ebusuakuw dɔm no do. 17Na wɔpaa ntamadan no; na Gerson ne mbabanyin nye Merari ne mbabanyin a wɔsoasoaa ntamadan no tui. 18Na Reuben nseraban do frankaa tui dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm no tsetsee: na Sedeur ne babanyin Elizur na ɔhwɛɛ no dɔm no do. 19Na Zurisadai ne babanyin Selumiel na ɔhwɛɛ Simeonmba ebusuakuw dɔm no do. 20Na Deutel ne babanyin Eliasaf na ɔhwɛɛ Gadmba ebusuakuw dɔm no do. 21Na Kohatfo no soasoaa ahotseweebea no dze tui: na binom so sii ntamadan no dze kodur dɛ wɔbae. 22Na Efraimmba nseraban do frankaa tui dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm no tsetsee: na Ammihud ne babanyin Elisama na ɔhwɛɛ no dɔm no do. 23Na Pedazur ne babanyin Gamaliel na ɔhwɛɛ Manaasɛmba ebusuakuw dɔm no do. 24Na Gideoni ne babanyin Abidan na ɔhwɛɛ Benjaminmba ebusuakuw dɔm no do. 25Na Danmba nseraban do frankaa a ɔyɛ nseraban nseraban nyinara ne nkyidɔm no, tui dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm no tsetsee: na Ammisaddai ne babanyin Ahiezer na ɔhwɛɛ no dɔm no do. 26Na Okran ne babanyin Pagiel na ɔhwɛɛ Asermba ebusuakuw dɔm no do. 27Na Enan ne babanyin Ahira na ɔhwɛɛ Naftalimba ebusuakuw dɔm no do. 28Israelmba akwantu a wotui dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm no tsetsee no nye yi; na wotui.
29Na Moses see Hobab, a ɔyɛ n’asew Midiannyi Reuel ne babanyin no, dɛ, Yerutu akɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE kasaa ho dɛ, Medze mebɛma hom no: bra ma yɛnkɔ, na yɛbɛyɛ wo yie: na EWURADZE aka Israel ho asɛm pa. 30Na ɔsee no dɛ, Moronnkɔ; mbom mobɔkɔ mankasa m’asaase do, nye m’ebusua mu. 31Na ɔsee dɛ, Mepa wo kyɛw, mma nngya hɛn; susuampa dɛ ɔwo inyim mbrɛ yebesi akyer nsera wɔ sar no do ntsi, ɔwo yɛ enyiwa fa ma hɛn. 32Na ɔbɛba dɛ, sɛ ɔwo nye hɛn kɔ a, ampa, ɔbɛba dɛ papa kor a EWURADZE dze bɛyɛ hɛn no, ɔnoara na yɛdze bɛyɛ wo.
33Na wotutui fii EWURADZE bepɔw no ho tuu ndaansa kwan; na EWURADZE ahyɛmudaka no tui dzii hɔn enyim kɔr ndaansa kwan, dɛ ɔrokɔhwehwɛ ahomgyebea ama hɔn. 34Na sɛ wotu fi nseraban no mu a, nna EWURADZE mununkum no wɔ hɔn do adzekyee.
35Na ɔbaa dɛ, sɛ adaka no rutu a, Moses ka dɛ, EWURADZE, soɛr ɛ, na ma w’atamfo mbɔ mpetse; na ma hɔn a wokyir wo nguan w’enyim. 36Na sɛ ɔsoɛ a, ɔka dɛ, EWURADZE, san bra Israel mpempem no nkyɛn.

Title: NKANEE 11
Content:
Manna Fon Ɔman No
1Na ɔman no tse dɛ ehwinhwimfo a wɔkasa bɔn wɔ EWURADZE asomu: na EWURADZE tsee no, n’ebufuw dzɛwee; na EWURADZE ogya hyewee wɔ hɔn mu, na ɔmeen nseraban no ano noho. 2Na ɔman no sui tɔɔ Moses do; na Moses paa EWURADZE kyɛw, na ogya no dumii. 3Na wɔfrɛɛ bea no dzin dɛ Tabera: osiandɛ EWURADZE ogya hyewee wɔ hɔn mu.
4Na aforafora nyimpa dodow a wɔwɔ hɔn mu no hɔn kɔn dɔɔ adze: Na Israelmba no so suu bio, na wɔsee dɛ, Woana na ɔbɛma hɛn nam ma yeedzi? 5Yɛkaakaa esunam a yedzii no wɔ Egypt no kwa; efer, nye anamuna, nye fan, nye anwew, nye galik no: 6afei dze hɛn kra etwintwam; biribi biribiara nnyi hɔ: yennyi hwee gyedɛ manna yi ara na yɛahwɛ. 7Na manna no tse dɛ korianda aba, na no ho tse dɛ bedula hyɛ ho. 8Ɔman no kekyinii, na wɔtasetasee, na wɔnyaam no wɔ nwuyambo do, anaa wosiiw no nwɔdur mu, na wɔnoaa no wɔ asɛn mu, na wɔyɛɛ no tatar: na ne dɛw tse dɛ ngo momon ne dɛw. 9Na sɛ ɔbɔsu tɔ gu nseraban no do anadwe a, manna no so tɔ gu do. 10Na Moses tsee dɛ ɔman no worususu wɔ hɔn ebusua ebusua mu: nyimpa biara ɔwɔ no buw abowano: na EWURADZE n’ebufuw dzɛɛw kɛsenara; na ɔyɛɛ Moses ahomtsew. 11Na Moses see EWURADZE dɛ, Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ɔwo nye w’akowaa edzi no bɔn? Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na mennya w’enyim enyimnyam, dɛ edze ɔman yi nyinara adzesoa ato mo do yi? 12Ana emi na minyinseen ɔman yi nyinara? Emi na mowoo hɔn, na esee me dɛ Tur hɔn wɔ wo koko do, dɛ mbrɛ egya bagyegyefo tur enumfoanoba, fa kɔ asaase a ekaa ho ntam maa hɔn egyanom no do? 13Henfa na minya nam mema ɔman yi nyinara? Osiandɛ wosu gu mo do, dɛ, Ma hɛn nam, ma yendzi. 14Mo nko murunntum nnkora ɔman yi nyinara, osiandɛ ɔyɛ dur dodow ma me. 15Na sɛ dɛm na enye me bedzi no a, mepa wo kyɛw, sɛ menya w’enyim enyimnyam a, ɔnodze oku mbom na ku me; na mma munnhu m’awerɛhow.
Moses Pa Akandzifo Eduosuon
16Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ, Boa Israel mpanyimfo mu eduosuon ano ma me hɔn a inyim dɛ wɔyɛ ɔman no mpanyimfo, nye hɔn do asafohemfo; na fa hɔn bra ehyiadzibuw no ho, ma wɔnye wo ngyina hɔ. 17Na mibesian na menye wo abɛkasa wɔ hɔ: na mebɛfa sunsum a ɔwɔ wo do no bi, na medze egu hɔn do; na wɔnye wo aasoa ɔman no adzesoa no, amma woara nko aannsoa. 18Na se ɔman no dɛ, Hom ntsew homho nsie ɔkyena, na hom bedzi nam: osiandɛ hom ekosu egu EWURADZE asomu dɛ, Woana na ɔbɛma hɛn nam ma yeedzi? Oye ma hɛn wɔ Egypt mbom: dɛm ntsi EWURADZE bɛma hom nam, na hom eedzi. 19Nnyɛ da kor na hom bedzi, anaa nda ebien anaa nda enum, nnyɛ dadu, anaa adaduonu. 20Mbom bosoom ara mu, ekodu dɛ obefifir hom ahwentokura mu, na ayɛ hom mfon: osiandɛ hom apow EWURADZE a ɔwɔ hom mu no, na hom esu wɔ n’enyim aka dɛ, Ebɛn ntsi na yefii Egypt bae? 21Na Moses see dɛ, Ɔman a mowɔ hɔn mu yi yɛ anamɔnmufo mpemahaesia; na ɔwo ese dɛ, Mebɛma hɔn nam ma woeedzi no bosoom ara mu. 22Aso wobokuku nguan nye anantwi ama hɔn ma aaso hɔn? Anaa wɔbɔboaboa po mu nam nyinara ano ama hɔn, ma aaso hɔn?
23Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ, Ana woetwa EWURADZE nsa do a? Afei na ibohu kyerɛ dɛ m’asɛm bɛba mu ama wo, anaa ɔnnkɛba mu. 24Na Moses fiir edzi, na ɔkɛkaa EWURADZE n’asɛm no kyerɛɛ ɔman no: na ɔboaa ɔman mpanyimfo no mu mbanyin eduosuon ano, na ɔdze hɔn begyinaa Buw no ho hyiae. 25Na EWURADZE sianee wɔ mununkum no mu, na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ no, na ɔfaa sunsum a ɔwɔ no do no bi, na ɔdze guu mpanyimfo eduosuon no do: na ɔbaa dɛ, sunsum no baa hɔn do no, wɔhyɛɛ nkɔm, naaso wɔannyɛ dɛm bio. 26Mbom ɔkaa mbanyin beenu wɔ nseraban no mu, ɔbaako ne dzin nye Eldad, na kor no so ne dzin dze Medad: na sunsum no baa hɔn do; na wɔfora hɔn a wɔkyerɛɛw hɔn no mu dze, na wonnyae nnkɔr Buw no ho: na wɔhyɛɛ nkɔm wɔ nseraban no mu. 27Na aberantsɛ bi tutuu mbirika kɛkaa kyerɛɛ Moses, na ɔsee dɛ, Eldad nye Medad rehyɛ nkɔm wɔ nseraban no mu. 28Na Nun ne babanyin Josua, Moses no somfo no, ɔyɛ ne mbanyin mpamufo mu kor no, buae see dɛ, Mo wura Moses, bra hɔn. 29Na Moses see no dɛ, Ana emi ntsi erotwe nyinkun a? Ɔka mo nko a nkyɛ Nyankopɔn aama EWURADZE ne man nyinara ayɛ nkɔnhyɛfo, ma EWURADZE dze no sunsum eegu hɔn do. 30Na Moses sanee baa nseraban no mu, ɔno nye Israel mpanyimfo no. 31Na mframa fi EWURADZE nkyɛn bɔe, na ɔdze Nkokɔhwerew fi po no ho boguu nseraban no ho, bɛyɛ da kor akwantu wɔ afa ha, nye da kor akwantu wɔ afa ha so, dze hyiaa nseraban no ho, na hɔn krɔn bɛyɛ basafa kor wɔ asaase enyi. 32Na ɔman no soɛɛr adzekyee no nyinara, nye anadwe no nyinara, na wɔkɔboaboaa Nkokɔhwerew no ano: nyia ɔboaa kumaabi ano mpo, onyaa homer du: na wɔhatahatae araa dze twaa nseraban no ho hyiae maa hɔnho. 33Aber a nam no da ho wowɔ hɔn se mu a wonnyae nnkosae no, EWURADZE ebufuw fraam ɔman no do, na EWURADZE dze ɔyardɔm kɛsenara bobɔɔ ɔman no. 34 Na wɔfrɛɛ bea no dzin dɛ Kibrot-hataava, osiandɛ hɔ na wosiee ɔman a hɔn kɔn dɔɔ adze no. 35Na ɔman no tui fii Kibrot-hataava kɔr Hazerot; na wɔtsenaa Hazerot.

Title: NKANEE 12
Content:
Miriam Nye Aaron Kasa Tsia Moses
1Na Miriam nye Aaron kasaa tsiaa Moses wɔ Kusnyi ɔbaa bi a ɔawar no no ntsi: osiandɛ nna ɔawar Kusnyi ɔbaa bi. 2Na wɔsee dɛ, Ana ampaara dɛ Moses nko na EWURADZE nye no akasa? Ana ɔnnye hɛn so nnkasae? Na EWURADZE tsee. 3Afei ɔbarimba Moses dze nna ɔdwe dodoodow, ɔbor nyimpa a wɔwɔ asaase do nyinara do. 4Na EWURADZE kasaa awerɛfir mu kyerɛɛ Moses, nye Aaron, nye Miriam dɛ, Hom baasa hom mfir edzi mbra ehyiadzibuw no ho. Na hɔn baasa no fiir edzi bae. 5Na EWURADZE sianee wɔ mununkum dum mu, na obegyinaa Buw no n’abowano, na ɔfrɛɛ Aaron nye Miriam: na hɔn beenu no fiir edzi bae. 6Na ɔsee dɛ, Afei hom ntsie me nsɛm: sɛ nkɔnhyɛfo bi wɔ hom mu a, emi EWURADZE mibeyi moho akyerɛ no wɔ enyido adzehu mu, adaaso mu na menye no bɛkasa. 7M’akowaa Moses nntse dɛm; ɔno na medze me fie nyinara ahyɛ ne nsa. 8Ano nye ano na menye no rekasa, mekyerɛ petee mu a, na nnyɛ abɛbu mu a; na ɔbɔhwɛ EWURADZE no su: na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom ennsuro dɛ hom bɛkasa etsia m’akowaa Moses? 9Na EWURADZE ebufuw fraam hɔn do; na ofii hɔ kɔree. 10Na mununkum no twee fii Buw no do; na, hwɛ, Miriam ayar kwata, ɔhoa dɛ esukwankyɛba: na Aaron hwɛɛ Miriam no, hwɛ, nna ɔayar kwata. 11Na Aaron see Moses dɛ, Ao mo wura, mepa wo kyɛw, mma mmfa bɔn nnto hɛn do, na yɛayɛ nkwaseadze, na ɔno ho yɛayɛ bɔn. 12Me kyɛw ara nye yi, mma ɔnnyɛ dɛ obi a oewu fi ne na yamu aba a woedzi no honam fa dada. 13Na Moses sui frɛɛ EWURADZE dɛ, Ao Nyankopɔn, meserɛ wo, sa no yarba. 14Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ, Sɛ n’egya hina n’enyi do ntafi a, ana nkyɛ n’enyi nnwu nda esuon bi a? Ma wɔntow no mu nda esuon wɔ nseraban no ekyir, na n’ekyir no na wɔmfa no mbra mu bio. 15Na wɔtoow Miriam mu wɔ nseraban no ekyir nda esuon: na ɔman no enntu araa kodur dɛ wɔfaa Miriam baa mu bio. 16Na n’ekyir no na ɔman no tui fii Hazerot, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Paran sar do.

Title: NKANEE 13
Content:
Akwanserafo Duebien No
1Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 2Soma mbanyin ma wɔnkɛsera Keenan asaase a medze rema Israelmba no: hɔn egyanom ebusuakuw biara mu no hom nsoma mu banyin kor, na hɔn nyina nyɛ hɔn mu mbapɔmba no bi. 3Na Moses somaa hɔn fi Paran sar do dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE mbrasɛm tse: hɔn nyinara wɔyɛ mbanyin a wɔyɛ Israelmba mu etsitsir. 4Na hɔn edzin nye yi: Reuben ebusuakuw dze, Zakur ne babanyin Sammua. 5Simeon ebusuakuw dze, Hori ne babanyin Safat. 6Juda ebusuakuw dze, Jefune ne babanyin Kaleb. 7Isakar ebusuakuw dze, Josef ne babanyin Igal. 8Efraim ebusuakuw dze, Nun ne babanyin Hosea. 9Benjamin ebusuakuw dze, Rafu ne babanyin Palti. 10Zebulun ebusuakuw dze, Sodi ne babanyin Gaddiel. 11Josef ebusuakuw dze, mekyerɛ Manaasɛ ebusuakuw dze, Susi ne babanyin Gaddi. 12Dan ebusuakuw dze, Gemali ne babanyin Ammiel. 13Aser ebusuakuw dze, Maekɛl ne babanyin Setur. 14Naftali ebusuakuw dze, Vofsi ne babanyin Nahibi. 15Gad ebusuakuw dze, Maki ne babanyin Geuel. 16Iyinom nye mbanyin a Moses somaa hɔn dɛ wɔnkɛsera asaase no hɔn edzin. Na Moses frɛɛ Nun ne babanyin Hosea no dɛ Josua. 17Na Moses somaa hɔn dɛ wɔnkɛsera Keenan asaase no, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ, Hom mfa pomu afamu ɔkwan yi do, na hom nkɔfow mbepɔw no: 18na wɔnhwɛ asaase no, mbrɛ ɔtse; nye ɔman a wɔtse do no, kyerɛ dɛ wɔyɛ dzen anaa wɔyɛ mberɛw, dɛ wosuar anaa wɔdɔɔ so; 19nye mbrɛ asaase a wɔtse do no tse, dɛ oye anaa omuo; na mbrɛ nkurow a wɔtsetse mu no tsetsee, dɛ wɔtsetse nseraban mu, anaa akoban mu; 20na mbrɛ asaase no tse, dɛ ɔyɛ sɔɔsɔɔ anaa etwee, dɛ ndua wɔ do anaa ɔnntse dɛm. Na hom nnya akokodur, na wɔmfa asaase no do aba bi mbra. Nna aber no yɛ esikyireamba ababer a odzi kan n’aber. 21Nna wosii mu kɔree, na wɔkɛseraa asaase no fi Zin sar do kodur Rehob, wɔ mbrɛ wɔnam kɔ Hamat no. 22Na wɔfowee faa Pomu afamu, na wodur Hebron; na hɔ na Anakmba no, Ahiman, Sesai, nye Talmai, wɔwɔ. (Na Hebron yi wɔkyekyeer no mfe esuon ansaana wɔrekyekyer Zoan a ɔwɔ Egypt.) 23Na wodur Eskol ɔbɔn no mu, na wotwaa abaw a esikyireamba siaw kor wɔ do wɔ hɔ, na beenu wuraa no dua soae; na wɔdze pɔmegranate eduaba, nye adɔmba so bi bae. 24Wɔfrɛɛ bea no Eskol ɔbɔn no mu, osian siaw no a Israelmba twaa no wɔ hɔ no ntsi. 25Na adaduanan soe no, wɔsanee fii asaase no ne nserae mu bae. 26Na wosii mu na wɔbaa Moses, nye Aaron, nye Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara nkyɛn, wɔ Paran sar do, wɔ Kades; na wɔbɔɔ hɔn amandzɛɛ kyerɛɛ hɔn, nye mboanofo no nyinara, na wɔdze asaase no do aba no kyerɛɛ hɔn. 27Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ no, na wɔsee dɛ, Yɛkɔr asaase a esomaa hɛn do no do, na numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do ampa; na no do aba nye yi. 28Naaso ɔman a wɔtse asaase no do no na wɔyɛ dzen, na nkurow no wɔabɔ ho ban, ɔsoso dodow: na nkyii so yehun Anakmba wɔ hɔ. 29Amalek tse Pomu afamu asaase no do: na Hitifo, nye Jebusfo, nye Amorifo, tsetse mbepɔw no do: na Keenanfo tse po no ho, nye Jordan nkyɛn. 30Na Kaleb dwedwee ɔman no wɔ Moses enyim, na ɔsee dɛ, Hom mma yɛnkɔfow nkɔ prɛko, na yɛnkɛfa, na yebotum edzi hɔn do nyim. 31Na mbanyin a wɔnye no kɔree no dze see dɛ, Yerunntum nnkɔfow nnkɔ nnkɛhyɛ ɔman no do; osiandɛ wɔyɛ dzen sen hɛn. 32Na wɔdze asaase a wɔkɛserae no ho atsenka bɔn brɛɛ Israelmba no dɛ, Asaase a yɛakɛfa mu akɛsera no, ɔyɛ asaase a odzi no do atsefo no; na nkorɔfo a yehun hɔn wɔ do no nyinara wɔyɛ nyimpa a wɔyɛ akraban. 33Na hɔ na yehun abran akɛse no, Anak ne mbabanyin no a wofi Nefilfo mu no: na yɛyɛɛ dɛ mbɛbɛw wɔ hɛnankasa hɛn enyi do, na dɛmara na yɛyɛe wɔ hɔn enyi do.

Title: NKANEE 14
Content:
Ɔman No Hwinhwin
1Na mboanofo no nyinara memaa hɔn ndze do, na wɔkekaa mu; na ɔman no suu anadwe no. 2Na Israelmba no nyinara hwinhwiin Moses nye Aaron ho: na mboanofo no nyinara see hɔn dɛ, Ka hɛn nko a nkyɛ Nyankopɔn maa yewuwui wɔ Egypt asaase do! Anaa sar yi do ha ara mpo, ka hɛn nko a nkyɛ Nyankopɔn maa yewuwui! 3Na ebɛn ntsi na EWURADZE dze hɛn reba asaase yi do, dɛ yɛmbɔtotɔr nkrantsee ano? Hɛn yernom nye hɛn mbofraba bɛyɛ afonam: ana onnye mma hɛn dɛ yɛbɛsan akɔ Egypt bi a? 4Na wɔsesee hɔnho dɛ, Wɔmma yɛnhyɛ ɔpanyin, na yɛnsan nkɔ Egypt. 5Nna Moses nye Aaron dze hɔn enyim butubutuuw famu wɔ Israelmba mboanofo bagua no nyinara enyim. 6Na Nun ne babanyin Josua nye Jefune ne babanyin Kaleb a wofi hɔn a wɔkɛseraa asaase no mu no, sunsuaan hɔn ntar mu: 7na wɔkasaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara dɛ, Asaase a yetwaa mu kɔree kɛserae no, ɔyɛ asaase pa mbordo. 8Sɛ yɛsɔ EWURADZE enyi a, ɔno ɔdze hɛn bodu asaase no do, na ɔdze ama hɛn; asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem do. 9EWURADZE do etua ara nko na mma hom nntsew, nkyii so mma hom nnsuro asaase no do nkorɔfo no; na wɔyɛ edziban ma hɛn: hɔn akataman efi hɔn do, na hɛn dze EWURADZE nye hɛn wɔ hɔ: mma wonnsuro hɔn. 10Na mboanofo no nyinara kaa dɛ wonsiw Josua na Kaleb abo. Na EWURADZE enyimnyam puee ehyiadzibuw no mu kyerɛɛ Israelmba no nyinara.
11Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ, Ɔman yi rubu me enyimtsia ekodu dabɛn? Na dabɛn na wɔrenngye me nndzi, wɔ nsɛnkyerɛdze a mayɛ wɔ hɔn mu nyinara mu no ekodu? 12Medze owuyarba mobɔbɔ hɔn, na masɛɛ hɔn, na medze wo mayɛ ɔman kɛse a ɔwɔ dzin sen hɔn. 13Na Moses see dɛ, Ɔno Egyptfo bɛtse; na ɔwo dze wo tum na edze eyi ɔman yi efi hɔn mu; 14na wɔbɛka akyerɛ asaase yi do atsefo: wɔatse dɛ ɔwo EWURADZE ewɔ ɔman yi mu; na ɔwo EWURADZE wohu wo enyim nye enyim, na wo mununkum gyina hɔn do, na ɔwo na idzi hɔn enyim, wɔ mununkum dum mu adzekyee, nye ogya dum mu adzesaa. 15Afei sɛ iku ɔman yi dɛ nyimpa kor a, ɔno amanaman a wɔatse wo nka no bɛka dɛ, 16Osiandɛ EWURADZE enntum dɛ ɔdze ɔman yi kɔ asaase a ɔkaa hɔn ho ntam no do no, ntsi na oeku hɔn wɔ sar no do no. 17Na afei, mepa wo kyɛw, ma EWURADZE no tum nyɛ kɛse, dɛ mbrɛ ɔwo aka dɛ, 18EWURADZE fa ebufuw nyaa, na n’adɔyɛ so, ɔdze emumuyɛ nye mbrato kyɛ, na bem bi na onnkobu ɔfɔdzinyi no; ɔdze egyanom hɔn emumuyɛ hwɛ mba, kodu ebusuasantsen ebiasa nye anan do. 19Mepa wo kyɛw, fa ɔman yi hɔn emumuyɛ fir hɔn dɛ mbrɛ w’adɔyɛ ne kɛse tse, na dɛ mbrɛ ɔwo dze efir ɔman yi, efi Egypt araa ebodu sesei. 20Na EWURADZE see dɛ, Medze akyɛ dɛ mbrɛ w’asɛm tse no: 21mbom nokwar ara, dɛ metse ase, na dɛ EWURADZE enyimnyam bɛhyɛ asaase nyinara ma yi; 22osiandɛ nyimpa nyina a woehu m’enyimnyam, nye me nsɛnkyerɛdze a meyɛe wɔ Egypt nye sar no do no, naaso wɔasɔ me ahwɛ mpɛn du nye yi, na woenntsie me ndze no; 23ampaara wonnkohu asaase a mekaa ho ntam mekyerɛɛ hɔn egyanom no, nkyii so hɔn mu biara a obu me enyimtsia no runnhu: 24na m’akowaa Kaleb dze, osiandɛ ɔwɔ sunsum bi so wɔ no mu, na oedzi m’ekyir koraa no ntsi, medze no mubodu asaase a ɔkɔr do no do; na n’asefo afa. 25Afei Amalekfo nye Keenanfo tse ɔbɔn no mu: ɔkyena hom ndan, na hom ntu nkɔ sar no do wɔ Mbɛw Po kwan do.
Ehwinhwin No Ho Asehwe
26Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron dɛ, 27Dabɛn na memma mboanofo bɔn yi a wohwinhwin tsia me yi kwan ma onkodu? Israelmba hɔn ehwinhwin a wohwinhwin tsia me no matse. 28Se hɔn dɛ, Metse ase yi, EWURADZE na ɔse, ampaara dɛ mbrɛ hom akasa wɔ m’asomu no, dɛmara so na mebɛyɛ hom: 29sar yi do ara na hom efun bɛdeda; nye hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ hom mu no nyinara, dɛ mbrɛ hom dodow nyina tse, ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu nye ekyir do no a woehwinhwin etsia me no, 30ampaara hom runndu asaase a memaa me nsa do mekyerɛɛ dɛ mebɛma hom atsena do no do, gyedɛ Jefune ne babanyin Kaleb, nye Nun ne babanyin Josua. 31Mbom hom mbofraba a hom see dɛ wɔbɛyɛ afonam no, hɔn na medze hɔn bɔkɔ do, na wobohu asaase a hom apow no. 32Na hom dze, sar yi do ara na hom efun bɛdeda. 33Na hom mba ayɛ aworamafo wɔ sar no do mfe eduanan, na wɔasoa hom ndwamanyɛ, ekodu dɛ hom efun bɛsa wɔ sar no do. 34Nda a hom dze kɛseraa asaase no, no dodow mbrɛ ɔtse no, mekyerɛ adaduanan na da kor nye afe kor, nna hom nsoa hom emumuyɛ, mekyerɛ mfe eduanan, na hom ehu mbrɛ me pa tse. 35Emi EWURADZE na maka, ampaara iyi na medze bɛyɛ mboanofo bɔn yi nyinara a woedzi ehyia etsia me yi: sar yi do ara na wɔbɛsa, na hɔ na wobowuwu. 36Na mbanyin no a Moses somaa hɔn ma wɔkɛseraa asaase no a wɔsanee bae, na wɔmaa mboanofo no nyinara hwinhwinii tsiaa me no, dɛ wɔdze asaase no ho atsenka bɔn bae no, 37mekyerɛ mbanyin no a wɔdze asaase no ho atsenka bɔn bae no, wowuu owuyar wu wɔ EWURADZE enyim. 38Mbom Nun ne babanyin Josua, nye Jefune ne babanyin Kaleb, na wonyaa nkwa wɔ mbanyin a wɔkɔree kɛseraa asaase no mu. 39Na Moses kaa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ Israelmba no nyinara: na ɔman no gyaam kɛsenara. 40Na wɔsoɛɛr ahanamakye, na wɔfowee kɔr bepɔw no etsifi, dɛ, Hwɛ hɛn nye yi, yɛbɔfow akɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE abɔ ho anohoba no: na yɛayɛ bɔn. 41Na Moses see dɛ, Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na afei hom to EWURADZE mbrasɛm yi, na iyi dze ɔrennyɛ yie? 42Mma hom mmfow nnkɔ, na EWURADZE nnyi hom mu; mma hom aanntotɔr wɔ hom atamfo enyim. 43Na Amalekfo nye Keenanfo wɔ hom enyim hɔ, na hom bɔtotɔr wɔ nkrantsee ano: osiandɛ hom asan efi EWURADZE ekyir ntsi EWURADZE so rinndzi hom ekyir. 44Na wotsitsii hɔn enyiwa ho ara dɛ wɔrofow akɔ bepɔw no etsifi: naaso EWURADZE n’ahyɛmudaka na Moses dze, woemmfi nseraban no mu emmfi. 45Nna Amalekfo, nye Keenanfo a wɔtse bepɔw no do no sianee bae bokunkum hɔn na wɔbɔɔ hɔn petsee araa kodur Horma.

Title: NKANEE 15
Content:
Afɔr Ho Mbra
1Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 2Kasa kyerɛ Israelmba, na se hɔn dɛ, Sɛ hom du hom tsenabew asaase a medze rema hom no do, 3na wɔrobɔ ogya afɔr ama EWURADZE, ɔhyew afɔr, anaa okum afɔr, dze ahyɛ anohoba bi ma, anaa dɛ ayamuyi afɔr, anaa hom afahyɛ a wɔahyɛ no mu, dze eyi nka huanhuam ama EWURADZE a ofi anantwi, anaa nguan mu a: 4ɔno nyia ɔdze n’ayɛyɛdze ba no, ɔmfa edziban afɔr isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu kor nka ngo hin ebupɛn anan mu kor ho mbrɛ EWURADZE: 5na ɔnom afɔr wenyin, hin ebupɛn anan mu kor, na fa ka ɔhyew afɔr, anaa okum afɔr eguambaa kor ho siesie. 6Na oguannyin dze, fa isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu ebien a wɔdze ngo hin ebupɛn ebiasa mu kor afrɔw, siesie yɛ edziban afɔr: 7na ɔnom afɔr no fa wenyin hin ebupɛn ebiasa mu kor bra, ma onyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE. 8Na sɛ ɔnantwisaa na irisiesie abɔ ɔhyew afɔr, anaa okum afɔr, dze ahyɛ anohoba bi ma, anaa edze robɔbɔ asomdwee afɔr ama EWURADZE a: 9ɔno edziban afɔr a ɔmfa nka ɔnantwisaa no ho nye isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu ebiasa a wɔdze ngo hin ɔfa afrɔw. 10Na fa wenyin hin ɔfa yɛ ɔnom afɔr no bra bɔbɔ ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam ma EWURADZE. 11Dɛm na wɔnyɛ ɔnantwisaa kor, anaa oguannyin kor, anaa nguambaanyin no, anaa mpɔnkyemba no nkorkor. 12Dɛ mbrɛ dodow a hom besiesie no tse no, dɛmara na hom nyɛ no nkorkor dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dodow tse. 13Ekuromfo nyinara nyɛ ndzɛmba yi dɛm mfa mbɔ ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE. 14Na sɛ ɔhɔho bi soɛ hom mu, anaa obiara a ɔwɔ hom mu wɔ hom ebusuasantsen nyina mu no, na ɔbɔbɔ ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam ama EWURADZE no; dɛ mbrɛ hom yɛ no, dɛmara so na ɔnyɛ. 15Bagua no, ahyɛdze kor na ɔnda hɔ mma hom na ɔhɔho a ɔbɔsoɛ hom mu no, ɔnyɛ daa ahyɛdze wɔ hom ebusuasantsen nyina mu: dɛ mbrɛ hom tse no, dɛmara so na ɔhɔho no nyɛ wɔ EWURADZE enyim. 16Mbra kor nye ɔmom kor na ɔnda hɔ mma hom, nye ɔhɔho a ɔabɔsoɛ hom mu nyina.
17Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 18Kasa kyerɛ Israelmba, na se hɔn dɛ, Sɛ hom du asaase a medze hom rokɔ do no do a, 19ɔno ɔba dɛ, sɛ hom ridzi asaase no do edziban no bi a, hom mbɔ ohim afɔr mma EWURADZE. 20Hom mbɔrkan no bi ne tatar na hom mfa nyɛ ohim afɔr: dɛ mbrɛ hom yɛ ewuporoweebea ohim afɔr no, dɛmara so na hom nhim no. 21Hom mbɔrkan no bi na hom mfa mma EWURADZE dɛ ohim afɔr wɔ hom ebusuasantsen nyina mu.
22Na sɛ hom fom, na hom annhyɛ mbransɛm yi a EWURADZE aka akyerɛ Moses no nyinara nsew, 23mekyerɛ dza EWURADZE nam Moses nsa do ahyɛ hom nyinara, ofi da a EWURADZE hyɛɛ mbra no, na ɔdze ba yi wɔ hom ebusuasantsen nyina mu no a; 24ɔno ɔba dɛ, sɛ wɔyɛ no ntɔgon mu, dɛ mboanofo no nnyim a, mboanofo no nyinara mfa ɔnantwisaa eburwa kor mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam ma EWURADZE, nka n’edziban afɔr, nye no nom afɔr no ho dɛ mbrɛ mbra no tse, nye apɔnkyenyin kor na ɔnyɛ bɔn ho afɔr. 25Na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma Israelmba mboanofo no nyina, na wɔdze bɛkyɛ hɔn; na ɔyɛ mfom, na hɔn mfom no ntsi, wɔdze hɔn ayɛyɛdze aba dɛ EWURADZE ogya afɔr, nye hɔn bɔn ho afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim: 26na wɔdze befir Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara, nye ɔhɔho a ɔabɔsoɛ hɔn mu no; na ɔman no nyinara afamu na wɔyɛɛ no ntɔgon mu. 27Na sɛ nyimpa kor bi annhyɛ da na ɔyɛ bɔn a, ɔno ɔmfa apɔnkyeber a oedzi afrenhyia mbra mbɔbɔ bɔn ho afɔr. 28Na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma ɔkra a ɔfom no, sɛ ɔyɛ bɔn no ber a ɔnndze enyidaho wɔ EWURADZE enyim a, ɔmpata mma no; na wɔdze bɛkyɛ no. 29Hom nnya mbra kor nto hɔ mma nyia ɔyɛ biribi a ɔnndze enyidaho dɛ ɔyɛ okuromnyi wɔ Israelmba mu, anaa ɔhɔho a ɔbɔsoɛ hom mu no. 30Ɔkra a ɔhyɛ da ara yɛ bɔn no dze, sɛ ɔyɛ okuromnyi bi o, ɔhɔho bi o, oedzi etsia EWURADZE; na dɛm ɔkra no wobotwa no efi ne man mu akyen. 31Osiandɛ oebu EWURADZE n’asɛm enyimtsia, na ɔato ne mbra no; otwa ara na wobotwa ɔkra no akyen, n’emumuyɛ nda no do.
32Na aber a Israelmba wɔwɔ sar no do no, wohun ɔbanyin bi a ɔrepɛ nyena ahomgyeda. 33Na hɔn a wohun no dɛ ɔrepɛ nyena no wɔdze no brɛɛ Moses nye Aaron, nye mboanofo no nyinara. 34Na wɔbɔɔ no dua mu, osiandɛ wonnyae nnkyerɛɛ dza wɔmfa nyɛ no. 35Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ, Oku na wonku banyin no: mboanofo no nyinara nsiw no abo wɔ nseraban no ekyir. 36Na mboanofo no nyinara dze no baa nseraban no ekyir na wosiiw no abo ma owui; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no.
Ntar No Ndwow Ho Mbra
37Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 38Kasa kyerɛ Israelmba, na hyɛ hɔn ma wɔnyɛ hɔn ntar ano ndwow wɔ hɔn ebusuasantsen nyina mu, na wɔmfa bibir ahoma nsusuo n’ano n’ano ndwow no mu: 39na ɔnyɛ ndwow mma hom, ma hom aahwɛ, na wɔaakaa EWURADZE mbrasɛm nyinara, na wɔaayɛ; na hom eennkekyin enndzi hom akoma nye hom enyiwa ekyir, dza hom tɔ dɛ wodzi ekyir ndwamanyɛ mu no: 40ama hom aakaa na wɔayɛ me mbransɛm nyinara, na hom ayɛ krɔnkrɔn ama hom Nyankopɔn. 41Emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a miyii hom fii Egypt asaase do dɛ mebɛyɛ hom Nyankopɔn no: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn.

Title: NKANEE 16
Content:
Kora, Datan Na Abiram Soɛr Tsia Moses
1Afei Kora a n’egya nye Izhar a ɔyɛ Kohat a n’egya nye Levi ne babanyin no na Eliab ne mbabanyin Datan na Abiram na Pelet ne babanyin on (Eliab na Pelet yɛ Reuben ne mbabanyin) 2na wɔsoɛree tsiaa Moses. Wɔnye Israelmba no mu bi, mboanofo no mu mbapɔmba ahaenu eduonum a wɔfrɛ hɔn bagua mu, nyimpa a wɔwɔ dzin: 3na wɔpoon hɔnho hyiae bɔɔ Moses nye Aaron do ngua, na wɔsee hɔn dɛ, Hom yɛ dodow, na mboanofo nyinara yɛ krɔnkrɔn, hɔn mu obiara, na EWURADZE wɔ hɔn mu: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi mbɔ na hom mema hom ho do wɔ EWURADZE ne baguaa do? 4Na Moses tsee no, ɔdze n’enyim butuuw famu: 5na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ Kora nye no kuw no nyinara dɛ, Anapa EWURADZE bɛkyerɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ nedze, nye nyia ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn, na ɔbɛma ɔaba ne nkyɛn: mekyerɛ nyia ɔbɛsan mu eyi no no nna ɔbɛma ɔaba ne nkyɛn. 6Iyi na hom nyɛ; hom mfa nduhuam asɛn, Kora nye no kuw nyinara; 7na wɔmfa ogya ngu mu, na wɔmfa eduhuam ngu do wɔ EWURADZE enyim ɔkyena: na ɔbɛba dɛ nyimpa a EWURADZE bɛfa no no, ɔbɛyɛ krɔnkrɔn: hom yɛ dodow, hom Levi mbabanyin. 8Na Moses see Kora dɛ, Afei hom ntsie, hom Levi mbabanyin: 9ana ɔyɛ hom adze ketseaba, dɛ Israel Nyankopɔn no atsew hom efi Israel mboanofo mu dɛ ɔdze hom rebɛn noho; ma hom aayɛ EWURADZE ntamadan no ho edwuma, na hom egyina mboanofo no enyim asom hɔn; 10Na ɔdze nuanom, Levi ne mbabanyin no nyinara ho abɛn, na hom rohwehwɛ asɔfodzi so yi? 11Dɛm ntsi na ɔwo nye wo kuw nyinara ehyia wɔ EWURADZE do: na Aaron dze, woana nye no na hom hwinhwin tsia no? 12Na Moses somae ma wɔkɛfrɛɛ Datan nye Abiram, Eliab ne mbabanyin no: na wɔsee dɛ, Yɛremmba: 13ana ɔyɛ adze ketseaba dɛ eyi hɛn efi asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do do, ruboku hɛn wɔ sar do, na kyenkyennkyen iridzi hɛn do ahenmbasɛm so yi? 14Nkyii so emmfaa hɛn mmbaa asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do no do, na emmfaa haban nye wenyin nture enyadze no so mmaa hɛn; ana mbanyin yi enyiwa na irubotutu? Yɛremmba. 15Na Moses no bo fuuw kɛsenara, na ɔsee EWURADZE dɛ, Mma w’enyi nnsɔ hɔn afɔrbɔ: menngyee hɔn nsamu asoaso kor, nkyii so mennyɛɛ hɔn mu kor biara bɔn. 16Na Moses see Kora dɛ, Ɔwo nye wo mboanofo no nyinara mbra EWURADZE enyim, ɔwo, nye hɔn, nye Aaron, mbra ɔkyena: 17na hom mu nyimpa biara mfa n’eduhuamsɛn, na hom mfa eduhuam ngugu mu, na hom mu nyimpa biara mfa n’eduhuamsɛn mbra EWURADZE enyim, nduhuamsɛn ahaenu eduonum; ɔwo so, nye Aaron, obiara mfa n’eduhuamsɛn. 18Na wɔfefae, nyimpa biara nye n’eduhuamsɛn, na wɔdze ogya guguu mu, na wɔnye Moses nye Aaron kegyinagyinaa ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano. 19Na Kora poon mboanofo no nyinara hyiae bɔɔ hɔn do ngua wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano: na EWURADZE enyimnyam yii noho edzi kyerɛɛ mboanofo no nyinara.
20Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron dɛ, 21Hom ntsew homho mfi mboanofo yi mu, ma menhyew hɔn amon mu. 22Na wɔdze hɔn enyim butubutuuw famu, na wɔsee dɛ, Ao Nyankopɔn, honam nyinara hɔn esunsum Nyankopɔn, ana nyimpa kor bɛyɛ bɔn, na wo bo efuw mboanofo no nyinara? 23Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 24Kasa kyerɛ mboanofo no dɛ, Hom ntwe hom ho do mfi Kora, Datan, nye Abiram ntamadan ho. 25Na Moses soɛree na ɔkɔr Datan nye Abiram nkyɛn; na Israel mpanyimfo no dzii n’ekyir kɔree. 26Na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ ɔman no dɛ, Mepa hom kyɛw, hom ntwe hom ho mfi nyimpa bɔn yi hɔn asesee ho, na mma hom nnka hɔn biribiara, bɛyɛ na hom ahyew wɔ hɔn bɔn nyinara mu. 27Nna wɔtwee hɔnho fii Kora, Datan, nye Abiram ntamadan ho wɔ afa nyina: na Datan nye Abiram fiir edzi, na wobegyinagyinaa hɔn asesee abowano, hɔn yernom, nye hɔn mbabanyin, nye hɔn mbɔtoaba so. 28Na Moses see dɛ, Iyi na hom dze bohu dɛ EWURADZE na ɔasoma me dɛ mindzi dwuma yi nyinara; na mommbɔɔ mankasa me tsir mu yɛ. 29Sɛ nyimpa nyinara wu ara na iyinom bowuwu, anaa sɛ dza ɔto nyimpa nyinara na ɔbɔtɔ hɔn a, ɔnodze na nnyɛ EWURADZE na ɔasoma me. 30Na sɛ adze fofor bi dze na EWURADZE bɛyɛ, na asaase bobue n’ano, na ɔamen hɔn, nye dza odzi wɔ hɔn nyinara, na wɔnam enyikan akɔ samanadze a; ɔnodze hom ntse ase dɛ mbanyin yi ebu EWURADZE enyimtsia. 31Na ɔbaa dɛ owiee nsɛm yi nyinara ka no, asaase a ɔwɔ hɔn ase no paae: 32na asaase buee n’ano, na ɔmeen hɔn, nye hɔn efifo, nye nyimpa a wodzi wɔ Kora nyinara, nye hɔn adze nyinara. 33Nna hɔn, nye dza odzi wɔ hɔn nyinara, nam enyikan sianee kɔr samanadze: na asaase no seraam hɔn do, na wɔherae wɔ bagua no mu. 34Na Israelfo a woetwa hɔnho ehyia no nyinara guanee wɔ hɔn nkekamu no ntsi: na wɔsee dɛ, Bɛyɛ na asaase amen hɛn. 35Na ogya fii EWURADZE hɔ bae, na ɔbɛhyeew mbanyin ahaenu eduonum a wɔdze eduhuam bae no.
36Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 37Kasa kyerɛ ɔsɔfo Aaron ne babanyin Eleazar dɛ, ɔntase nduhuam asɛn no mfi ogyahyewee no mu, na fa ogya no petsepetse enyim noho; na ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn: 38mekyerɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo yi a wɔayɛ hɔnankasa hɔn nkwa ho bɔn nduhuam asɛn no, na ma wɔnyɛ no ɔborntɛrba mfa nyɛ afɔrmbukyia no ho nkataho: osiandɛ wɔdze baa EWURADZE enyim, dɛm ntsi ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn: na ɔnyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze mma Israelmba. 39Na ɔsɔfo Eleazar faa boran nduhuam asɛn no a hɔn a wɔhyewee no dze bae no; na wɔboree dze yɛɛ afɔrmbukyia no ho nkataho: 40dɛ ɔnyɛ nkaadze mma Israelmba, amma ɔhɔho bi a ommfi Aaron n’asefo mu aammba ho ammbɛhyew eduhuam wɔ EWURADZE enyim; mma ɔaannyɛ dɛ Kora, nye no kuw no: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE nam Moses do kaa kyerɛɛ no no.
41Na n’adzekyee no Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara hwinhwinii tsiaa Moses nye Aaron dɛ, Hom na hom eku EWURADZE ne man. 42Na ɔbaa dɛ, aber a mboanofo no boaboaa hɔn ano tsiaa Moses nye Aaron no, wɔdandaan hɔn enyi wɔ ehyiadzibuw no do: na, hwɛ, mununkum no akata do, na EWURADZE enyimnyam no yii noho edzi. 43Na Moses nye Aaron baa ehyiadzibuw no enyim. 44Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 45Hom mma hom ho do mfi mboanofo yi mu, ma menhyew hɔn amon mu. Na wɔdze hɔn enyim butubutuuw famu. 46Na Moses see Aaron dɛ, Fa w’eduhuamsɛn, na sɔ afɔrmbukyia no do ogya gu mu, na fa eduhuam to do, na suo mu nantsew ntsɛmara kɔ mboanofo no nkyɛn, na kɛpata ma hɔn: na ebufuhyew efi EWURADZE hɔ efir; ɔyardɔm no ahyɛ ase. 47Na Aaron fae dɛ mbrɛ Moses kae no, na otuu mbirika kɔr bagua no finimfin; na, hwɛ, ɔyardɔm no ahyɛ ase wɔ ɔman no mu: na ɔdze eduhuam no gui, na ɔpatae maa ɔman no. 48Na ogyinaa ewufo nye enyikamfo no ntamu; na wosiankaa ɔyardɔm no. 49Afei hɔn a wowuwui wɔ ɔyardɔm no mu wɔyɛ mpemduanan nye ahaesuon, ɔsor hɔn a Kora asɛm no ntsi wowuwui no. 50Na ɔyardɔm no siankaa no, Aaron sanee baa Moses nkyɛn wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano.

Title: NKANEE 17
Content:
Aaron No Poma No
1Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 2Kasa kyerɛ Israelmba, na gyegye hɔn hɔ mpoma, egyanom ofi kor mu kor, wɔ hɔn mbapɔmba no nyinara hɔ dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee, mpoma duebien: kyerɛw nyimpa biara ne dzin wɔ no poma do. 3Na kyerɛw Aaron ne dzin wɔ Levi poma do: na poma kor nyɛ hɔn egyanom efi do tsitsir kor dze. 4Na gyaa mu gu ehyiadzibuw no mu wɔ Dase no enyim, mbrɛ menye hom hyia no. 5Na ɔbɛba dɛ banyin a mibeyi no no, no poma bɛfefɛw: na mebɛma mo ho ehwinhwin a Israelmba hwinhwin tsia hom no egyaa. 6Na Moses kasaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba, na hɔn mbapɔmba no nyinara memaa no mpoma, ɔbapɔmba kor nedze kor, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee no, mekyerɛ mpoma duebien: na Aaron no poma wɔ hɔn mpoma no mu. 7Na Moses gyaa mpoma no mu guu EWURADZE enyim wɔ Dasebuw no mu. 8Na ɔbaa dɛ adze kyee no, Moses kɔr Dasebuw no mu no; na, hwɛ, Aaron no poma no a ɔyɛ Levi ofi dze no afefɛw, ayɛ frɔmfrɔm, na egu nhyiren, na asow almɔnd aba beree. 9Na Moses dze mpoma no nyinara fi EWURADZE enyim brɛɛ Israelmba no nyinara: na wɔhwɛe, na nyimpa biara faa no poma. 10Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ, Fa Aaron no poma no san to Dase no enyim, ma wɔmfa nsie nyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze mma mba asoɔdzenfo no; ama eetwa hɔn ehwinhwin a wohwinhwin tsia me no do, amma woeennwuwu. 11Dɛm na Moses yɛe: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ no no, dɛmara na ɔyɛe.
12Na Israelmba no kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, Hwɛ yeruwu, yɛreyera, hɛn nyinara rehera. 13Obiara a ɔba ho, nyia ɔba EWURADZE ntamadan no ho, owu: ana hɛn nyinara yenwuwu?

Title: NKANEE 18
Content:
Asɔfo Ma Levifo Hɔn Som Ho Kyɛfa
1Na EWURADZE see Aaron dɛ, Ɔwo nye wo mbabanyin nye w’egyanom fi a wɔka wo ho no nsoa ahotseweebea no ho emumuyɛ: na ɔwo nye wo mbabanyin a wɔka wo ho no nsoa hom asɔfodzi ho emumuyɛ. 2Na wo nuanom no so, Levi ebusuakuw no, w’egya n’ebusuakuw no, fa hɔn ka woho bra ho, ma wɔmboa wo wɔ ɔsom no mu: mbom ɔwo nye wo mbabanyin a wɔka wo ho no nsom wɔ dasebuw no enyim. 3Na wɔnhwɛ w’ahwɛdodze, nye Buw no nyinara ahwɛdodze no: ahotseweebea ndzɛmba ho nye afɔrmbukyia no ho nko ara na mma wɔmmba, amma woeennwuwu, hɔn o, hom o. 4Na wɔnka wo ho, na wɔnhwɛ ehyiadzibuw no n’ahwɛdodze, dɛ mbrɛ Buw no no ho edwuma nyinara tse: na mma ɔhɔho bi mmba hom nkyɛn. 5Na hom nhwɛ ahotseweebea ahwɛdodze no, nye afɔrmbukyia no ahwɛdodze no: amma ebufuhyew bi aammba Israelmba do bio. 6Na mara, hwɛ, mafa wo nuanom Levifo no mefi Israelmba no mu: mama hom dɛ wɔyɛ akyɛdze a wɔdze ama EWURADZE, dɛ wɔnyɛ ehyiadzibuw no ho edwuma. 7Na ɔwo nye wo mbabanyin a wɔka wo ho no nhwɛ hom asɔfodzi no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no n’adze biara mu, na ntwamutam no mu dze no mu; na hom mfa nsom: medze asɔfodzi no mema hom dɛ akyɛdze dwuma: na ɔhɔho a ɔba ho no wonku no.
8Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Aaron dɛ, Hwɛ, emi dze, medze me mado afɔr ahwɛdodze ama wo, mekyerɛ Israelmba adzekrɔnkrɔn nyinara, medze ama ɔwo nye wo mbabanyin no osian ngosera no ntsi, dɛ daa ahyɛdze. 9Iyi na ɔnyɛ wodze wɔ krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn a wɔdze esie efi ogya no mu no mu: hɔn ayɛyɛdze biara, mekyerɛ hɔn edziban afɔr biara, nye hɔn bɔn ho afɔr biara, nye hɔn asodzi ho afɔr biara a wɔdze brɛ me no, ɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn mma ɔwo nye wo mbabanyin no. 10Dzi no wɔ bea a hɔ yɛ krɔnkrɔn: ɔbanyin biara ndzi bi; ɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔn mma wo. 11Na iyi nyɛ wodze; hɔn ayɛyɛdze mu ɔmado afɔr, mekyerɛ Israelmba hɔn ohim afɔr nyinara; medze ama ɔwo, nye wo mbabanyin, nye wo mbabaa a wɔka wo ho, dɛ daa ahyɛdze: obiara a no ho tsew wɔ wo fi mu no ndzi bi. 12Ngo mu papa nyinara, nye wenyin nye eburow mu papa nyinara no mu nduadzewakan a wɔdze ma EWURADZE no, ɔwo na medze ama wo. 13Hɔn asaase do nduadzewa nyinara mu edziban beree a wɔdze brɛ EWURADZE no, ɔnyɛ wodze; obiara a no ho tsew wɔ wo fi mu no ndzi bi. 14Israel mu adze biara a woehyira do ama nyɛ wodze. 15Adze biara a obue ɔyafun, wɔ honam a wɔdze brɛ EWURADZE no nyinara mu, nyimpa nye abowa nyina, nyɛ wodze: naaso ɔpon na pon nyimpa mbakan, nye abowa a hɔn ho nntsew mbakan so pon hɔn. 16Na hɔn a wɔrobɔpon hɔn a woedzi bosoom no, pon hɔn, dɛ mbrɛ w’abotwa tse, sika dwetɛbona enum, dɛ mbrɛ ahotseweebea dwetɛbona a ɔnoara nye gera eduonu. 17Na ɔnantwi abakan, anaa apɔnkye abakan dze, mma mmpon; wɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn: fa hɔn bɔgyaa no petse afɔrmbukyia no do, na hyew hɔn seradze yɛ ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam ma EWURADZE. 18Na hɔn nam nyɛ wodze, dɛ mbrɛ ohim nyan nye aserɛ nyimfa no yɛ wodze no. 19Ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn mu ɔmado afɔr nyinara a Israelmba dze brɛ EWURADZE no, medze mama ɔwo, nye wo mbabanyin, nye wo mbabaa a wɔka wo ho no, dɛ daa ahyɛdze: ɔyɛ EWURADZE enyim daa nkyen ahyɛmu dze ma ɔwo nye w’asefo a wɔka wo ho no. 20Na EWURADZE see Aaron dɛ, Mma nnya egyapadze wɔ hɔn asaase mu, nkyii so mma nnya kyɛfa bi wɔ hɔn mu: emi nye wo kyɛfa nye w’egyapadze wɔ Israelmba mu.
21Na Levimba no dze, hwɛ, medze Israel mu ebupɛn du du nyinara ama hɔn dɛ egyapadze, ahyɛ hɔn som a wɔsom no ananmu, mekyerɛ ehyiadzibuw no ho ɔsom no a. 22Na ɔdzekɔr yi mma Israelmba no mmba ehyiadzibuw no ho, bɛyɛ na wɔasoa bɔn, na woewuwu. 23Na Levifo no dze wɔnyɛ ehyiadzibuw no ho ɔsom edwuma, na wɔnsoa no ho mbusu: ɔnyɛ daa ahyɛdze wɔ hom ebusuasantsen nyina mu, na Israelmba mu dze worinnya egyapadze. 24Na Israelmba ebupɛn du du a wɔdze ma dɛ ɔmado afɔr ma EWURADZE no, medze ama Levifo no dɛ egyapadze: dɛm ntsi na mase hɔn dɛ, Israelmba mu dze worinnya egyapadze no.
25Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 26Afei so kasa kyerɛ Levifo no, na se hɔn dɛ, Sɛ hom regyegye Israelmba no hɔ ebupɛn du du no a medze fi hɔn hɔ ama hom dɛ hom egyapadze no a, ɔno hom mfa no mu ebupɛn du du mu ebupɛn du nyɛ no ɔmado afɔr mma EWURADZE. 27Na wombu hom ɔmado afɔr mma hom dɛ ewuporoweebea eburow, nye wenyintwer mayɛ. 28Dɛm na hom so mbɔ ɔmado afɔr mma EWURADZE wɔ hom ebupɛn du du a, hom gyegye no wɔ Israelmba hɔ nyinara mu; na hom mfa no mu EWURADZE ɔmado afɔr no mma ɔsɔfo Aaron. 29Hom akyɛdze nyinara mu na hom mfa mu EWURADZE ɔmado afɔr biara mbra, no mu papa nyinara, mekyerɛ no mu adzekrɔnkrɔn no. 30Dɛm ntsi se hɔn dɛ, Sɛ hom rema no mu papa no do a, ɔno wombu mma Levifo no dɛ ewuporoweebea ndɔree, nye wenyintwer ndɔree. 31Na hom ndzi no beebiara, hom nye hom efifo: na ɔyɛ hom akatua a ɔhyɛ hom ehyiadzibuw ho ɔsom edwuma ananmu. 32Na sɛ hom ma no mu papa no do a, hom ronnsoa bɔn bi wɔ ne ntsi: na mma hom nnhura Israelmba adzekrɔnkrɔn ho, mma hom eennwuwu.

Title: NKANEE 19
Content:
Ahoguar Nsu No
1Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron dɛ, 2Iyi nye mbra ahyɛdze a EWURADZE ahyɛ, dɛ, Kasa kyerɛ Israelmba no, ma wɔmfa ɔnantwiber memen a nkekaa nnyi ho a onndzi dzɛm a kɔndua nnkɔr no do pɛn: 3na hom mfa no mma ɔsɔfo Eleazar, na ɔmfa no mpue mbra nseraban no ekyir, na obi nku no wɔ n’enyim: 4na ɔsɔfo Eleazar mfa ne nsatseaba mfa no bɔgyaa bi, na ɔmpetse no bɔgyaa no bi ngu ehyiadzibuw no enyim afamu mpɛn esuon: 5na obi nhyew ɔnantwiber no wɔ n’enyim; no nwoma, nye ne nam, nye no bɔgyaa, nye n’egyanan no: 6na ɔsɔfo no mfa kyindur dua, nye odwonhataw, nye serdaa, na ɔntow ngu ɔnantwiber a ɔrehyew no do. 7Na afei ɔsɔfo no nhor ne ntar, na onguar wɔ nsu mu, na n’ekyir no na ɔmbra nseraban no mu, na ɔsɔfo no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir. 8Na nyia ɔhyew no no nhor ne ntar wɔ nsu mu, na onguar no honam wɔ nsu mu, na no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir. 9Na ɔbanyin bi a no ho tsew nsesaw ɔnantwiber no nso no, na ɔmfa nkogu nseraban no ekyir beebi a ɔtsew, na wɔmfa nsie nyɛ Israelmba mboanofo ahoguar nsu: ɔyɛ bɔn ho afɔr. 10Na nyia ɔsesaw ɔnantwiber no nso no ɔnhor ne ntar, na no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir: na ɔnyɛ Israelmba no, nye ɔhɔho a ɔsoɛ hɔn mu no, daa ahyɛdze. 11Nyia ɔka nyimpa biara no fun no no ho nntsew araa nda esuon: 12ɔnoara na ɔmfa iyi nguar noho da a otsia ebiasa no, na da a otsia esuon no na no ho atsew: na sɛ oennguar noho da a otsia ebiasa no, nye da a otsia esuon no a, no ho renntsew. 13Obiara a ɔka nyimpa biara a oewu no fun no, na onnguar noho no, ogu EWURADZE ntamadan no ho fi; na ɔkra no wobotwa no efi Israel akyen: osiandɛ wɔammpetse ahoguar nsu no enngu no do ntsi no ho nntsew; n’ahoɔfi da ho wɔ no do. 14Sɛ nyimpa wu asese mu a no ho mbra nye yi: obiara a ɔba asese no mu, na obiara a ɔwɔ asese no mu no, no ho nntsew araa nda esuon. 15Na kɔɔpow biara a n’ano da hɔ a onnyi ebuado wɔ do no, no ho nntsew. 16Na obiara a ɔka obi a ɔatɔr nkrantsee ano, anaa fun bi, anaa nyimpa biew bi, anaa nda bi wɔ haban mu no, no ho nntsew araa nda esuon. 17Na nyia no ho nntsew no wɔmfa bɔn ho afɔr nhyewee no no nso no bi, na wɔmfa mbasu ngu do wɔ kɔɔpow mu mma no: 18na nyimpa a no ho tsew bi mfa odwonhataw, na ɔmfa mbɔ nsu no mu, na ɔmfa mpetse asese no, nye ndzɛmba no nyinara, nye nyimpa a wɔwɔ hɔ no, nye nyia ɔka biew, anaa ɔtɔfo, anaa fun, anaa nda bi no do: 19na nyimpa a no ho tsew no mfa mpetse nyia no ho nntsew no do da a otsia ebiasa no, nye da a otsia esuon no: na da a otsia esuon no onguar no; na ɔnhor ne ntar, na onguar wɔ nsu mu, na no ho ntsew ewimbir no. 20Na nyimpa a no ho nntsew, na oennguar noho no, ɔkra no wobotwa no efi bagua no mu, osiandɛ oegu EWURADZE krɔnkrɔn bea ho fi: wɔmmpetsee ahoguar nsu no wɔ no do; no ho nntsew. 21Na ɔnyɛ daa ahyɛdze mma hɔn: na nyia ɔpetse ahoguar nsu no nhor ne ntar; na nyia ɔka ahoguar nsu no no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir. 22Na adze biara a nyimpa a no ho nntsew no ka no, no ho nntsew; na ɔkra a ɔka no no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir.

Title: NKANEE 20
Content:
Nsɛm A Osisii Wɔ Kades
1Na Israelmba no, mekyerɛ mboanofo no nyina, baa Zin sar do wɔ bosoom a odzi kan no mu: na ɔman no tsenaa Kades; na Miriam wui wɔ hɔ, na wosiee no wɔ hɔ. 2Nna nsu nnyi hɔ mma mboanofo no: na wohyiaa hɔnho hyiae tsiaa Moses nye Aaron. 3Na ɔman no nye Moses hamee, na wɔkaa dɛ, Ka hɛn nko a nkyɛ ber a hɛn nuanom wuwui wɔ EWURADZE enyim no hɛn so yewuwui! 4Na ebɛn ntsi na hom dze EWURADZE bagua aba sar yi do, dɛ yembowuwu wɔ ha, hɛn nye hɛn mbowa? 5Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom ayɛ ma yeefi Egypt efir, dɛ hom dze hɛn reba bea bɔn yi do yi? Ɔnnyɛ abadua, anaa adɔmba, anaa wenyindua, anaa pɔmegranate eduaba bea: nkyii so nsu mpo a wɔnom bi nnyi hɔ. 6Na Moses nye Aaron fii bagua no enyim kɔr ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano, na wɔdze hɔn enyim butubutuuw hɔ: na EWURADZE enyimnyam yii noho edzi kyerɛɛ hɔn. 7Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 8Fa poma no, na boa mboanofo no ano, ɔwo, nye wo nua Aaron, na hom nkasa nkyerɛ ɔbotan no wɔ hɔn enyim, ma ɔmma no nsu; na yi ɔbotan no mu nsu ma hɔn: ma mboanofo no nye hɔn mbowa nnom. 9Na Moses faa poma no fii EWURADZE enyim, dɛ mbrɛ ɔhyɛɛ no no. 10Na Moses nye Aaron boaboaa bagua no ano wɔ ɔbotan no enyim, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ, Afei hom ntsie, hom asoɔdzenfo; ana yɛntwe ɔbotan yi mu nsu mma hom? 11Na Moses maa ne nsa do, na ɔdze no poma no bɔɔ ɔbotan no mpɛn ebien: na nsu fiir edzi baa pii, na mboanofo no nye hɔn mbowa nomee. 12Na EWURADZE see Moses nye Aaron dɛ, Osiandɛ hom anngye me enndzi, ammfa anntsew mo ho wɔ Israelmba enyim mu ntsi, hom remmfa bagua yi nndu asaase a medze ama hɔn no do. 13Iyi nye Meriba nsu no; osiandɛ Israelmba nye EWURADZE hamee, na ɔtseew noho wɔ hɔn mu.
14Na Moses somaa abɔfo fii Kades kɔr Edomhen hɔ dɛ, Mbrɛ wo nua Israel se nye yi, Woara inyim ɔhaw a aba hɛn do nyinara: 15mbrɛ hɛn egyanom dze sianee kɔr Egypt, na yɛdze tsenaa Egypt mber tsentsen; na Egyptfo yɛɛ hɛn, nye hɛn egyanom bɔn: 16na yesui frɛɛ EWURADZE a, otsiee hɛn ndze, na ɔsomaa ɔbɔfo, na oyii hɛn fii Egypt no: na, hwɛ yɛwɔ Kades, kurow a ɔwɔ wo ntoaado noho no mu: 17meserɛ wo, ma yentwa mu mfa w’asaase do: yerunntwa mu mmfa haban anaa wenyin ture mu, nkyii so yɛronnom bura mu nsu bi: yɛbɛfa ɔhen ne tsempɔn do ara akɔ, yɛremman enyimfa anaa abankum, ekodu dɛ yeetwa mu wɔ wo ntoaado. 18Na Edom see no dɛ, Mma mmbɛfa mo mu, bɛyɛ na medze nkrantsee efir edzi ebehyia wo. 19Na Israelmba no see no dɛ, Yɛrebɛfa ɔtsempɔn do akɔ: na sɛ hɛn nye hɛn mbowa nom wo nsu bi a, ɔno yebotua kaw: ɔnnyɛ biribiara, ma yɛmfa hɛn anamɔn ara mbotwa mu. 20Na ɔsee dɛ, Mma hom nntwa mu. Na Edom dze nkorɔfo pii, nye nsa a ɔyɛ dzen fiir edzi behyiaa hɔn. 21Dɛm na Edom poow dɛ ɔma Israel kwan wɔ no ntoaado: dɛm ntsi Israel danee fii noho.
22Na wotui fii Kades: na Israelmba no, mekyerɛ mboanofo no nyina, baa bepɔw Hor ho. 23Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron wɔ bepɔw Hor ho, wɔ Edom asaase ntoaado dɛ, 24Ɔnnkɛkyɛr na Aaron akɛka no nkorɔfo ho wɔ nsamankyir: na ɔronnkɔ asaase a medze ama Israelmba no do, osiandɛ hom yɛɛ asoɔdzen wɔ m’asɛm do wɔ Meriba nsu ho. 25Fa Aaron nye ne babanyin Eleazar, na fa hɔn fow bepɔw Hor: 26na pɔr Aaron ne ntar no, na fa hyɛ ne babanyin Eleazar: na onwu wɔ hɔ nkɛka no nkorɔfo ho. 27Na Moses yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛe no: na wɔfoow bepɔw Hor wɔ mboanofo no nyinara enyim. 28Na Moses pɔɔr Aaron ne ntar no, na ɔdze hyɛɛ ne babanyin Eleazar; na Aaron wui wɔ bepɔw no etsifi hɔ: na Moses nye Eleazar fii bepɔw no do sianee. 29Na aber a mboanofo no nyinara hun dɛ Aaron ewu no, wosuu Aaron adaduasa, mekyerɛ Israel fi no nyinara.

Title: NKANEE 21
Content:
Israelfo Sɛɛ Keenanfo
1Na Aradhen, Keenannyi no a, ɔtse Pomu afamu no, tsee dɛ wɔreka dɛ Israel nam Atarim ɔkwan do aba no; nna ɔnye Israel bɔkoe, na ɔfaa hɔn mu binom ndɔmmum. 2Na Israelfo bɔɔ EWURADZE anohoba see dɛ, Sɛ ɔwo dze ɔman yi rehyɛ hɛn nsa dze a, nkyɛ yɛbɛsɛɛ hɔn nkurow huntuhuntu. 3Na EWURADZE tsiee Israelfo ndze, na oyii Keenanfo no mae; na wɔsɛɛ hɔn nye hɔn nkurow no huntuhuntu: na wɔtoo bea no dzin Horma.
Boran Abowatsena
4Na wotui fi bepɔw Hor ho dze faa Mbɛw Po kwan do, dɛ wɔrobɔ Edom asaase ho aprɔw akɔ: na ahomtsew kaa ɔman no hɔn kra pii wɔ ɔkwan no ntsi. 5Na ɔman no kasaa tsiaa Nyankopɔn, nye Moses, dɛ, Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom eyi hɛn efi Egypt dɛ yembowuwu wɔ sar do yi? Na edziban bi nnyi hɔ; na nsu bi nnyi hɔ; na edzibanhun yi afon hɛn kra. 6Na EWURADZE somaa mbowatsena a wɔsɔw wɔ ɔman no mu, na wɔkɔsosɔɔw ɔman no; na Israel mu nkorɔfo pii wuwui. 7Na ɔman no baa Moses nkyɛn bɛsee dɛ, Yɛayɛ bɔn, osiandɛ yɛakasa etsia EWURADZE, nye ɔwo; pa EWURADZE kyɛw, ma ombeyi mbowatsena no mfi hɛn do. Na Moses paa kyɛw maa ɔman no. 8Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ, Yɛ boran abowatsena, na fa si dua do: na ɔbɛba dɛ, obiara a abowatsena asɔw no no, sɛ ɔhwɛ a, obenya nkwa. 9Na Moses yɛɛ boran abowatsena, na ɔdze sii dua no do: na ɔbaa dɛ, sɛ abowatsena ka nyimpa bi a, ɔhwɛ boran abowatsena no a, onya nkwa.
Israelmba Sow Hɔn Akwantu Do
10Na Israelmba no tui, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Obot. 11Na wotui fii Obot, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Iye-abarim, wɔ sar a ɔwɔ Moab enyim, wɔ wipuei afamu no do. 12Hɔ na wofi tui, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Zered bɔnsa mu. 13Hɔ na wofi tui, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Arnon a ɔwɔ sar do a ofi Amorifo ntoaado ba no, n’egya: na esutsen Arnon Moab ntoaado a, ɔda Moab nye Amorifo ntamu. 14Dɛm ntsi wɔka no EWURADZE Akodzi nwoma no mu dɛ,
Vaheb wɔ Sufa,
Nye Arnon mbɔnsa no,
15Nye mbɔnsa no a ɔtserew no a
Ɔkom kɔ Ar tsenabew afamu no,
Na ɔtwer Moab ntoaado ho no.
16Na hɔ na wofi tui kɔr Beer, nsubura a EWURADZE kaa ho asɛm kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, Boa ɔman no ano, na mebɛma hɔn nsu.
17Aber no mu na Israel toow ndwom yi dɛ:
Nsubura tue ɛ; hom ngye no do:
18Nsubura a ahenmba tui no,
Ɔman no mu ekunyin no fumfunii,
Wɔdze ahempoma, ɔnye hɔn mpoma.
Na wofi sar no do tui kɔr Mattana: 19na wofi Mattana kɔr Nahaliel: na wofi Nahaliel kɔr Bamot: 20na wofi Bamot kɔr bɔnsa a ɔwɔ Moab haban mu wɔ Pisga etsifi a ɔhwɛ sar yiredede no enyi no mu.
Wodzi Sihon Na Og Do Konyim
21Na Israel somaa abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Amorifo hen Sihon nkyɛn, dɛ, 22Ma muntwa mu mfa w’asaase do: yɛremman haban mu, anaa wenyin ture mu; yɛronnom nsubura mu nsu bi: yɛrefa ɔhen tsempɔn do akɔ, ekodu dɛ yeetwa mu wɔ wo ntoaado. 23Na Sihon amma Israel kwan ma woeenntwa mu wɔ no ntoaado: na mbom ɔboaa ne man nyinara ano, na ofiir edzi kehyiaa Israel wɔ sar no do, na ɔbaa Jahaz: na ɔnye Israel bɔkoe. 24Na Israel dze nkrantsee ano kum no, na ɔfaa n’asaase ofi Arnon do dze kɔ Jabbok do, mekyerɛ okodu Ammonmba ho: osiandɛ Ammonmba ntoaado no ɔyɛ dzen. 25Na Israel faa nkurow yi nyinara: na Israel tsenaa Amorifo nkurow no nyinara mu, wɔ Hesbon, nye no ho nkuroba nyinara mu. 26Na Hesbon yɛ Amorifo hen Sihon kurow, ɔno na ɔnye nkan no Moabhen no ako, na ɔagye ne nsamu n’asaase nyinara kodu Arnon ho. 27Dɛm ntsi hɔn a wɔkasa wɔ mbɛbu mu no ka dɛ,
Hom mbra Hesbon,
Ma wɔnkyekyer na wontsintsim Sihon kurow no:
28Na ogya bi efi Hesbon,
Ogyaframee efi Sihon kurow mu:
Ɔamen Moab Ar,
Arnon mbea sorɔnsorɔm do ekunyin no
29Ɔwo Moab, due!
Kemos ɔman, ɔwo ayera:
Oeyi ne mbabanyin ama dɛ eguamfo,
Na ne mbabaa akɔ ndɔmmum mu,
Wɔ Amorifo hen Sihon hɔ.
30Yɛatotow hɔn; Hesbon ayera araa ekodu Dibon,
Yɛasɛɛ hɔn araa akɔ Nofa a
Ɔdze kodu Medeba.
31Na Israel tsenaa Amorifo asaase do. 32Na Moses somae ma wɔkɛseraa Jazer, na wɔfaa no nkuroba no, na wotuu Amorifo a wɔwɔ hɔ no. 33Na wɔdanee na wɔkɔ fowee kɔr Basan ɔkwan do: na Basanhen Ɔge fiir edzi kehyiaa hɔn, ɔno nye ne man nyinara, dɛ wɔrokɔ ko wɔ Edrei. 34Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ, Mma nnsuro no: na meyi ɔno, nye ne man nyinara, nye n’asaase mahyɛ wo nsa; na yɛ no dɛ mbrɛ eyɛɛ Amorifo hen Sihon a ɔtsenaa Hesbon no. 35Nna wokunkum ɔno, nye ne mbabanyin, nye ne man nyinara, kodur dɛ woenngyaa obi amma no: na wɔfaa n’asaase no.

Title: NKANEE 22
Content:
Moabhen Balak Soma Kɔ Balaam Hɔ
1Na Israelmba no tui, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Moab tɛtɛr mu wɔ Jeriko Jordan egya.
2Na Zipor ne babanyin Balak hun dza Israel ayɛ Amorifo no nyinara. 3Na Moab suroo ɔman no dodow, osiandɛ wɔdɔɔ so: na nketsenketse kitsaa hɔn wɔ Israelmba no ntsi. 4Na Moab see Midian mpanyimfo dɛ, Afei nyimpadodow yi bɛsɛɛ dza etwa ehyia hɛn ho nyinara, dɛ mbrɛ ɔnantwi we haban mu efuw. Na Zipor ne babanyin Balak nna aber no mu ɔyɛ Moabhen. 5Na ɔsomaa abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Beor ne babanyin Balaam hɔ, wɔ Petor a ɔwɔ Esutsen no ho wɔ ne man mba asaase do dɛ wonkehyia no, dɛ, Hwɛ, ɔman bi efi Egypt aba: hwɛ, wɔkata asaase enyi, na wogu me tsentsendo: 6dɛm ntsi afei, meserɛ wo, bra bɛpaa ɔman yi ma me; na wɔyɛ dzen dodow ma me: dɛ bi a mibedzi nyim, ma meekuku hɔn, na maapam hɔn mefi asaase no do: na minyim dɛ nyia ɔwo ihyira no no woehyira no, na nyia ɔwo edom no no wɔadom no. 7Na Moab mpanyin nye Midian mpanyin no sii mu dze ebisa no ho akatua no wɔ hɔn nsamu kɔree; na wɔbaa Balaam hɔ, na wɔbɛkaa Balak ne nsɛm no kyerɛɛ no. 8Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ, Hom nsoɛ ha anadwe yi, na mebɛbrɛ hom mbuae, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE bɛka akyerɛ me no: na Moab mbapɔmba no nye Balaam tsenae. 9Na Nyankopɔn baa Balaam nkyɛn, na ɔsee dɛ, Mbanyin bɛn na wɔnye wo wɔ hɔ yi? 10Na Balaam see Nyankopɔn dɛ, Zipor ne babanyin Balak, Moabhen no, na ɔasoma ma wɔaba mo hɔ dɛ, 11Hwɛ, ɔman a woefi Egypt aba no, akata asaase enyi: afei, bra bɛpaa hɔn ma me; dɛ bi a mubotum menye hɔn ako, na mapam hɔn. 12Na Nyankopɔn see Balaam dɛ, Mma nnye hɔn nnkɔ, mma mmpaa ɔman no: na woehyira hɔn. 13Na Balaam soɛɛr anapa no, na ɔsee Balak mbapɔmba no dɛ, Hom nkɔ hom asaase do: na EWURADZE mmpen dɛ ɔbɛma me kwan ma menye hom akɔ. 14Na Moab mbapɔmba no soɛree, na wɔbaa Balak nkyɛn, na wɔsee dɛ, Balaam ammpen dɛ ɔnye hɛn bɛba. 15Na Balak somaa mbapɔmba a wɔdɔɔ so, na hɔn enyim wɔ nyam sen hɔn so bio. 16Na wɔbaa Balaam nkyɛn, na wɔsee no dɛ, Mbrɛ Zipor babanyin Balak se nye yi, Mepa wo kyɛw, mma biribi nnsiw wo me nkyɛn ba ho kwan: 17na mebɛhyɛ wo enyimnyam kɛsenara, na biribiara a ebɛse me no mebɛyɛ: dɛm ntsi bra, meserɛ wo, bɛpaa ɔman yi ma me. 18 Na Balaam buae na ɔsee Balak no nkowaa no dɛ, Sɛ Balak dze dwetɛ nye sika ne fi ma mpo bɛma me a, murunntum mummbu EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn n’asɛm do, mennkɛyɛ biribi, dɛ osuar anaa ɔyɛ kɛse. 19Afei dɛm ntsi, mɛserɛ hom, hom so ntsintsim ha anadwe yi, ma munhu dza EWURADZE bɛka akyerɛ me bio. 20Na Nyankopɔn baa Balaam nkyɛn anadwe, na ɔsee no dɛ, Sɛ mbanyin no ba behyia wo a, Soɛr, nye hɔn nkɔ; mbom dza meka mekyerɛ wo no nko na yɛ. 21Na Balaam soɛɛr anapa no, na ɔhyehyɛɛ n’asoasopɔnkɔ, na ɔnye Moab mbapɔmba no kɔree.
Balaam N’asoasopɔnkɔ Gye No Nkwa
22Na Nyankopɔn n’ebufuw dzɛwee dɛ ɔkɔree: na EWURADZE bɔfoe begyinaa ɔkwan no do dɛ ɔyɛfo bi a otsia no. Na ɔnodze ɔtse n’asoaso do reba, na no nkowaa beenu ka no ho. 23Na asoaso no hun EWURADZE no bɔfoe no dɛ ogyina ɔkwan no mu, ɔatwe ne nkrantsee kitsa ne nsamu: na asoaso no danee fii ɔkwan no mu faa nkyɛn, na ɔkɔr haban mu: na Balaam bɔɔ asoaso no dɛ ɔdze redan no aba ɔkwan mu. 24Nna EWURADZE no bɔfoe no kegyinaa wenyin nture ntamu ɔkwan tokur bi mu, ban wɔ afa ha, na ban wɔ afa ha. 25Na asoaso no hun EWURADZE no bɔfoe no, na ɔdze noho miaa ɔfadum no ho, na ɔdze Balaam n’anan miaa ɔfadum no: na ɔbɔɔ no bio. 26Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe no kɔr kan, na okegyinaa beebi a ɔmoa, mbrɛ ɔkwan bi nnyi a wɔdan fa enyimfa anaa abankum. 27Na asoaso no hun EWURADZE no bɔfoe no, na obutuuw famu wɔ Balaam n’ase: na Balaam n’ebufuw dzɛwee, na ɔdze n’abaa bɔɔ asoaso no. 28Na EWURADZE buee asoaso no ano, na ɔsee Balaam dɛ, Ebɛnadze na mayɛ wo, na abɔ me mpɛn ebiasa yi? 29Na Balaam see asoaso no dɛ, Osiandɛ esi me atwetwe: kɛtseankyɛ nkrantsee kitsa me nsamu, nkyɛ sisei meku wo. 30Na asoaso no see Balaam dɛ, Ana nnyɛ w’asoaso nye me a atsena mo do wo nkwa tsentsen nyinara dze ebodu ndɛ da yi? Ana menya wo dɛm nyɛe pɛn? Na ɔsee dɛ, Oho. 31Nna EWURADZE buee Balaam n’enyiwa, na ohun EWURADZE no bɔfoe no dɛ ogyina ɔkwan no mu, wɔatwe ne nkrantsee kitsa ne nsamu: na ɔbɔɔ ne tsir adze, na ɔdze n’enyim butuuw famu. 32Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe no see no dɛ, Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na abɔ w’asoaso mpɛn ebiasa yi? Hwɛ, emi na mefir edzi abɛyɛ wo ɔyɛfo osiandɛ wo kwan no akyea wɔ m’enyim: 33na asoaso no hun me, na ɔdanee fii m’enyim mpɛn ebiasa yi: sɛ wɔanndan emmfi m’enyim dze a, nkyɛ wo so sisei meku wo, na magye no nkwa. 34Na Balaam see EWURADZE no bɔfoe no dɛ, Mayɛ bɔn; na minnyim dɛ ɔwo na igyinaa ɔkwan no mu tsiaa me: dɛm ntsi afei, sɛ emmpɛ a, mebɛsan m’ekyir bio. 35Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe no see Balaam dɛ, Nye mbanyin no nkɔ: na mbom asɛm a mebɛka makyerɛ wo no nko na ka. Nna Balaam nye Balak mbapɔmba no kɔree. 36Na aber a Balak tsee dɛ Balaam reba no, ofiir edzi kehyiaa no wɔ Moab Kurow a ɔda Arnon ntoaado a ɔwɔ ntoaado ano no. 37Na Balak see Balaam dɛ, Ana nnyɛ enyiberdo ara na mosomaa dɛ wombehyia wo ma bra? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ammba me nkyɛn? Egye dzi dɛ murunntum mennhyɛ wo enyimnyam a? 38Na Balaam see Balak dɛ, Hwɛ, maba wo nkyɛn: ana afei mowɔ tum biara a medze meka asɛm bi? Asɛm a Nyankopɔn dze bɛhyɛ m’anomu no, ɔno na mebɛka. 39Na Balaam nye Balak kɔree, na wɔbaa Kiriat-huzoth. 40Na Balak dze anantwi nye nguan bɔɔ okum afɔr, na ɔdze kɛmaa Balaam nye mbapɔmba a wɔnye no wɔ hɔ no. 41Na ɔbaa dɛ anapa no, Balak faa Balaam, na ɔdze no fowee kɔr Baal ne mbea sorɔnsorɔm no do, na ofi hɔ hun ɔman no ano.

Title: NKANEE 23
Content:
Balaam Ne Nkɔnhyɛ a Odzi Kan
1Na Balaam see Balak dɛ, Sisi afɔrmbukyia esuon ma me wɔ ha, na siesie anantwisaa esuon nye nguannyin esuon ma me wɔ ha. 2Na Balak yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Balaam kae no; na Balak nye Balaam dze ɔnantwisaa kor nye oguannyin kor bobɔɔ afɔr wɔ afɔrmbukyia biara do. 3Na Balaam see Balak dɛ, Gyina wo hyew afɔr no ho, na monkɔ, anyanyanbiara EWURADZE bɛba ebehyia me a: na biribiara a ɔdze bɛkyerɛ me no mebɛka makyerɛ wo. Na osii mu kɔr sorɔnsorɔm pataa bi do. 4Na Nyankopɔn behyiaa Balaam: na Balaam see no dɛ, Mesiesie afɔrmbukyia esuon no, na medze ɔnantwisaa nye oguannyin nkorkor abobɔ afɔr wɔ afɔrmbukyia biara do. 5Na EWURADZE dze asɛm hyɛɛ Balaam anomu, see dɛ, San kɔ Balak nkyɛn, na dza ka nye yi. 6Na ɔsanee kɔr ne nkyɛn, na, hwɛ, ogyina ne hyew afɔr no ho, ɔno nye Moab mbapɔmba no nyinara. 7Na ɔkasaa no abɛbu mu see dɛ,
Aram na Balak kɛfaa me bae,
Moabhen no faa me fi Boka mbepɔw no mu dɛ:
Bra, bɛpaa Jakob ma me,
Na bra, bɛhyɛ Israel enyimguase.
8Meyɛ dɛn na mepaa nyia Nyame mmpaa no?
Na meyɛ dɛn na mehyɛ nyia EWURADZE nnhyɛɛ no enyimguase?
9Abotan etsifi na mifi muhun no,
Na akoko do na mifi megyeen no:
Hwɛ, ɔman a no nko bɛtsena a,
Na worummbu no mmfora amanaman.
10Woana botum akan Jakob huntuma,
Anaa Israel ebupɛn anan mu kor no dodow?
Ma munwu ɔtseneneenyi wu,
Na ma m’ewiei nyɛ dɛ nedze!
11Na Balak see Balaam dɛ, Ebɛnadze na edze ayɛ me yi? Mekɛfaa wo dɛ bɔdom m’atamfo, na, hwɛ, ehyira hɔn koraa. 12Na obuae see dɛ, Ana onnhia dɛ mohwɛ yie na meka dza EWURADZE dze hyɛɛ m’anomu no bi a?
Balaam Ne Nkɔnhyɛ A Otsia Ebien
13Na Balak see no dɛ, Mepa wo kyɛw, bra ma yɛnkɔ beebi fofor, mbrɛ ifi bohu hɔn; ibohu hɔn ano nko, na innkohu hɔn nyinara: na paa hɔn ma me wɔ hɔ. 14Na ɔfaa no kɔr Zofim haban mu, wɔ Pisga etsifi, na osisii mbukyia esuon, na ɔdze ɔnantwisaa, nye oguannyin bobɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr wɔ afɔrmbukyia biara do. 15Na ɔsee Balak dɛ, Gyina wo hyew afɔr ho ha, ber a mirikehyia EWURADZE wɔ enyim noho yi. 16Na EWURADZE behyiaa Balaam, na ɔdze asɛm hyɛɛ n’anomu, see dɛ, San kɔ Balak nkyɛn, na mbrɛ ka nye yi. 17Na ɔbaa ne nkyɛn, na, hwɛ, ogyina ne hyew afɔr no ho, na Moab mbapɔmba ka no ho. Na Balak see no dɛ, EWURADZE aka dɛn? 18Na ɔkasaa abɛbu mu see dɛ,
Soɛr, Balak, na tsie;
Yɛ aso ma me, Zipor babanyin:
19 Nyankopɔn nnyɛ nyimpa, na oeedzi ator;
Anaaso nyimpa ba, na oeenu noho:
Ana ɔase, na ɔrennyɛ?
Ana ɔakasa, na ɔremma onntsim?
20Hwɛ, nhyira ho mbra na menya:
Na oehyira, na murunntum menndan enyi.
21Onnhun emumuyɛ wɔ Jakob mu,
Nkyii so onnhun nkontompɔ wɔ Israel mu:
EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn nye no wɔ hɔ,
Na ɔhen ho esebɔ wɔ hɔn mu.
22Nyame eyi hɔn wɔ Egypt;
Ɔwɔ ahoɔdzen dɛ ɔnantwi bɔyafo.
23Ampaara nkaber bi nnyi Jakob mu,
Nkyii so ebisa bi nnyi Israel mu:
Afei na wɔbɛka no wɔ Jakob nye Israel ho dɛ,
Ebɛnadze na Nyame ayɛ yi!
24Hwɛ, ɔman no soɛr dɛ ogyataber,
Na ɔma noho do dɛ ogyata:
Orummbutuw gyedɛ oedzi afonam,
Na ɔanom ɔtɔfo bɔgyaa ana.
25Na Balak see Balaam dɛ, Mpaa na eremmpaa hɔn a, na nhyira so innhyira hɔn. 26Na Balaam buae na ɔsee Balak dɛ, Ana mannka mannkyerɛ wo dɛ, dza EWURADZE bɛka no nyinara, nna mebɛyɛ?
Balaam No Nkɔnhyɛ A Otsia Ebiasa
27Na Balak see Balaam dɛ, Afei bra, ma memfa wo monkɔ beebi fofor; anyanyanbiara ɔbɔsɔ Nyankopɔn enyi ma efi hɔ adom hɔn ama me. 28Na Balak faa Balaam kɔr Peor etsifi a ɔhwɛ sar pradada no enyi no. 29Na Balaam see Balak dɛ, Sisi afɔrmbukyia esuon ma me wɔ ha, na siesie anantwisaa esuon nye nguannyin esuon ma me wɔ ha. 30Na Balak yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Balaam see no, na ɔdze ɔnantwisaa nye oguannyin bobɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr wɔ afɔrmbukyia biara do.

Title: NKANEE 24
Content:
1Na aber a Balaam hun dɛ asɔ EWURADZE enyi dɛ ohyira Israel no, ɔannkɔ ebisa bio, dɛ nkan no, mbom ɔdze n’enyi kedzii sar no do. 2Na Balaam maa n’enyi do, na ohun Israel dɛ wogu hɔ dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusuakuw ebusuakuw tsetsee; na Nyankopɔn sunsum baa no do. 3Na ɔkasae see dɛ,
Beor babanyin Balaam se dɛ,
Ɔbanyin a n’enyi hu adze yie no se dɛ:
4Nyia otsie Nyame ne nsɛm no,
Nyia ohu Twerammpon enyido adze no,
Ɔrohwe ase a, wɔtseew n’enyi do no, ɔse dɛ:
5Ao Jakob, mbrɛ wo tsenabea dua yɛ fɛw a,
Wo ntamadan no, Ao Israel!
6Wɔtserɛw dɛ mbɔnsa,
Dɛ esutsen ho nture,
Dɛ alɔe ndua a EWURADZE atsetsɛw,
Dɛ nsu ho kyindur ndua.
7No mbokitsi mu nsu bobu do,
Na n’asefo bɛtsena nsu pii mu,
Na ne hen bɔkrɔn asen Agag,
Na wɔbɛma n’ahendzi do.
8Nyame eyi no efi Egypt;
Ɔwɔ ahoɔdzen dɛ ɔnantwi bɔyafo:
Ɔbɛmen amanaman a wɔyɛ n’atamfo,
Na woebubu hɔn mbiew esinesin,
Na ɔdze n’egyen menaba ehwirahwira hɔn mu.
9Ɔkotowee, ɔdaa famu dɛ ogyata,
Na dɛ ogyataber; woana na obopusuw no?
Nhyira nka obiara a ohyira wo,
Na mpaa nka obiara a ɔpaa wo.
Balak Gya Balaam Kwan
10Na Balak n’ebufuw dzɛɛw Balaam do, na ɔbɔɔ ne nsamu: na Balak see Balaam dɛ, Mibehyiaa wo dɛ bɛpaa m’atamfo, na, hwɛ, ɔwo ehyira hɔn mpɛn ebiasa nye yi. 11Dɛm ntsi afei guan kɔ mbrɛ ifi: modween dɛ nkyɛ mebɛhyɛ wo enyimnyam kɛse; na, hwɛ, EWURADZE esiw w’enyimnyam ho kwan. 12Na Balaam see Balak dɛ, Ana mannka annkyerɛ w’abɔfoe a esomaa hɔn me nkyɛn no so dɛ, 13 Sɛ Balak dze dwetɛ nye sika ne fi ma mpo bɛma me a, murunntum mummbu EWURADZE n’asɛm do mommbɔ me tsir mu nnkɛyɛ papa anaa bɔn: dza EWURADZE bɛka no, ɔno na mebɛka? 14Na afei, hwɛ, morokɔ me man mu: bra, na memma hu dza ɔman yi dze bɛyɛ wo man wɔ nda a odzi ekyir no mu. 15Na obuu no bɛ see dɛ,
Beor babanyin Balaam se dɛ,
Ɔbanyin a n’enyi emua no se dɛ:
16Nyia otsie Nyame ne nsɛm no,
Na onyim Abɔso no ho nyimdzee no,
Nyia ohu Twerammpon enyido adze no,
Ɔrohwe ase a, wɔtseew n’enyi do no ɔse dɛ:
17Muhu no, nnyɛ sesei dze a:
Mohwɛ no, ɔmmbɛn dze:
Nworaba bi fi Jakob mu bopue,
Na ahempoma befi Israel mu asoɛr,
Na wɔabɔ afa Moab nkukuwa mu,
Na wɔadwerew ɔko mba gyigyeegye no nyinara.
18Na Edom bɛyɛ adzenyadze,
Seir so a wɔyɛ n’atamfo bɛyɛ n’adzenyadze;
Na Israel bɛyɛ mbanyindze ara.
19Na obi fi Jakob mu bedzi tum,
Na ɔasɛɛ kurow no mu dza aka no.
20Na ɔhwɛɛ Amalek, na ɔsɔɔw ne kasaa no do see dɛ
Amalek nye amanaman mu odzikamfo;
Na n’ewiei bowie no ɔsɛɛ mu.
21Na ɔhwɛɛ Kennyi, na ɔkasaa bio see dɛ,
Wo tsenabew si hɔ pintsinn,
Na wɔdze wo berɛbuw ahyɛ ɔbotan mu.
22Naaso Kain bɔhwer,
Ekodu dɛ Assur bɛfa wo ndɔmmum.
23Na owiee ne kasaa no obuu no bɛ see dɛ,
Ebei, Nyame reyɛ iyi no woana bɛtsena ase?
24Na ahɛn befi Kittim mbew do aba,
Na wɔabɛhaw Assur, na wɔahaw Eber,
Na ɔnoara so ewie no ɔsɛɛ mu.
25Na Balaam soɛree, na osii mu sanee kɔr ne tsenabew: na Balak so faa no kwan kɔree.

Title: NKANEE 25
Content:
Israelmba Hɔn Edwamambɔ Na Abosonsɔr
1Na Israel tsenaa Sittim, na ɔman no hyɛɛ ase nye Moab mbabaa no yɛɛ ehuhudze: 2na wohyiahyiaa ɔman no kɔr hɔn enyame okum afɔr ho; na ɔman no dzidzii, na wɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze maa hɔn enyame no. 3Na Israel dze noho bɔɔ Baal-peor ho: na EWURADZE ebufuw dzɛɛw Israel do. 4Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ, Fa ɔman no mu etsitsir nyinara, na sensɛn hɔn ma EWURADZE wɔ ewia do, ma EWURADZE ebufuhyew no ndan mfi Israel do. 5Na Moses see Israel atsɛmbuafo no dɛ, Hom mu obiara nkuku ne mbanyin a wɔdze hɔnho akɔbɔ Baal-peor ho no. 6Na, hwɛ, Israelmba no mu kor dze Midiannyi ɔbaa bi baa no nuanom no nkyɛn wɔ Moses n’enyim, nye Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara enyim, aber a worususu wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano. 7Na aber a ɔsɔfo Aaron ne babanyin Eleazar, ne babanyin Finehas, hunii no, ɔsoɛree fii mboanofo no mu, na ɔfaa nkambaa kitsaa ne nsamu; 8na odzii Israelnyi no ekyir kɔr pia no mu, na ɔdze wowɔɔ hɔn beenu nyina hwira hwiraa hɔn mu, Israelnyi no, nye ɔbaa no ohwiraa no fur mu. Nna ɔyardɔm no siankae fii Israelmba no do. 9Na hɔn a wowuwui wɔ ɔyardɔm no mu no wɔyɛ mpemeduonu anan.
10Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 11Ɔsɔfo Aaron ne babanyin Eleazar, ne babanyin Finehas, adan m’ebufuw efi Israelmba do, wɔ dɛ ɔatwe me nyinkuntwe no nyinkun wɔ hɔn mu, ma mannhyew Israelmba no wɔ me nyinkuntwe mu. 12Dɛm ntsi se dɛ, Hwɛ, medze m’asomdwee ahyɛmu mema no: 13ɔnyɛ ɔno, nye n’asefo a wobedzi n’ekyir no daa asɔfodzi ahyɛmu; osiandɛ ɔatwe ne Nyankopɔn ho nyinkun, na ɔapata ama Israelmba no. 14Na Israelnyi no a wokum no no, nyia wokum no kaa Midiannyi ɔbaa no ho no, ne dzin dze Zimri, Salu ne babanyin a, ɔyɛ Simeonfo egyanom ofi mu ɔbapɔmba. 15Na Midiannyi ɔbaa no a wokum no no, ne dzin dze Kozbi, Zur a ɔyɛ otsitsir wɔ Midian egyanom ofi bi mu nkorɔfo do no, ne babaa a.
16Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 17Hom nhiahia Midianfo no ho, na hom nku hɔn: 18osiandɛ hɔn so wɔdze hɔn ndaadaa a wɔdze tseetsee hom wɔ Peor ho asɛm no mu, nye hɔn akyerɛbaa Kozbi, Midian ɔsafohen no ne babaa no a wokum no wɔ ɔyardɔm da no mu wɔ Peor ho asɛm no mu no, ehiahia hom ho.

Title: NKANEE 26
Content:
Wɔkan Israelmba
1Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhaw no ekyir no, EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye ɔsɔfo Aaron ne babanyin Eleazar dɛ, 2Hom nkan Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara, ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu do dze rokɔ no, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee, hɔn a wotum ɔsa kɔ wɔ Israel nyinara. 3Na Moses nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar nye hɔn kasae wɔ Moab tɛtɛr mu wɔ Jeriko Jordan nkyɛn dɛ, 4Hom nkan ɔman no, ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu do dze rokɔ no; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses nye Israelmba a wofi Egypt asaase do bae no.
5Reuben, Israel n’abakan no: Reuben ne mbabanyin; Hanok dze, Hanokfo ebusua: Pallu dze, Pallufo ebusua: 6Hezron dze, Hezronfo ebusua: Karmi dze, Karmifo ebusua. 7Iyinom nye Reubenfo ebusua ebusua: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu wɔyɛ mpemeduanan ebiasa nye ahaesuon eduasa. 8Na Pallu ne ba; Eliab. 9Na Eliab ne mbabanyin; Nemuel, nye Datan, nye Abiram. Iyinom nye Datan, nye Abiram no a wɔfrɛɛ hɔn wɔ mboanofo no mu no a wɔhaam Moses nye Aaron ho wɔ Kora no kuw no mu, wɔ aber a wɔhaam EWURADZE ho: 10na asaase buee n’ano, na ɔmemeen hɔn dze kaa Kora ho, aber a kuw no wuwui no; wɔ aber a ogya memeen nyimpa ahaenu eduonum, dze yɛɛ asɛnkyerɛdze no. 11Naaso Kora ne mbabanyin no dze, woennwuwu.
12Simeon ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua tsetsee: Nemuel dze, Nemuelfo ebusua: Jamin dze, Jaminfo ebusua: Jakin dze, Jakinfo ebusua: 13Zera dze, Zerafo ebusua: Saul dze, Saulfo ebusua. 14Iyinom nye Simeonfo ebusua, mpemeduonu ebien nye ahaenu.
15Gad ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua tsetsee: Zefon dze, Zefonfo ebusua: Hagi dze, Hagifo ebusua: Suni dze, Sunifo ebusua: 16Ozni dze, Oznifo ebusua: Eri dze, Erifo ebusua: 17Arod dze, Arodfo ebusua: Areli dze, Arelifo ebusua. 18Iyinom nye Gad ne mbabanyin ebusua ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu tse, mpemeduanan nye ahaenum.
19Juda ne mbabanyin, Er nye Onan: na Er nye Onan wowui wɔ Keenan asaase do. 20Na Juda ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua tsetsee nye yi; Sela dze, Selafo ebusua: Perez dze, Perezfo ebusua: Zera dze, Zerafo ebusua. 21Na Perez ne mbabanyin nye yi; Hezron dze, Hezronfo ebusua: Hamul dze, Hamulfo ebusua. 22Iyinom nye Juda ebusua ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu tse, mpemeduosuon esia nye ahaenum.
23Isakar ne mbabanyin: Tola dze, Tolafo ebusua: Puva dze, Punifo ebusua: 24Jasub dze, Jasubfo ebusua: Simron dze, Simronfo ebusua. 25Iyinom nye Isakar ebusua ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu tse, mpemeduosia anan nye ahaasa.
26Zebulun ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Sered dze, Seredfo ebusua: Elon dze, Elonfo ebusua: Jahleel dze, Jahleelfo ebusua. 27Iyinom nye Zebulunfo ebusua ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu tse, mpemeduosia nye ahaenum.
28Josef ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Manaasɛ nye Efraim. 29Manaasɛ ne mbabanyin: Makir dze, Makirfo ebusua: na Makir woo Gilead: Gilead dze, Gileadfo ebusua. 30Iyinom nye Gilead ne mbabanyin: Iezer dze, Iezerfo ebusua: Helek dze, Helekfo ebusua: 31na Asriel dze, Asrielfo ebusua: na Sekem dze, Sekemfo ebusua: 32na Semida dze, Semidafo ebusua: na Hefer dze, Heferfo ebusua. 33Na Hefer ne babanyin Zelofehad ennya mbabanyin, na onyaa mbabaa: na Zelofehad ne mbabaa edzin nye Mahala, nye Noa, Hogla, Milka, nye Tirza. 34Iyinom nye Manaasɛ ebusua: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu wɔyɛ mpemeduonum ebien nye ahaesuon.
35Iyinom nye Efraim ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Sutela dze, Sutelafo ebusua: Beker dze, Bekerfo ebusua: Tahan dze, Tahanfo ebusua. 36Na iyinom nye Sutela ne mbabanyin: Eran dze, Eranfo ebusua. 37Iyinom nye Efraim ne mbabanyin ebusua ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu tse, mpemeduasa ebien nye ahaenum. Iyinom nye Josef ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua tsetsee.
38Benjamin ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Bela dze, Belafo ebusua: Asbel dze, Asbelfo ebusua: Ahiram dze, Ahiramfo ebusua: 39Sefufam dze, Sufafo ebusua: Hufam dze, Hufamfo ebusua. 40Na Bela ne mbabanyin nye Ard nye Naaman: Ard dze, Ardfo ebusua: Naaman dze, Naamanfo ebusua. 41Iyinom nye Benjamin ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu wɔyɛ mpemeduanan enum nye ahaesia.
42Iyinom nye Dan ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Suham dze, Suhamfo ebusua. Iyinom nye Dan ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee. 43Suhamfo ebusua nyinara, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu tse, wɔyɛ mpemeduosia anan nye ahaanan.
44Aser ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Imna dze, Imnafo ebusua: Isvi dze, Isvifo ebusua: Beria dze, Beriafo ebusua. 45Beria ne mbabanyin dze: Heber dze, Heberfo ebusua: Malkiel dze, Malkielfo ebusua. 46Na Aser ne babaa ne dzin dze Sera. 47Iyinom nye Aser ne mbabanyin ebusua ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu tse, mpemeduonum ebiasa nye ahaanan.
48Naftali ne mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Jahzeel dze, Jahzeelfo ebusua: Guni dze, Gunifo ebusua: 49Jezer dze, Jezerfo ebusua: Sillem dze, Sillemfo ebusua. 50Iyinom nye Naftali ebusua dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu wɔyɛ mpemeduanan enum nye ahaanan.
51Iyinom nye hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Israelmba mu, mpemahaesia nye kor ahaesuon eduasa.
Asaase No Ne Nkyɛɛ Ho Nhyehyɛɛ
52Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 53Iyinom na wɔnkyɛ asaase no mma hɔn dɛ egyapadze dɛ mbrɛ edzin no no dodow tse. 54Nyia ɔso no ma no egyapadze a ɔso, na nyia osuar no ma no egyapadze a osuar: obiara dɛ mbrɛ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn no mu tse no na wɔmfa n’egyapadze mma no. 55Naaso asaase no wɔmfa tonto nkyɛ: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom ebusuakuw ebusuakuw edzin tsetsee no na wonnya egyapadze no. 56Dɛ mbrɛ tonto no tse no na wɔmfa nkyɛ hɔn egyapadze no mma hɔn a wɔso nye hɔn a wosuar.
Levifo Ebusua
57Na iyinom nye hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ Levifo mu dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: Gerson dze, Gersonfo ebusua: Kohat dze, Kohatfo ebusua: Merari dze, Merarifo ebusua. 58Iyinom nye Levi ebusua ebusua: Libnifo ebusua, Hebronfo ebusua, Mahilifo ebusua, Korafo ebusua. Na Kohat woo Amram. 59Na Amram ne yer dzin dze Jokebed, Levi ne babaa a wɔwoo no ma Levi wɔ Egypt no a: na ɔwoo Aaron nye Moses nye hɔn akyerɛbaa Miriam maa Amram. 60Na Aaron so wɔwoo Nadab nye Abihu, Eleazar nye Itamar maa no. 61Na Nadab nye Abihu wuwui, wɔ aber a wɔdze ananagya baa EWURADZE enyim no. 62Na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu wɔyɛ mpemeduonu ebiasa, banyin biara a oedzi bosoom nye ekyir no: na wɔannkan hɔn ammfora Israelmba, osiandɛ wɔamma hɔn egyapadze wɔ Israelmba no mu.
Kaleb Na Josua
63Iyinom nye hɔn a Moses nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar kaan hɔn no; hɔn a wɔkaan Israelmba wɔ Moab tɛtɛr mu wɔ Jeriko Jordan ho no a. 64Na iyinom mu dze ɔbanyin biara nnyi mu a ofi hɔn a Moses nye ɔsɔfo Aaron kaan hɔn wɔ aber a wɔkaan Israelmba wɔ Sinai sar do no mu. 65Na EWURADZE aka no wɔ hɔn ho dɛ, Owu na wobowuwu wɔ sar no do. Na hɔn mu nyimpa biara annka, gyedɛ Jefune ne babanyin Kaleb, nye Nun ne babanyin Josua.

Title: NKANEE 27
Content:
Zelofehad Mbabaa Ho Asɛm
1Nna Zelofehad, Hefer ne babanyin no, Gilead ne babanyin no Makir ne babanyin no, Manaasɛ ne babanyin no, ne mbabaa a wofi Josef ne babanyin Manaasɛ ebusua mu no, twee bɛnee: na ne babaa no hɔn edzin nye yi; Mahala, Noa, nye Hogla, nye Milka, nye Tirza. 2Na wobegyinaa Moses, nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar, nye mbapɔmba no nye mboanofo no nyinara enyim, wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano dɛ, 3Hɛn egya wui wɔ sar no do, nna onnyi kuw no a wohyiahyiaa hɔnho dze tsiaa EWURADZE wɔ Kora kuw no mu no mu: mbom owui wɔ nankasa no bɔn mu: na oennya mbabanyin. 4Ebɛnadze ntsi na hɛn egya ne dzin mpepa mfi n’ebusua mu, dɛ oennya ɔbanyin ntsi? Ma hɛn egyapadze wɔ hɛn egya no nuanom mu. 5Na Moses dze hɔn asɛm no baa EWURADZE enyim. 6Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 7Zelofehad ne mbabaa no aka no tsenn: ɔma na ma hɔn egyapadze wɔ hɔn egya no nuanom mu; na ma hɔn egya n’egyapadze no nkɔ hɔn hɔ. 8Na kasa kyerɛ Israelmba dɛ, Sɛ ɔbanyin bi wu, na onnyi ɔbabanyin a, ɔno hom mma n’egyapadze nkɔ ne babaa hɔ. 9Na sɛ onnyi ɔbabaa a, ɔno hom mfa n’egyapadze mma no nuanom. 10Na sɛ onnyi nuanom a, ɔno hom mfa n’egyapadze mma n’egya no nuanom. 11Na sɛ n’egya nnyi nuanom a, ɔno hom mfa n’egyapadze mma no bɔgyaa a ɔbɛn no wɔ n’ebusua mu, na ɔmfa: na iyi nyɛ atsɛmbu ahyɛdze mma Israelmba, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no.
Wɔpa Josua Dɛ Israel Kandzifo
(Deuteronomi 31.1-8)
12Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ, Fow Abarim bepɔw yi, na kɔhwɛ asaase a medze ama Israelmba no. 13Na sɛ inya hu a, wo so akɛka wo nkorɔfo ho, dɛ mbrɛ wo nua Aaron akɛka hɔn ho no: 14osiandɛ hom yɛɛ asoɔdzen wɔ m’asɛm ho wɔ Zin sar do, wɔ mboanofo ham no mu, dɛ nkyɛ hom tsew mo ho wɔ nsu no ho wɔ hɔn enyim. (Iyi nye Meriba nsu no wɔ Kades wɔ Sin sar do no.) 15Na Moses kasaa kyerɛɛ EWURADZE dɛ, 16Ma EWURADZE, honam nyinara esunsum Nyankopɔn, nhwehwɛ ɔbanyin bi nsi mboanofo no do a 17obedzi hɔn enyim efir edzi, na obedzi hɔn enyim aba mu a obegya hɔn epue, na ɔdze hɔn bɛba mu; amma EWURADZE no mboanofo aannyɛ dɛ nguan a wonnyi oguanhwɛfo. 18Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ, Fa Josua, Nun ne babanyin no, ɔbanyin a sunsum no wɔ no mu no, na fa wo nsa gu no do; 19na fa no gyina ɔsɔfo Eleazar, nye mboanofo no nyinara enyim; na hyɛ no mbra wɔ hɔn enyim. 20Na fa w’enyimnyam no bi ma no, ma Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara ntsie no. 21Na onkegyina ɔsɔfo Eleazar enyim, ɔno na obebisa Urim a ase nye kan no, atsɛmbu ama no wɔ EWURADZE enyim: na n’asɛm do na womfir edzi, na n’asɛm do na wɔmbra mu, ɔno nye Israelmba nyinara a wɔka no ho nyina, mekyerɛ mboanofo no nyinara. 22Na Moses yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ no no nyinara: na ɔfaa Josua, na ɔdze no kegyinaa ɔsɔfo Eleazar, nye mboanofo no nyinara enyim: 23na ɔdze ne nsa guu no do, na ɔhyɛɛ no mbra, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE nam Moses do kae no.

Title: NKANEE 28
Content:
Daa Afɔrbɔ Ho Nhyehyɛɛ
(Eksodɔs 29.38-46)
1Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 2Hyɛ Israelmba no, na se hɔn dɛ, M’ayɛyɛdze, me gya afɔr edziban a oyi nka huanhuam ma me no, hom ndwen do mfa mbrɛ me wɔ ne ber mu. 3Na se hɔn dɛ, Ogya afɔr a hom mfa mbrɛ EWURADZE nye yi; nguambaanyin a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm, na wɔmfa ebien da kor mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr daa. 4Eguambaa kor na fa bɔ afɔr anapa na eguambaa kor so fa bɔ afɔr ewimbir; 5na fa isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu kor yɛ edziban afɔr a wɔdze ngo a woesiw hin ebupɛn anan mu kor afrɔw. 6Ɔyɛ daa afɔr a wɔhyehyɛe wɔ bepɔw Sinai do a oyi nka huanhuam a ɔyɛ ogya afɔr ma EWURADZE. 7Na no nom afɔr wɔ eguambaa kor ho nyɛ hin ebupɛn anan mu kor: na bea krɔnkrɔn no do na hue ɔnom afɔr nsadzen no ma EWURADZE. 8Na eguambaa kor no so fa bɔ afɔr ewimbir no: dɛ mbrɛ anapa edziban afɔr no tse, na mbrɛ no nom afɔr no tse no, na fa bɔ ne gya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam ma EWURADZE.
Ahomgyeda Afɔrbɔ Ho Nhyehyɛɛ
