9Na ahomgyeda no nguambaanyin ebien a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm, nye edziban afɔr isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu ebien a wɔdze ngo afrɔw nye no nom afɔr: 10iyi nye ahomgyeda biara ne hyew afɔr a ɔka daa ɔhyew afɔr, nye no nom afɔr ho.
11Na hom abosoom ahyɛse no hom mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr mma EWURADZE; anantwisaa mburwa ebien, nye oguannyin kor, nguambaanyin esuon a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm; 12na edziban afɔr isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu ebiasa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw, nka ɔnantwisaa kor ho; na edziban afɔr isiam pa ebupɛn du mu ebien a wɔdze ngo afrɔw nka oguannyin kor no ho; 13na edziban afɔr isiam pa ebupɛn du mu nkorkor a wɔdze ngo afrɔw, nka eguambaa biara ho; nyɛ ɔhyew afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam, ogya afɔr mma EWURADZE. 14Na no nom afɔr nyɛ wenyin hin ɔfa nka ɔnantwisaa kor ho, na hin ebupɛn ebiasa mu kor nka oguannyin no ho, na hin ebupɛn anan mu kor nka eguambaa kor ho: iyi nye bosoom biara ne hyew afɔr wɔ afrenhyia abosoom no nyina mu. 15Na wɔmfa apɔnkyenyin kor mbɔ bɔn ho afɔr mma EWURADZE; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr no, nye no nom afɔr no ho.
Apaho Afahyɛ Afɔrbɔ Ho Nhyehyɛɛ
(Levitikɔs 23.5-22)
16Na bosoom a odzi kan no mu, bosoom no ne da a otsia duanan no, ɔyɛ EWURADZE apaho. 17Na bosoom no ara ne da a otsia duenum no, nyɛ afahyɛ da: nda esuon na wondzi epitsi boodoo. 18Da a odzi kan no nyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn; mma mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara: 19mbom hom mbɔ ogya afɔr, ɔhyew afɔr mma EWURADZE; anantwisaa mburwa ebien, nye oguannyin kor, nye nguambaanyin esuon a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia: wɔnyɛ dza wonndzii dzɛm mma hom: 20nye n’edziban afɔr, isiam pa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw: ebupɛn du mu ebiasa na hom mfa nka ɔnantwisaa kor ho, na ebupɛn du mu ebien nka oguannyin no ho mbra; 21ebupɛn du mu nkorkor na fa ka nguambaa esuon no mu eguambaa biara ho bra; 22na bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor, ma wɔmfa mpata mma hom. 23Hom nyɛ iyinom nka anapa ɔhyew afɔr a ɔyɛ daa ɔhyew afɔr no ho. 24Dɛm yi ara na hom nyɛ ogya afɔr edziban a oyi nka huanhuam ma EWURADZE no, daa daa, nda esuon: wɔnyɛ nka daa ɔhyew afɔr no, na no nom afɔr no ho. 25Na da a otsia esuon no hom nyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn; mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara.
26Eso nduadzewakan da no mu, sɛ hom dze edziban fofor afɔr rebrɛ EWURADZE wɔ hom adapɛn afahyɛ mu a, hom nyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn; mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara: 27mbom hom mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE; anantwisaa mburwa ebien, oguannyin kor, nguambaanyin esuon a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia; 28na n’edziban afɔr, isiam pa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw, ebupɛn du mu ebiasa nka ɔnantwisaa kor ho, ebupɛn du mu ebien nka oguannyin kor no ho, 29ebupɛn du mu nkorkor nka eguambaa esuon no mu eguambaa biara ho; 30apɔnkyenyin kor, ma wɔmfa mpata mma hom. 31Hom nyɛ mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr no, nye n’edziban afɔr no, nye no nom afɔr no ho.

Title: NKANEE 29
Content:
Totorobɛnto Afahyɛ Afɔrbɔ Ho Nhyehyɛɛ
(Levitikɔs 23.23-25)
1Na bosoom a otsia esuon no mu, bosoom no ne da a odzi kan no, hom nyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn; mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen edwuma: ɔyɛ totorobɛntohɛn da ma hom. 2Na hom mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE; ɔnantwisaa eburwa kor, oguannyin kor, nguambaanyin esuon a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm; 3na n’edziban afɔr, isiam pa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw, ebupɛn du mu ebiasa nka oguannyin no ho, 4na ebupɛn du mu nkorkor nka eguambaa esuon no mu eguambaa biara ho: 5na bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor, ma wɔmfa mpata mma hom: 6mfa nka bosoom fofor ɔhyew afɔr, nye n’edziban afɔr, nye no nom afɔr ho, dɛ mbrɛ no ho mbra tsetsee, nyɛ ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE.
Akɔnkyen Afɔrbɔ Ho Nhyehyɛɛ
(Levitikɔs 23.26-32)
7Na bosoom a otsia esuon no ara mu da a otsia du no hom nyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn; na hom mfa akɔnkyen; eso mma hom nnyɛ edwuma biara: 8na hom mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE; ɔnantwisaa eburwa kor, oguannyin kor, nguambaanyin esuon a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia; a wonndzii dzɛm: 9na n’edziban afɔr, isiam pa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw, ebupɛn du mu ebiasa nka ɔnantwisaa no ho, ebupɛn du mu ebien nka oguannyin kor no ho, 10ebupɛn du mu nkorkor nka nguambaa esuon no mu eguambaa biara ho: 11bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka mpata bɔn ho afɔr, nye daa ɔhyew afɔr, nye n’edziban afɔr, nye no nom afɔr no ho.
12Na bosoom a otsia esuon no ne da a otsia duenum no hom nyɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn; mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara, na hom nhyɛ fa nda esuon mma EWURADZE. 13Hom mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr, ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE; anantwisaa mburwa duebiasa, nguannyin ebien, nguambaanyin duanan a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia; a wonndzii dzɛm: 14na n’edziban afɔr, isiam pa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw, ebupɛn du mu ebiasa ebiasa nkeka anantwisaa du ebiasa no mu ɔnantwisaa biara ho, ebupɛn du mu ebien ebien nkeka nguannyin ebien no mu kor ho, 15na ebupɛn du mu nkorkor nka nguambaa duanan no mu eguambaa biara ho: 16na bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr, n’edziban afɔr, nye no nom afɔr no ho.
17Na da a otsia ebien no hom mfa anantwisaa mburwa duebien, nguannyin ebien, nguambaanyin duanan a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm mbra: 18na n’edziban afɔr nye no nom afɔr nka anantwisaa, nguannyin nye nguambaa no ho, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dodow tse, wɔ mbra kwan: 19nye bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr, nye n’edziban afɔr, nye no nom afɔr no ho.
20Na da a otsia ebiasa no anantwisaa dubiako, nguannyin ebien, nguambaanyin duanan a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm; 21na n’edziban afɔr nye no nom afɔr nka anantwisaa, nguannyin, nye nguambaa no ho, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dodow tse, wɔ mbra kwan: 22nye bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr, nye n’edziban afɔr, nye no nom afɔr no ho.
23Na da a otsia anan no anantwisaa du, nguannyin ebien, nguambaanyin duanan a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm: 24n’edziban afɔr nye no nom afɔr nka anantwisaa, nguannyin, nye nguambaa no ho, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dodow tse, wɔ mbra kwan: 25nye bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr, n’edziban afɔr, nye no nom afɔr no ho.
26Na da a otsia enum no anantwisaa akron, nguannyin ebien, nguambaanyin duanan a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm: 27na n’edziban afɔr nye no nom afɔr nka anantwisaa, nguannyin, nye nguambaa no ho, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dodow tse, wɔmbra kwan: 28nye bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr, n’edziban afɔr, nye no nom afɔr no ho.
29Na da a otsia esia no anantwisaa awɔtwe, nguannyin ebien, nguambaanyin duanan a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm: 30na n’edziban afɔr nye no nom afɔr nka anantwisaa, nguannyin, nye nguambaa ho, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dodow tse, wɔ mbra kwan: 31nye bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr, n’edziban afɔr, nye no nom afɔr no ho.
32Na da a otsia esuon no anantwisaa esuon, nguannyin ebien, nguambaanyin duanan a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm: 33na n’edziban afɔr nye no nom afɔr nka anantwisaa, nguannyin, nye nguambaa no ho, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dodow tse, wɔ mbrɛ kwan: 34nye bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor; mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr, n’edziban afɔr, nye no nom afɔr no ho.
35Da a otsia awɔtwe no hom mbɔ ngua a no mu yɛ nwin: mma hom nnyɛ edwumadzen biara: 36mbom hom mbɔ ɔhyew afɔr, ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam mma EWURADZE: ɔnantwisaa kor, oguannyin kor, nguambaanyin esuon a woedzi afrenhyia afrenhyia a wonndzii dzɛm: 37n’edziban afɔr nye no nom afɔr nka ɔnantwisaa, oguannyin, nye nguambaa no ho, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dodow tse, wɔ kwan: 38nye bɔn ho afɔr apɔnkyenyin kor: mfa nka daa ɔhyew afɔr, nye edziban afɔr, nye no nom afɔr no ho.
39Iyinom na hom mfa mbrɛ EWURADZE wɔ hom afahyɛ a wɔahyehyɛ no mu, mfa nka hom anohobadze nye hom ayamuyi afɔr ho, wɔ hom ɔhyew afɔr, nye hom edziban afɔr, nye hom ɔnom afɔr, nye hom asomdwee afɔr mu. 40Na Moses kaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba no dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no nyinara.

Title: NKANEE 30
Content:
Anohoba Ho Mbra
1Na Moses kasaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba ebusuakuw ebusuakuw mu etsitsir no dɛ, Iyi nye adze a EWURADZE ahyɛ. 2Sɛ nyimpa bi bɔ EWURADZE anohoba, anaa ɔka ntam dze nkyehoma kyekyer ne kra a, mma ommbu n’asɛm do; ɔnyɛ dɛ mbrɛ dza ofi n’anomu nyinara tse. 3Eso sɛ ɔbaa bi bɔ anohoba ma EWURADZE, na ɔdze nkyehoma kyekyer noho wɔ n’egya fie, ne nkataasiaber mu; 4na n’egya tse n’anohoba, nye ne nkyehoma a ɔdze akyekyer ne kra, na n’egya ennsiw no kwam a: ɔno n’anohoba nyinara ntsim hɔ, na nkyehoma biara a ɔdze akyekyer ne kra no ntsim hɔ. 5Sɛ da a n’egya bɛtse no osiw no kwan dze a; ɔno n’anohoba, anaa ne nkyehoma a ɔdze akyekyer ne kra no mu biara rinntsim hɔ: na EWURADZE dze bɛkyɛ no, osiandɛ n’egya siiw no kwan. 6Na sɛ ɔwɔ kun, wɔ aber a n’anohoba, anaa n’anosɛm hurutuhurutu a ɔdze akyekyer ne kra no, wɔ no do no; 7na no kun tse, na da a ɔtsee no oennsiw no kwan a: ɔno n’anohoba no ntsim hɔ na ne nkyehoma a ɔdze akyekyer ne kra no ntsim hɔ. 8Sɛ no kun siw no kwan da a ɔtsee no dze a; ɔno ɔmma n’anohoba a ɔwɔ no do, nye n’anosɛm hurutuhurutu a ɔdze akyekyer ne kra no nyɛ kwa: na EWURADZE dze bɛkyɛr no. 9Na okunafo, anaa nyia woegyaa no awar no n’anohoba dze, mekyerɛ adze biara a ɔdze kyekyer ne kra no, otsim no do. 10Na sɛ ɔwɔ no kun fie na ɔbɔɔ anohoba, anaa ɔdze ntam dze nkyehoma kyekyeer ne kra, 11na no kun tsee, na ɔyɛɛ no komm, na oennsiw no kwan a; ɔno n’anohoba nyinara tsim hɔ, na nkyehoma biara a ɔdze akyekyer ne kra no tsim hɔ. 12Sɛ no kun no ma ɔyɛ kwa wɔ da a ɔtsee no dze a; ɔno biribiara a ofii n’anomu do wɔ n’anohoba ho, anaa ne kra nkyehoma ho no, rinntsim hɔ: no kun no ama ayɛ kwa; na EWURADZE dze bɛkyɛ no. 13Anohoba biara, nye ntam biara a wɔdze brɛ ɔkra adze no, no kun na ɔma otsintsim, anaa no kun na ɔma ɔyɛ kwa. 14Na sɛ no kun yɛ no komm koraa fi da to da a; ɔno otsintsim n’anohoba nyinara, anaa ne nkyehoma nyinara a ɔwɔ no do no: oetsintsim no, osiandɛ ɔyɛɛ no komm wɔ da a ɔtsee no. 15Sɛ ɔatse no ɔkyɛr ana ekyir no ɔama ayɛ kwa dze a; ɔno kun no nsoa yer no n’emumuyɛ. 16Iyinom nye ahyɛdze a EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses dɛ ɔnda banyin nye ne yer ntamu, ɔnda egya nye ne babaa a ɔwɔ ne nkataasiaber mu, wɔ n’egya fie ntamu.

Title: NKANEE 31
Content:
Wotu Midianfo Do Sa
1Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 2Dzi Midianfo wer ma Israelmba ho: na n’ekyir no akɛka wo nkorɔfo ho wɔ nsamankyir. 3Na Moses kasaa kyerɛɛ ɔman no dɛ, Hom mma hom mu mbanyin mmia mma ɔsa no, ama woeetu akɔ Midian do, na wɔmfa EWURADZE n’awerdzi nkɔ Midianfo do. 4Hom mma Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara mu, ebusuakuw biara mu nyimpa apem nkɔ ɔsa no. 5Nna woyiyii Israel mpempem mu mpemduebien a womiae maa ɔsa no, ebusuakuw biara mu apem. 6Na Moses somaa hɔn, ebusuakuw biara mu apem no, ma wɔkɔr ɔsa no, hɔn nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar ne babanyin Finehas ɔdze ahotseweebea ndzɛmba no na ewubɔ ntotorobɛnto no wɔ ne nsamu na wɔkɔr ɔsa no. 7Na wɔnye Midian kɔkoe dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no; na wokunkum mbanyin no nyinara. 8Na wokunkum Midian ahemfo no kaa hɔn atɔfo nkaa no ho. Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur, nye Reba Midian ahemfo beenum no; na wɔdze nkrantsee kum Beor ne babanyin Balaam so. 9Na Israelmba no faa Midian mbaa no nye hɔn mbofraba no ndɔmmum; na wɔfoom hɔn ofiembowa nyinara, nye hɔn nguankuw nyinara, nye hɔn ahodze nyinara. 10Na wɔdze ogya hyehyeew hɔn nkurow nyinara wɔ mbeambea a wɔtsetsee no, nye hɔn nseraban nyinara. 11Na wɔfaa asadze no nyinara, nye afonam no nyinara, nyimpa nye abowa nyina. 12Na wɔdze ndɔmmum no, nye afonam no, nye asadze no, brɛɛ Moses, nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar, nye Israel mboanofo no; wɔ nseraban no mu wɔ Moab tɛtɛr a ɔda Jeriko Jordan ho no do.
13Na Moses, nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar, nye mboanofo no mu mbapɔmba no nyinara fiir edzi kehyiaa hɔn wɔ nseraban no ekyir. 14Na Moses no bo fuuw dɔm no hɔn asafohemfo no, apem apem do asafohemfo nye ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo a wofi asayɛ bae no. 15Na Moses see hɔn dɛ, Ana hom agye mbaa no nyinara nkwa? 16Hwɛ, iyinom, na ɔnam Balaam apam do, wɔmaa Israel yɛɛ bɔn tsiaa EWURADZE wɔ Peor asɛm no mu, na ɔmaa ɔyardɔm baa EWURADZE no mboanofo mu no. 17Afei dɛm ntsi hom nkuku mbofraba no mu mbanyin nyinara, na wonku ɔbaa biara a oehu ɔbanyin dɛ ɔnye no ada. 18Na mbaa mbofraba a wonnhun ɔbanyin dɛ wɔnye no ada no dze, hom ngye hɔn nkwa mma homho. 19Na hom nkyer nsera wɔ nseraban no ekyir nda esuon: obiara a oeku nyimpa bi no, nye obiara a ɔaka ɔtɔfo bi no, hom ntsew homho da a otsia ebiasa no, nye da a otsia esuon no, hom nye hom ndɔmmumfo no. 20Na atar biara dze, nye adze a wɔdze nwoma ayɛ nyinara, nye mpɔnkyenhwi edwuma nyinara, nye adze a wɔdze dua ayɛ nyinara, homara hom ntsew ho. 21Na ɔsɔfo Eleazar see mbanyin akofo a wɔkɔr akono no dɛ, Iyi nye mbra a EWURADZE dze ahyɛ Moses no mu ahyɛdze: 22naaso sika nye dwetɛ, boran, dadze, seenyaa, nye sumbui no, 23adze biara a obotum ogya no, hom mma ɔnkɛfa ogya mu, na no ho ntsew; naaso hom mfa ahoguar nsu no ntsew ho: na adze a onnkotum ogya no nyinara, hom mma ɔnkɛfa nsu mu. 24Na hom nhor hom ntar da a otsia esuon no, na hom ho ntsew, na n’ekyir no na hom mbra nseraban no mu.
25Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ mbu, 26Ɔwo nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar nye mboanofo no egyanom efi mu etsitsir no, afonam a wɔfae no ano, nyimpa nye mbowa nyina, 27na kyɛ afonam no mu akyɛkyɛ ebien; ma mbanyin akofo a wɔkɔr akono no, nye mboanofo no nyinara: 28na gye mbanyin asayɛfo a wɔkɔr akono no hɔ tow ma EWURADZE: nyimpa, nye anantwi, nye nsoasopɔnkɔ, nye nguankuw mu ahaenum mu nkorkor: 29gye no wɔ hɔn ɔfa no mu, na fa ma ɔsɔfo Eleazar, dɛ EWURADZE ɔmado afɔr. 30Na Israelmba ɔfa mu dze, gye nyimpa, anantwi, nsaso, nye nguankuw no, mekyerɛ ofiembowa nyinara mu eduonum eduonum mu nkorkor, na fa ma Levifo no a wɔhwɛ EWURADZE ntamadan ahwɛdodze do no. 31Na Moses nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no. 32Afei afonam a ɔbor asadze a mbanyin asayɛfo no fae no do no, ɔyɛ nguan mpemahaesia eduosuon enum, 33nye anantwi mpemeduosuon ebien, 34nye nsoasopɔnkɔ mpemeduosia biako, 35nye nyimpa, mbaa a wonnhun ɔbanyin dɛ wɔnye no ada, nyinara wɔyɛ mpemeduasa ebien. 36Na ɔfa no a ɔyɛ hɔn a wotui kɔr ɔsa no hɔn kyɛfa no, no dodow yɛ nguan mpemahaebiasa eduasa esuon nye ahaenum: 37na nguan no mu ɔtow a woyiyii maa EWURADZE no yɛ ahaesia eduosuon enum. 38Na anantwi no yɛ mpemeduasa esia; hɔn mu ɔtow a woyiyii maa EWURADZE yɛ eduosuon ebien. 39Na nsoasopɔnkɔ no yɛ mpemeduasa nye ahaenum; hɔn mu ɔtow a woyiyii maa EWURADZE yɛ eduosia biako. 40Na nyimpa no yɛ mpemduesia; hɔn mu ɔtow a woyiyii maa EWURADZE yɛ nyimpa eduasa ebien. 41Na Moses dze ɔtow a ɔyɛ EWURADZE ɔmado afɔr no maa ɔsɔfo Eleazar, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no. 42Na Israelmba hɔn ɔfa no a Moses gyee no wɔ akofo no hɔ no mu dze, 43(afei mboanofo no hɔn ɔfa no yɛ nguan mpemahaebiasa eduasa, esuon nye ahaenum, 44nye anantwi mpemeduasa esia, 45nye nsoasopɔnkɔ mpemeduasa nye ahaenum, 46nye nyimpa mpemduesia;) 47nye Israelmba hɔn ɔfa no mu dze, Moses faa eduonum eduonum mu nkorkor, nyimpa nye mbowa nyina, na ɔdze maa Levifo no a wɔhwɛ EWURADZE ntamadan ahwɛdodze do no; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no. 48Na asafohemfo a wɔhwɛ dɔm mpempem do no, nye apem apem do asafohemfo, nye ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo no, baa Moses nkyɛn: 49na wɔbɛsee no dɛ, Wo nkowaa yeebu akofo a wɔwɔ hɛn nsamu no ano, na hɛn mu nyimpa kor mpo annyew. 50Na yɛdze EWURADZE n’ayɛyɛdze aba, dza nyimpa biara enya no a, sika ndwindze, ananadze ntweaban, nye nsakɔnadze, nsɔwanonkaba, nsowamuadze, nye nkɔnmuadze, dɛ wɔmfa mpata mma hɛn akra wɔ EWURADZE enyim. 51Na Moses nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar gyee hɔn hɔ sika no, mekyerɛ edwindze no nyinara. 52Na ɔmado afɔr sika nyinara a wɔdze brɛ EWURADZE a ofi apem apem do asafohemfo, nye ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo hɔ no, ɔyɛ dwetɛbona mpemduesia ahaesuon eduonum. 53Na akofo no hɔn afom asadze dze, hɔnankasa na wɔfefae. 54Na Moses nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar gyee sika no wɔ apem apem nye ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo no hɔ, na wɔdze baa ehyiadzibuw no mu, dɛ ɔnyɛ Israelmba no nkaadze wɔ EWURADZE enyim.

Title: NKANEE 32
Content:
Jordan Esuogya Ebusuakuw
(Deuteronomi 3.12-22)
1Afei Reubenmba nye Gadmba no wɔ ofiembowa dodow a wɔdɔɔ so kɛsenara: na aber a wohun Jazer, nye Gilead asaase no, na hwɛ, bea no fata ofiembowa bea no; 2Wɔbae bɛkaa kyerɛɛ Moses, nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar, nye mboanofo no mu mbapɔmba no dɛ, 3Atarot, nye Dibon, nye Jazer, nye Nimra, nye Hesbon, nye Eleale, nye Sebam, nye Nebo, nye Beon, 4asaase a EWURADZE bɔɔ no wɔ Israel mboanofo no enyim no, yɛ asaase a oye ma mbowanyɛn, na wo nkowaa so wɔ ofiembowa. 5Na wɔsee dɛ, Sɛ yeenya w’enyim enyimnyam a, ma wɔmfa asaase yi mma wo nkowaa ma yɛmfa; mma mmfa hɛn nntwa Jordan. 6Na Moses see Gadmba nye Reubenmba no dɛ, Aso hom nuanom nkɔ ɔsa, na hom ntsena ha? 7Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom tu Israelmba akoma dɛ mma wonntwa nnkɔ asaase a EWURADZE dze ama hɔn no do yi? 8Dɛm na hom egyanom yɛe, wɔ aber a mosomaa hɔn fii Kades-barnea dɛ wɔnkɔhwɛ asaase no. 9Na aber a wɔfowee kɔr Eskol mbɔnsa mu, na wohun asaase no, wobotuu Israelmba no hɔn akoma dɛ mma wɔnnkɔ asaase a EWURADZE dze ama hɔn no do. 10Na EWURADZE ebufuw dzɛɛw da no, na ɔkaa ntam dɛ, 11Ampaara mbanyin a wofi Egypt bae no a woedzi mfe eduonu nye ekyir no mu biara runnhu asaase a mekaa ho ntam mekyerɛɛ Abraham, nye Isaak, nye Jakob no; osiandɛ woennwie m’ekyir dzi: 12gyedɛ Keniznyi Jefune ne babanyin Kaleb, nye Nun ne babanyin Josua: osiandɛ hɔn na woedzi EWURADZE ekyir nokwar mu. 13Na EWURADZE ebufuw dzɛɛw Israel do, na ɔmaa wokekyiin sar no do mfe eduanan, ma okodur dɛ ebusuasantsen no a wɔyɛɛ bɔn wɔ EWURADZE enyim no nyinara hyewee. 14Na, hwɛ, hom asoɛr egyina hom egyanom ananmu, ndzebɔnyɛfo asefo, dɛ hom da ho araa dze EWURADZE n’ebufuhyew no reba Israel do. 15Na sɛ hom dan fi n’ekyir a, ɔbɛda ho ara adan hɔn egya wɔ sar no do; na hom asɛɛ ɔman yi nyinara. 16Na wɔbaa ne nkyɛn bɛsee dɛ, Nguamban na yɛbɛgyegye ama hɛn ofiembowa wɔ ha, na nkurow so yɛbɛkyekyer ama hɛn mbofraba: 17na hɛnankasa dze hɛn ho bɛyɛ har yeemia edzi Israelmba enyim, ekodu dɛ yɛdze hɔn bɔkɔ ekodu hɔn tsenabew ana: na hɛn mbofraba no ntsenatsena nkurow a wɔagye ho ban mu osian asaase no do atsefo no ntsi. 18Yɛrennsan mmba hɛn efiefi, gyedɛ Israelmba ɔbanyin biara enya egyapadze edzi ana. 19Na yɛnnye hɔn remmfa enyadze wɔ Jordan egya, ɔdze kɔ no; osiandɛ hɛn egyapadze ebefir hɛn Jordan nkyɛn ha boka afamu. 20Na Moses see hɔn dɛ, Sɛ hom bɛyɛ iyi; sɛ hom bemia homho wɔ EWURADZE enyim akɔ ɔsa, 21na hom mu nyimpa biara a oemia botwa Jordan edzi EWURADZE enyim, ekodu dɛ ɔbɛpam n’atamfo efi n’enyim 22na wɔabrɛ asaase no adze wɔ EWURADZE enyim a: nna n’ekyir no hom bɛsan na hom edzi bem wɔ EWURADZE nye Israelmba ho; na asaase yi nyɛ hom enyadze wɔ EWURADZE enyim. 23Na sɛ hom annyɛ dɛm a, hwɛ hom ayɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE: na hom nhu dɛ hom bɔn beyi hom ama. 24Hom nkyekyer nkurow mma hom mbofraba, na nguamban mma hom nguan; na hom nyɛ dza efi hom anomu epue no. 25Na Gadmba nye Reubenmba no kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, Wo nkowaa bɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ mo wura ahyɛ no. 26Hɛn mbofraba hɛn yernom hɛn nguankuw, nye hɛn ofiembowa nyinara, bɛtsena Gilead nkurow no mu hɔ: 27na wo nkowaa dze, ɔbanyin biara a oemia rokɔ ɔsa no, botwa mu wɔ EWURADZE enyim akɔko dɛ mbrɛ mo wura aka no.
28Nna Moses dze hɔn ho mbra maa ɔsɔfo Eleazar, nye Nun ne babanyin Josua, nye Israelmba ebusuakuw ebusuakuw mu egyanom efi do etsitsir no. 29Na Moses see hɔn dɛ, Sɛ Gadmba nye Reubenmba nye hom twa Jordan, ɔbanyin biara a oemia dzi EWURADZE enyim rokɔko no, na wɔbrɛ asaase no adze wɔ hom enyim a; ɔno hom mfa Gilead asaase mma hɔn ma wɔmfa: 30na sɛ woemmia nye hom enntwa a, ɔnodze wɔmma wonnya enyadze wɔ hom mu wɔ Keenan asaase do. 31Na Gadmba nye Reubenmba no buaa dɛ, Dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE aka akyerɛ wo nkowaa no, dɛmara na yɛbɛyɛ. 32Yebemia wɔ EWURADZE enyim etwa mu akɔ Keenan asaase do, na hɛn egyapadze a yeenya no wɔ Jordan egya ha no ako hɛn hɔ. 33Na Moses dze Amorifo hen Sihon n’ahendzi, nye Basanhen Ɔge n’ahendzi, asaase no, dɛ mbrɛ no do nkurow nye no ntoaado tsetsee no, mekyerɛ asaase no do nkurow a ehyia do no, maa hɔn, mekyerɛ Gadmba, nye Reubenmba, nye Josef ne babanyin Manaasɛ n’ebusuakuw ɔfa no a. 34Na Gadmba no kyekyeer Dibon, nye Atarot, nye Aroer; 35nye Atroth-sofan, nye Jazer, nye Jogbeha; 36nye Bɛt-nimra, nye Bɛt-haran: nkurow a wɔagyegye ho ban, nye nguamban. 37Na Reubenmba no kyekyeer Hesbon, nye Eleale, nye Kiriataim; 38nye Nebo, nye Baal-meon, (hɔn edzin no sakyesakyeree), nye Sibma: na wɔdze edzin fofor totoo nkurow a wɔkyekyeree no. 39Na Manaasɛ ne babanyin Makir mba no sii mu Gilead, na wɔkɛfae, na wotuu Amorifo a wɔwɔ mu hɔ no. 40Na Moses dze Gilead maa Manaasɛ ne babanyin Makir; na ɔtsenaa mu. 41Na Manaasɛ ne babanyin Jair sii mu kɛfaa no nkurow no na ɔfrɛɛ no Havot-jair. 42Na Noba sii mu kɛfaa Kenat, nye no nkuroba, na ɔfrɛɛ no Noba, dɛ mbrɛ nankasa ne dzin no tse.

Title: NKANEE 33
Content:
Israelfo Akwantu
1Iyinom nye Israelmba akwantu a wɔnam Moses nye Aaron nsa do fi Egypt asaase do tutui dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm tsetsee. 2Na Moses nam EWURADZE mbrasɛm do kyerɛɛw hɔn edzifir dɛ mbrɛ hɔn akwantu mu asoɛe no tse: na iyinom nye hɔn akwantu mu asoɛe dɛ mbrɛ hɔn edzifir tse. 3Na bosoom a odzi kan no mu wotui fii Rameses, wɔ bosoom a odzi kan no mu da a otsia duenum no; apaho no ekyir adzekyee na Israelmba no dze ahosɛpɛw kɛse fiir edzi wɔ Egyptfo nyinara enyim, 4wɔ aber a Egyptfo risie sie hɔn mbakan nyinara a EWURADZE kunkum hɔn wɔ hɔn mu no: na hɔn enyame no so EWURADZE buu hɔn ntsɛn. 5Na Israelmba no tui fii Rameses na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Sukɔt. 6Na wotui fii Sukɔt, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Etam a ɔwɔ sar no ano no. 7Na wotui fii Etam, na wɔdanee baa Pi-hahirot a ɔwɔ Baal-zefon enyim no bio: na wɔkyeer nsera wɔ Migidɔl enyim. 8Na wotui fii Hahirot enyim, na wokotwaa mu faa po no ne finimfin kɔr sar no do: na wɔnantseew ndaansa kwan wɔ Etam sar no do, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Mara. 9Na wotui fii Mara, na wɔbaa Elim: na Elim hɔ na nsunyiwa duebien, nye nkyiresua ndua eduosuon wɔ; na wɔkyeer hɔ nsera. 10Na wotui fii Elim, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Mbɛw Po a binom frɛ no Po kɔkɔɔ no ho. 11Na wotui fii Mbɛw Po no ho, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Sin sar do. 12Na wotui fii Sin sar do, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Dofka. 13Na wotui fii Dofka, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Alus. 14Na wotui fii Alus, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Refidim, mbrɛ ɔman no ennya nsu annom no a. 15Na wotui fii Refidim, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Sinai sar do. 16Na wotui fii Sinai sar do, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Kibrot-hataava. 17Na wotui fii Kibrot-hataava, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Hazerot. 18Na wotui fii Hazerot, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Ritma. 19Na wotui fii Ritma, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Rimmon-perez. 20Na wotui fii Rimmon-perez, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Libna. 21Na wotui fii Libna, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Rissa. 22Na wotui fii Rissa, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Kehelata. 23Na wotui fii Kehelata, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ bepɔw Sefer do. 24Na wotui fii bepɔw Sefer do, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Harada. 25Na wotui fii Harada, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Makhelot. 26Na wotui fii Makhelot na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Tahat. 27Na wotui fii Tahat, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Tera. 28Na wotui fii Tera, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Mitka. 29Na wotui fii Mitka na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Hasmona. 30Na wotui fii Hasmona na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Maserot. 31Na wotui fii Maserot, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Bene-jaakan. 32Na wotui fii Bene-jaakan, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Hor-hagidgad. 33Na wotui fii Hor-hagidgad, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Jotbata. 34Na wotui fii Jotbata, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Abrona. 35Na wotui fii Abrona, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Ezion-geber. 36Na wotui fii Ezion-geber, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Zin sar do (ɔnoara nye Kades). 37Na wotui fii Kades, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ bepɔw Hor do, wɔ Edom asaase ano. 38Na ɔsɔfo Aaron nam EWURADZE mbrasɛm do fowee kɔr bepɔw Hor do na okowui wɔ hɔ, wɔ afe a Israelmba fi Egypt asaase do firii no ekyir dza otsia eduanan no mu, bosoom a otsia enum no mu da a odzi bosoom no ne kan no. 39Na aber a Aaron wui wɔ bepɔw Hor do no na oedzi mfe ɔha eduonu ebiasa. 40Na Keenannyi, Aradhen no a ɔtse Keenan asaase do wɔ Pomu afamu no tsee dɛ Israelmba no reba. 41Na wotui fii bepɔw Hor ho, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Zalmona. 42Na wotui fii Zalmona, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Punon. 43Na wotui fii Punon, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Obot. 44Na wotui fii Obot, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Iye-abarim, wɔ Moab ntoaado. 45Na wotui fii Iyim, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Dibon-gad. 46Na wotui fii Dibon-gad, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Almon-diblathaim. 47Na wotui fii Almon-diblathaim, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Abarim mbepɔw do, wɔ Nebo enyim. 48Na wotui fii Abarim mbepɔw do, na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Moab tɛtɛr mu, wɔ Jeriko Jordan ho. 49Na wɔkyeer Jordan ho nsera, fi Bɛt-jesimot araa kodur Abel-Sittim wɔ Moab tɛtɛr mu.
Ahyɛdze Wɔ Keenanfo Ho
50Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses wɔ Moab tɛtɛr mu wɔ Jeriko Jordan ho, dɛ, 51Kasa kyerɛ Israelmba, na se hɔn dɛ, Sɛ hom twa Jordan kɔ Keenan asaase do a, 52ɔno hom mpam asaase no do atsefo no nyinara mfi hom enyim, na hom nsɛɛ hɔn abo ehonyi nyinara, na hom nsɛɛ hɔn ehonyi a woegu no nyinara, na hom ndwurudwuruw mbea sorɔnsorɔm nyinara: 53na hom mfa asaase no mfa, na hom ntsena do: na hom na medze asaase no ama hom dɛ hom mfa. 54Na hom ntwe tonto mfa nkyɛ asaase no dɛ mbrɛ hom ebusua ebusua tsetsee; hɔn a wɔso no hom mma hɔn egyapadze a ɔso, na hɔn a wosuar no ma hɔn egyapadze a osuar: beebiara mbrɛ tonto no abɔ nyimpa biara no hɔ na ɔnyɛ nedze; dɛ mbrɛ hom egyanom mbusuakuw tsetsee no na hom nyinya hom egyapadze. 55Na sɛ hom ammpam asaase no do atsefo no wɔ hom enyim a; ɔno hɔn mu hɔn a hom ama wɔaka no bɛyɛ dɛ awowɔdze wɔ hom enyiwa mu, na ayɛ dɛ nsoɛ, wɔ hom mfe mu, na woehiahia hom ho wɔ asaase a hom tse do no do. 56Na ɔbɛba dɛ, dɛ mbrɛ modween dɛ mebɛyɛ hɔn no, dɛmara na mebɛyɛ hom.

Title: NKANEE 34
Content:
Asaase No Do Ahe
1Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 2Hyɛ Israelmba no mbra, na se hɔn dɛ, Sɛ hom du Keenan asaase no do a, (iyi nye asaase a ɔda hɔ ma hom dɛ egyapadze, mekyerɛ Keenan asaase no dɛ mbrɛ n’ahe tsetsee,) 3ɔno hom pomu afamu nkyɛn mfi Zin sar do wɔ Edom nkyɛn mu, na hom pomu ɔhe mfi Nkyen Epo ano wɔ boka afamu: 4na hom ɔhe no ndan mfa Akrabbim mfowee pomu afamu, na ontwa mu nkɔ Zin: na n’edzifir ndu Kades-barnea pomu afamu; na ɔnkɔ Hazar-adar, na ontwa mu nkɛfa Azmon: 5na ɔhe no mpon mfi Azmon nkɔ Egypt ɔwora ho, na n’edzifir ndu po no ano. 6Na anee afamu ɔhe no dze, hom wɔ po kɛse no dze yɛ ne he: iyi na ɔnyɛ hom anee ɔhe. 7Na iyi nyɛ hom kwaamu ɔhe: hom mfi po kɛse no ho nsan bepɔw Hor mfa: 8bepɔw Hor ho na hom mfi nsan mbrɛ wɔfa kɔ Hamat; na ɔhe no n’edzifir ndu Zedad: 9na ɔhe no mfir edzi nkɔ Zifron, na n’edzifir ndu Hazar-enan: iyi na ɔnyɛ hom kwaamu ɔhe. 10Na hom nsan boka he mfa mfi Hazar-enan nkɔ Sefam: 11na ɔhe no mfi Sefam nsian nkɔ Ribla, wɔ Ain no boka afamu, na ɔhe no nsian araa nkodu Kinneret pomu afamu wɔ boka afamu: 12na ɔhe no nsian nkodu Jordan do, na n’edzifir ndu Nkyen Po ho: iyi nye hom asaase dɛ mbrɛ no ho ahe tsetsee. 13Na Moses hyɛɛ Israelmba no mbra dɛ, Iyi nye asaase a hom ntwe ho tonto mfa nkyɛ no a EWURADZE ahyɛ dɛ wɔmfa mma mbusuakuw akron, nye ebusuakuw ɔfa no; 14nye Reubenmba ebusuakuw, dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee nye Gadmba ebusuakuw dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee, nye Manaasɛ ebusuakuw ɔfa no, woenya hɔn egyapadze: 15na mbusuakuw ebien no nye ebusuakuw ɔfa no enya hɔn egyapadze wɔ Jeriko Jordan egya wɔ boka afamu ɔdze kɔ wipuei no.
16Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 17Iyinom nye mbanyin a wɔnkyɛ asaase no mu mma hom no hɔn edzin: ɔsɔfo Eleazar, nye Nun ne babanyin Josua. 18Na hom nyi ebusuakuw biara mu ɔbapɔmba kor ma wɔnkyɛ asaase no mu. 19Na mbanyin no hɔn edzin nye yi: Juda n’ebusuakuw mu, Jefune ne babanyin Kaleb. 20Simeon ne mba ebusuakuw mu, Ammihud ne babanyin Semuel. 21Benjamin n’ebusuakuw mu, Kislon ne babanyin Elidad. 22Nye Dan ne mba ebusuakuw mu ɔbapɔmba, Jogli ne babanyin Bukki. 23Josef ne mba mu: Manaasɛ ne mba ebusuakuw mu ɔbapɔmba, Efod ne babanyin Hanniel: 24nye Efraim ne mba ebusuakuw mu ɔbapɔmba, Siftan ne babanyin Kemuel. 25Na Zebulun ne mba ebusuakuw mu ɔbapɔmba, Parnak ne babanyin Elizafan. 26Na Isakar ne mba ebusuakuw mu ɔbapɔmba, Azzan ne babanyin Paltiel. 27Na Aser ne mba ebusuakuw mu ɔbapɔmba, Selomi ne babanyin Ahihud. 28Na Naftali ne mba ebusuakuw mu ɔbapɔmba, Ammihud ne babanyin Pedahel. 29Iyinom nye hɔn a EWURADZE hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkyɛ Keenan asaase no mu mma Israelmba no.

Title: NKANEE 35
Content:
Levifo No Nkurow
1Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses wɔ Moab tɛtɛr mu wɔ Jeriko Jordan do dɛ, 2Hyɛ Israelmba no ma wɔmfa hɔn enyadze egyapadze no mu nkurow bi mma Levifo no ma wɔntsena mu; na nkurow no ho mfikyisaase no so hom mfa mma Levifo no. 3Na nkurow no na wɔntsena mu: na no ho mfikyisaase no ndeda ho mma hɔn fiembowa, nye hɔn ahodze, nye hɔn mbowa nyinara. 4Na nkurow no ho mfikyisaase a hom dze bɛma Levifo no, mfi kurow no fasu ekyir nkɔ basafa ahaenum ahaenum ntwa ho nhyia. 5Na hom nsusu kurow no ekyir boka afamu basafa apem, nye pomu afamu basafa apem, nye anee afamu basafa apem, nye kwaamu afamu basafa apem, na kurow no nda ne finimfin. Iyi na ɔnyɛ nkurow no ho mfikyisaase mma hɔn. 6Na nkurow no a hom dze bɛma Levifo no nyɛ guansumabew nkurow esia no a, hom dze bɛma dɛ onyimpakumfo nguan nkɔ hɔ no: na hom mfa nkurow eduanan ebien nka ho. 7Nkurow a hom dze bɛma Levifo no nyinara nyɛ nkurow eduanan awɔtwe: hom mfa nka ne mfikyisaase no ho mma hɔn. 8Na nkurow a hom bɛgye no wɔ Israelmba enyadze mu ama Levifo no ho dze, hɔn a hɔndze dɔɔ so no hɔ na hom ngye dza ɔdɔɔ so: na hɔn a hɔndze suar no hɔ na hom ngye dza osuar: obiara dɛ mbrɛ n’egyapadze a oenya no tse no na ɔmfa no nkurow no mu bi mma Levifo no.
Guansumabew Nkurow
9Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ, 10Kasa kyerɛ Israelmba, na se hɔn dɛ, Sɛ hom twa Jordan kɔ Keenan asaase do a, 11ɔno hom nyiyi nkurow ma ɔnyɛ guansumabew nkurow mma hom; na onyimpakumfo a oku nyimpa bi wɔ ber a ɔannhyɛ da no oeeguan akɔ hɔ. 12Na nkurow no nyɛ hom guansumabew wɔ ɔwerdzinyi no nsamu; amma onyimpakumfo no eennwu, ma eekodu dɛ obegyina mboanofo no enyim ma woeebu no atsɛn ana. 13Na nkurow a hom beyi ama no nyɛ hom guansumabew nkurow esia. 14Hom nyi nkurow ebiasa mma wɔ Jordan egya, na nkurow ebiasa so na hom nyi mma wɔ Keenan asaase do; ɔnyɛ guansumabew nkurow. 15Na Israelmba, nye ɔhɔho, nye ɔkwantunyi a ɔwɔ hɔn mu, nye nkurow esia yi nyɛ hɔn guansumabew: na obiara a ne nsa apa no oeeguan akɔ hɔ. 16Na sɛ obi dze dadze bi bɔ obi, ma owu a, ɔyɛ onyimpakumfo; oku na wonku onyimpakumfo no. 17Na sɛ obi kitsa ɔbo a obotum eku nyimpa na ɔdze bɔ no, ma owu a, ɔyɛ onyimpakumfo: oku na wonku onyimpakumfo no. 18Anaa sɛ okitsa dua a obotum eku nyimpa dze bɔ no, ma owu a, ɔyɛ onyimpakumfo: oku na wonku onyimpakumfo no. 19Bɔgya ho ɔwerdzinyi no noara na onku onyimpakumfo no: sɛ ɔto no a, onku no. 20Na sɛ ɔtan do na osun no, anaa ɔboapa tow biribi dze bɔ no ma owu; 21anaa enyitan do na ɔdze ne nsa dze bɔ no ma owu a: oku na wonku nyia ɔbɔ no no; ɔyɛ onyimpakumfo: bɔgya ho ɔwerdzinyi no nku onyimpakumfo no, sɛ ɔto no a. 22Na sɛ osun no awerɛfir mu na nnyɛ enyitan do, anaa ɔtow adze biara ma ɔbɔ no na ɔannhyɛ da, 23anaa ɔdze ɔbo biara a obotum eku nyimpa, na oennhu no, na ɔtow bɔ no, ma owu, na nnyɛ ne tamfo nkyii so ɔmmpɛ no bɔn bi a: 24ɔno mboanofo no mbu nyia ɔbɔe nye no bɔgyaa ho ɔwerdzinyi no ntamu atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ ntsɛmbu yi tsetsee: 25na mboanofo no nyi onyimpakumfo no mfi bɔgya ho ɔwerdzinyi no nsamu, na mboanofo no mfa no nsan nkɔ no guansumabew kurow no mu, mbrɛ oguanee kɔree no: na ɔnkɛtsena hɔ ma onkodu ɔsɔfopanyin a wɔdze ngo krɔnkrɔn asera no no wu. 26Na sɛ onyimpakumfo no fir edzi aber biara tra no guansumabew kurow a oguanee kɔr hɔ no ne he do; 27na bɔgya ho ɔwerdzinyi no hu no wɔ no guansumabew kurow no ne he ekyir, na bɔgya ho ɔwerdzinyi no koku onyimpakumfo no a; onndzi bɔgya bi ho so: 28osiandɛ no guansumabew kurow no mu na ɔsɛ no dɛ nkyɛ ɔtsena kodu ɔsɔfopanyin no no wu do: na ɔsɔfopanyin no no wu ekyir no dze onyimpakumfo no nsan mbra n’enyadze asaase do bio. 29Na iyi nyɛ atsɛmbu ahyɛdze mma hom wɔ hom ebusuasantsen nyina mu wɔ hom tsenabew nyinara mu. 30Obiara a oku nyimpa biara no, adasefo enum na wɔmfa do nku onyimpakumfo no: na ɔdasefo kor dze mma onndzi dase nntsia nyimpa biara mma onnwu. 31Nkyii so mma hom nngye onyimpakumfo a ɔsɛ owu no nkwa tsir mpata biara: na oku ara na wonku no. 32Na mma hom nngye nyia oeguan kɔ no guansumabew kurow mu ne tsir mpata biara dɛ ɔnsan mbɛtsena asaase no do bio, nkodu ɔsɔfo no wu do. 33Dɛm ntsi mma hom nngu asaase no a hom tse do no ho fi: na bɔgya ara na ogu asaase no ho fi: na wɔrennyɛ mpatadze biara mma asaase no wɔ bɔgya a woehue egu do no ntsi, gyedɛ nyia ɔkaa bɔgya gui no ara no bɔgyaa mu. 34Na mma nngu asaase a hom tse do a mo so metse ne finimfin no do fi: na emi EWURADZE na metse Israelmba finimfin.

Title: NKANEE 36
Content:
Mbabaa Awarfo Egyapadze Ho
1Na Gilead, Makir ne babanyin, Manaasɛ ne babanyin, a wofi Josef ne mbabanyin ebusua ebusua mu egyanom efi do etsitsir no bae, na wɔbɛkasae wɔ Moses, nye mbapɔmba no, Israelmba egyanom efi do etsitsir no enyim: 2na wɔsee dɛ, EWURADZE hyɛɛ mo wura dɛ ɔmfa tontotwe nkyɛ asaase no mu mma Israelmba ma wɔnyɛ no egyapadze: na mo wura na EWURADZE hyɛɛ no dɛ ɔmfa hɛn nua Zelofehad n’egyapadze mma ne mbabaa. 3Na sɛ wɔwar hɔn ma Israelmba ebusuakuw bi mu mbabanyin biara a, ɔno wonyi hɔn egyapadze no mfi hɛn egyanom egyapadze mu, na wɔmfa nkɛka ebusuakuw kor a wɔakɛyɛ hɔndze no egyapadze ho: dɛm na wonyi mfi hɛn egyapadze kyɛfa no mu. 4Na sɛ Israelmba ahosɛpɛw afe no du a, ɔno wɔmfa hɔn egyapadze no nkɛka ebusuakuw kor a wɔakɛyɛ hɔndze no egyapadze ho: ma woeyi hɔn egyapadze efi hɔn egyanom ebusuakuw egyapadze no mu. 5Na Moses hyɛɛ Israelmba no dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’asɛm tse, dɛ, Josef ne mbabanyin ebusuakuw no aka no tsenn. 6Iyi nye adze a EWURADZE hyɛe wɔ Zelofehad mbabaa no ho no, dɛ, Wɔmma wɔnwarwar hɔn a wɔdwen hɔn dɛ woye no: hɔn egya n’ebusuakuw mu ebusua no ara nko na wɔnwarwar wɔ mu. 7Amma Israelmba egyapadze biara eemmfi ebusuakuw kor mu annkɔ ebusuakuw fofor bi mu: na Israelmba no ntakyer hɔn egyanom ebusuakuw egyapadze ho. 8Na ɔbabaa biara a onya egyapadze wɔ Israelmba ebusuakuw biara mu no, ɔnyɛ n’egya ebusuakuw mu ebusua no mu obi ne yer, ama Israelmba no eenyinya nyimpa biara n’egyanom egyapadze edzi. 9Amma egyapadze biara eemmfi ebusuakuw kor mu annkɔ ebusuakuw kor so mu; na Israelmba ebusuakuw ebusuakuw no ntakyer hɔnankasa hɔn egyapadze ho. 10Mekyerɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no, dɛmara na Zelofehad ne mbabaa no yɛe: 11na Mahala, nye Tirza, nye Hogla, nye Milka, nye Noa, Zelofehad mbabaa no warwaar hɔn egya no nuanom mbabanyin no. 12Wɔwarwaar hɔn kɔr Josef ne babanyin Manaasɛ mbabanyin ebusua ebusua mu, na hɔn egyapadze no kaa hɔn egya n’ebusua ebusuakuw no mu. 13Iyinom nye mbransɛm nye ntsɛmbu a, EWURADZE nam Moses nsa do hyɛɛ Israelmba wɔ Moab tɛtɛr mu wɔ Jeriko Jordan do.

Title: DEUTERONOMI NHƐNMU
Content:
NHƐNMU
Deuteronomi anaadɛ Mbra No Ne Ntsimu nwoma no mu nsɛm fa nsɛm ahorow a Moses kaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba wɔ ber a nna wɔwɔ Moab asaase do no ho. Moses ne nsɛm ahorow yi wɔaboaboa ano ahyehyɛ no pɛpɛɛpɛr wɔ nwoma yi mu. Israelfo fi Egypt kodur Moab. Hɔ na hɔn sardo akwantu tsentsen no dze hɔn kodurii ma wɔgyee hɔn ahom. Ha so na wofi boaboaa hɔnho dɛ wɔrokɔ akɛfa Keenan asaase no atsena do.
Nsɛm tsitsir a wɔakyerɛw wɔ nwoma no mu no bi nye yi: (1) Moses kaakaa Israelfo no nsɛntsitsir bi a osisii wɔ mfe eduanan bi a etwa mu kɔ no. Moses tu hɔn fo dɛ wɔmfa hɔn enyi nto dza Nyankopɔn ayɛ ama hɔn wɔ hɔn sardo akwantu no mu no do, na wontsie Nyankopɔn n’asɛm ndzi n’ekyir wɔ nokwar mu. (2) Moses san tsi mbrasɛm du no mu kyerɛ hɔn. Ɔkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn mbrasɛm no mu, ne tsitsir nye mbrasɛm a odzi kan no. Otu hɔn fo so dɛ EWURADZE nkotsee. Afei otsi mbrasɛm ahorow a Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ sɛ wokodu anohoba asaase no do a, wondzi do no mu. (3) Moses kaa hɔn kyerɛɛ hɔn ahyɛmu a Nyankopɔn nye hɔn dzii no ase, na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnhwɛ ndzi n’ahyɛmu no do. (4) Wɔhyɛ Josua panyin dɛ ɔkandzifo fofor a ondzi Nyankopɔn ne man no enyim. Moses tow ayɛyindwom dze kamfo Nyankopɔn no nokwardzi na ohyira Israelman no. Iyi ekyir no, Moses wu wɔ Moab asaase do wɔ esutsen Jordan no boka afamu.
Asɛntsitsir a nwoma no gyina do no nye dɛ Nyankopɔn agye no nkorɔfo a ɔasan mu eyi hɔn na ɔdɔ hɔn no, wɔ ne nhyira a ohyiraa hɔn no ho. Na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn ase dɛ ne man nkaa iyi, na hɔn so, wɔndɔ Nyankopɔn na wontsie n’asɛm na wondzi do. Wɔyɛ dɛm a nna wobenya nkwa, na wɔakɔ do so enya nhyira. Nsɛm a odzi mu wɔ nwoma no mu nye dza ɔwɔ 6.4-6 mu no. Ɔno mu na yehu nsɛm a Jesus too no dzin dɛ mbrasɛm no nyina mu kɛse no. Ɔno na ɔka dɛ, Fa w’akoma nyinara, nye wo kra nyinara, na ɔnye w’ahoɔdzen nyinara dɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn.
Dza Ɔwɔ Mu
Moses ne nsɛm a ɔkae dzii kan 1.1—4.49
Moses ne nsɛm a ɔkae a ɔtɔ do ebien 5.1—26.19
1. Mbrasɛm Du no 5.1—10.22
2. Ahyɛdze, nhyehyɛɛ na kɔkɔbɔ ho nsɛm 11.1—26.19
Keenan asaase do kɔ ho nhyehyɛɛ 27.1—28.68
Wɔhyɛ ahyɛmu no mu dzen 29.1—30.20
Moses ne nsɛm odzi ekyir 31.1—33.29
Moses no wu 34.1-12

Title: DEUTERONOMI 1
Content:
Nsɛm A Moses Kae
1Iyinom nye nsɛm a Moses kaa kyerɛɛ Israel nyinara wɔ Jordan egya sar no do, wɔ Araba Suf tsentsendo, wɔ Paran, nye Tofel, nye Laban, nye Hazerot, nye Di-zahab ntamu. 2Ofi Horeb wɔ bepɔw Seir kwan do kɔ Kades-barnea ɔyɛ nda dubiako kwan. 3Na ɔbaa dɛ afe a otsia eduanan no mu, bosoom a otsia dubiako no ne da a odzi kan no, Moses kasaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba no dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ no dɛ ɔnka nkyerɛ hɔn no nyinara; 4wɔber a oeku Amorifo hen Sihon a ɔtse Hesbon, nye Basanhen Ɔge a ɔtse Astarot, wɔ Edrei no ekyir no. 5Jordan egya wɔ Moab asaase do, na Moses hyɛɛ ase kyerɛkyerɛɛ mbra yi mu dɛ, 6EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn kasaa kyerɛɛ hɛn wɔ Horeb dɛ, Hom atsena bepɔw yi ho akyɛr dodow: 7hom ndan homho, na hom ntu nkɔ Amorifo nkokodo nkurow mu, nye mbeambea a ɔbɛn ho hɔ nyinara, wɔ Araba, nkokodo nkurow mu, nye tɛtɛr mu, nye Pomu, nye mpoano, Keenanfo asaase do, nye Lebanon do, nkodu esutsen kɛse Eufrates no ho. 8Hwɛ, medze asaase no ato hom enyim: hom nkɔ nkɛfa asaase a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hom egyanom, Abraham, Isaak, nye Jakob, dɛ ɔdze bɛma hɔn nye hɔn asefo a wodzi hɔn ekyir no.
Moses Yiyi Atsɛmbuafo
(Eksodɔs 18.13)
9Na mekasaa kyerɛɛ hom aber no mu dɛ, Mara nkotsee runntum monnkora hom: 10EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ama hom adɔr, na hwɛ, ndɛ da yi hom dodow tse dɛ ɔsor nworaba. 11EWURADZE hom egyanom Nyankopɔn, nyɛ hom dɛ mbrɛ hom tse yi mbɔho apem so nka ho, na onhyira hom, dɛ mbrɛ ɔabɔ hom anohoba no! 12Mebɛyɛ dɛn monko metum asoa hom haw, nye hom adzesoa, nye hom aperper? 13Hom nyiyi mbanyin enyansafo, nye enyimdzefo, na wɔda nsew, dɛ mbrɛ hom ebusuakuw no tsetsee, na menyɛ hɔn etsitsir wɔ hom do. 14Na hom buaa me see dɛ, Dza aka no oye ma hɛn dɛ yɛyɛ. 15Nna mefaa hom ebusuakuw ebusuakuw mu etsitsir no, mbanyin enyansafo wɔda nsew, na meyɛɛ hɔn etsitsir wɔ hom do, apem apem do asafohemfo, nye ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo, nye eduonum eduonum do asafohemfo, nye du du do asafohemfo, nye ahwɛdofo, dɛ mbrɛ hom ebusuakuw tsetsee. 16Na mehyɛɛ hom atsɛmbuafo mbra aber no mu dɛ, Hom ntsie hom nuanom ntamu nsɛm, na hom mbu ntsɛn tsenenee wɔ nyimpa nye no nua, nye ɔhɔho a ɔnye no wɔ hɔ ntamu. 17Mma hom nnhwɛ nyimpa enyim wɔ atsɛmbu mu; hom ntsie aketseaba nye ɔkɛse nyina pɛ; mma hom nnsuro nyimpa enyim; na atsɛmbu yɛ Nyankopɔn dze: na asɛm a ɔyɛ dzen dodow ma hom no na hom mfa mbrɛ me, na mintsie. 18Na mehyɛɛ hom dza hom nyɛ no nyinara ho mbra aber no mu.
Wɔsoma Akwanserafo Fi Kades
(Nkanee 13.1-33)
19Na yetui fii Horeb, na yɛnantsewee faa sar kɛse a ɔyɛ hu a hom hunii no nyinara do wɔ Amorifo nkokodo nkurow kwan do, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ hɛn no; na yedur Kades Barnea. 20Na mesee hom dɛ, Hom edu Amorifo nkokodo nkurow a EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn dze rema hɛn no ho. 21Hwɛ, EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze asaase no ato hom enyim: hom mfow kɔ, nkɛfa, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE, hom egyanom Nyankopɔn aka akyerɛ hom no; mma hom nnsuro, nkyii so mma hom akoma nntu. 22Na hom baa me nkyɛn, hom nyinara; na wɔsee dɛ, Ma yɛnsoma mbanyin ma wondzi hɛn enyim nkɛsera asaase no mma hɛn, na wɔmbɛka ɔkwan kor a yɛbɛfa do, nye nkurow kor a yebodu do ho asɛm nkyerɛ hɛn. 23Na asɛm no yɛɛ me enyisɔ dɛ: na mefaa hom mu nyimpa duebien, ebusuakuw biara mu nyimpa kor: 24na wɔdanee kɔfoow bepɔw no, na wokodur Eskol ɔbɔn mu, na wɔserae. 25Na wɔfaa asaase no do aba bi kitsae, na wɔdze sanee baa hɛn nkyɛn, na wɔbɛkaa hɛn asɛm see dɛ, Asaase a EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn dze rema hɛn no oye. 26Naaso hom ammpɛ dɛ hom fow kɔ, na hom tseew EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn mbrasɛm do etua: 27na hom hwinhwinii wɔ hom asesee mu see dɛ, Osiandɛ EWURADZE tan hɛn ntsi na oyii hɛn wɔ Egypt asaase do, dɛ ɔdze hɛn rebɛhyɛ Amorifo nsa, ma wɔaasɛɛ hɛn. 28Henfa na yɛmfa nkɔ? Hɛn enuanom etutu hɛn akoma, dɛ, Ɔman no wɔsoso na wɔwowar sen hɛn; nkurow no yɛ akɛse na wɔatotow ho afasu akɔ sor; na nkyii so yehun Anakfo mbabanyin wɔ hɔ. 29Nna mesee hom dɛ, Mma hu nnka hom, nkyii so mma hom nnsuro hɔn. 30EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a odzi hom enyim rokɔ no, ɔno na ɔbɔko ama hom, dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛe maa hom wɔ Egypt wɔ hom enyiwa mu no nyinara; 31nye sar no do, beebi a hom hun mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn sii tuur hom, dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa tur ne babanyin, wɔ kwan a hom nantsewee no nyinara mu araa dze bodur dɛ hom dur ha yi. 32Naaso iyi mu hom anngye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn enndzi, 33ɔno a odzii hom enyim wɔ ɔkwan no mu dɛ ɔrokɔhwehwɛ beebi a ma hom abɔ asesee, wɔ gya mu adzesaa, dɛ ɔkyerɛ hom ɔkwan a hom mfa do, nye mununkum mu adzekyee.
EWURADZE N’ebufuw Wɔ Israel Do
(Nkanee 14.20-45)
34Na EWURADZE tsee hom nsɛm, na no bo fuwii, na ɔkaa ntam dɛ, 35Ampaara ebusuasantsen bɔn yi mu nyimpa yi mu biara runnhu asaase pa a mekaa ho ntam dɛ medze bɛma hom egyanom no, 36gyedɛ Jefune ne babanyin Kaleb, ɔno na obohu; na ɔno na medze asaase a oetsia do no bɛma no, nye ne mba; osiandɛ oedzi EWURADZE ekyir koraa. 37Eso hom ntsi EWURADZE nyaa no ho ebufuw, dɛ, Wo so ronnkɔ hɔ: 38Nun ne babanyin Josua a ogyina w’enyim no, ɔno na ɔbɔkɔ hɔ: hyɛ no dzen; na ɔno na ɔbɛyɛ ma Israel enya edzi. 39Nkyii so hom mbofraba no a hom se dɛ wɔbɛyɛ afonam no, nye hom mba no a ndɛ da yi wonnyi papa anaa bɔn ho nyimdzee no, hɔn na wɔbɔkɔ hɔ, na hɔn na medze mebɛma hɔn, na wɔafa. 40Na hom dze, hom ndan homho, na hom ntu nkɔ sar no do wɔ Mbɛw Po kwan do. 41Nna hom buae na wɔsee me dɛ, Yɛayɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE, yɛbɔfow akɔ akɔko, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ hɛn no nyinara. Na hom mu nyimpa biara dze n’akodze miamiae, na wodzii kan dɛ wɔrokɔfow akɔ bepɔw no do. 42Na EWURADZE see me dɛ, Se hɔn dɛ, Mma wɔmmfow, nkyii so mma wɔnnko; na minnyi hom mu; bɛyɛ na hom akɔtotɔr wɔ hom atamfo enyim. 43Na mekasaa mekyerɛɛ hom, na hom enntsie; na hom tseew EWURADZE mbrasɛm do etua, na hom tsitsii hom enyi ho ara fowee kɔr bepɔw no do. 44Na Amorifo a wɔtse bepɔw no do no fiir edzi behyiaa hom, na wotsiiw hom, dɛ mbrɛ ndowa yɛ, na wokunkum hom wɔ Seir araa kodur Horma. 45Na hom sanee na wobosui wɔ EWURADZE enyim; na EWURADZE enntsie hom ndze, na eso ɔannyɛ aso amma hom. 46Nna hom tsenaa Kades dzii nda pii, dɛ mbrɛ nda a hom dze tsenaa hɔ tse no.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 2
Content:
Sardo Akwantu
1Nna yɛdanee, na yetuu hɛn kwan kɔr sar no do wɔ Mbɛw Po kwan do, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ me no: na yekyiin Seir bepɔw ho nda pii. 2Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ me dɛ, 3Hom ekyin bepɔw yi ho akyɛr dodow: hom ndan homho wɔ kwaamu afamu. 4Na hyɛ ɔman no dɛ, Hom rubotwa mu wɔ hom nuanom Esau mba a wɔtse Seir no ntoaado; na wobosuro hom: dɛm ntsi hom nhwɛ homho yie papa: 5mma wɔnnye hɔn nndzi aper; na meremmfa hɔn asaase no memma hom, oho, nnyɛ mbrɛ ɔnamɔn mpo betsia a: osiandɛ medze Seir bepɔw mama Esau dɛ ɔmfa. 6Hom mfa sika ntɔ hɔn hɔ edziban, na hom eedzi; na hom mfa sika ntɔ hɔn hɔ nsu so, na hom aanom. 7Na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ehyira wo wɔ wo nsaano edwuma nyinara mu: oehu wo nantsew wɔ sar kɛse yi do: mfe eduanan yi EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn edzi w’ekyir; ennhia wo biribiara. 8Nna yetwae fi hɛn nuanom Esaumba a wɔtse Seir no ho, fi Araba kwan do fi Elat nye Ezion-geber.
Na yɛdanee, na yekotwaa mu wɔ Moab sar no do kwan do. 9Na EWURADZE see me dɛ, Mma nnhiahia Moab ho, nkyii so mma nnye hɔn nndzi aper nnko: na meremmfa n’asaase mu bi memma wo mma emmfa; osiandɛ medze Ar ama Lotmba dɛ wɔmfa. 10Emfo no na wɔtsenaa do nkan no, ɔman kɛse a wɔdɔɔ so, na wɔwowar dɛ Anakfo: 11iyinom so na wobu hɔn Refafo, dɛ Anakfo; na Moabfo dze wɔfrɛ hɔn Emfo. 12Horfo so na nkyɛ nkan no wɔtsenaa Seir, na Esaumba no hyɛɛ hɔn ananmu; na wɔsɛɛ hɔn wɔ hɔn enyim, na wɔtsenaa hɔn ananmu dɛ mbrɛ Israel yɛɛ n’enyadze asaase a EWURADZE dze maa hɔn no. 13Afei hom nsoɛr, na hom nkotwa ɔwora Zered. Na yekotwaa ɔwora Zered. 14Na mfe dodow a yɛdze nantsewee fi Kades-barnea bodur dɛ yebotwaa ɔwora Zered no, yɛ mfe eduasa awɔtwe; kodur dɛ akofo ebusuasantsen no nyinara wuwui wɔ nseraban no mu, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE kaa ho ntam no. 15Nkyii so EWURADZE nsa tsiaa hɔn, dɛ ɔresɛɛ hɔn efi nseraban no mu, ekodu dɛ wɔbɛhyew.
16Nna ɔbaa dɛ, aber a akofo no nyinara hyewee na wowuwui fii ɔman no mu no, 17EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ me dɛ, 18Ndɛ da yi na irubotwa mu wɔ Ar, Moab ntoaado no: 19na sɛ ikodu Ammonmba tsentsendo a, mma nnhiahia hɔn ho, na nnye hɔn nndzi aper so: na meremmfa Ammonmba asaase mu bi memma wo mma emmfa: osiandɛ medze mama Lotmba dɛ wɔmfa. 20Ɔno so wobu no Refafo asaase; Refafo tsenaa do nkan no; na Ammonfo dze wɔfrɛ hɔn Zamzumfo; 21ɔman kɛse a, wɔdɔɔ so, na wɔwowar dɛ Anakfo; na EWURADZE sɛɛ hɔn wɔ hɔn enyim; na wɔhyɛɛ hɔn ananmu: 22dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛe maa Esaumba a wɔtse Seir, aber a ɔsɛɛ Horfo wɔ hɔn enyim; na wɔhyɛɛ hɔn ananmu, na wɔtsenaa hɔn ananmu araa dze bodu ndɛ da yi; 23na Avifo a wɔtsenatsenaa nkuroba araa dze kodu Gaza mu no, Kaftorfo a, wofi Kaftor bae no, bɛsɛɛ hɔn, na wɔtsenaa hɔn ananmu. 24Hom nsoɛr, wontu hom kwan, na wonkotwa Arnon bɔnsa; hwɛ, medze Amorinyi Sihon, Hesbon hen no, nye n’asaase ahyɛ wo nsa: hyɛ ase fa, na nye no ndzi aper nko. 25Ndɛ da yi na mebɛhyɛ ase medze wo ho suro nye wo ho hu megu amanaman a wɔwɔ asaase nyina do a wɔbɛtse wo nka do, na hɔn ho apopo, na hɔn ho eguan hɔn wɔ wo ntsi.
Israel Dzi Sihon Do Konyim
(Nkanee 21.21-30)
26Na Kedamot sar do na mifi mosomaa abɔfo ma wɔdze asomdwee nsɛm kɔr Hesbon hen Sihon nkyɛn dɛ, 27Ma muntwa mu wɔ w’asaase do: ɔtsempɔn do ara na mebɛfa akɔ, merenndan mmfa enyimfa anaa abankum. 28Tɔn me edziban gye sika, ma mindzi; na ma me nsu gye sika ma monnom: ma memfa m’anan kwa mumbotwa mu; 29dɛ mbrɛ Esaumba a wɔtse Seir, na Moabfo a wɔtse Ar, yɛɛ me no; ma onkodu dɛ mubotwa Jordan akɔ asaase a EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn dze rema hɛn no do. 30Na Hesbonhen Sihon amma hɛn kwan dɛ yentwa mu wɔ ne nkyɛn: osiandɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn maa no asoɔdzen sunsum, na opiriim n’akoma, ama ɔdze no aahyɛ wo nsa, dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi. 31Na EWURADZE see me dɛ, Hwɛ, mahyɛ ase meyi Sihon nye n’asaase mama wɔ w’enyim: hyɛ ase fa, na enya n’asaase no edzi. 32Nna Sihon fiir edzi behyiaa hɛn, ɔno nye ne man nyinara, dɛ ɔrobɔko wɔ Jahaz. 33Na EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn yii no mae wɔ hɛn enyim; na yekunkum ɔno, nye ne mbabanyin, nye ne man nyinara. 34Na yɛfaa no nkurow nyinara aber no mu, na yɛsɛɛ kurow biara a nyimpa tse mu no pasapasa, dze kaa mbaa nye mbofraba ho; yeenngyaa biara mma ɔannka: 35ofiembowa nko na hɛnara yɛfaa no afonam, dze kaa nkurow a yɛfae no mu asadze ho. 36Ofi Aroer a ɔwɔ Arnon ɔbɔn no ano, na ofi kurow a ɔwɔ Arnon ɔbɔn no mu no do, araa dze kɔ Gilead, kurow biara nnyi hɔ a ɔyɛɛ dzen dodow maa hɛn: EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn yii ne nyinara mae wɔ hɛn enyim: 37Ammonmba asaase no nko na ɔwo ammbɛn ho; esutsen Jabbok ne nkyɛn nyinara, nye nkurow a ɔwɔ nkokodo nkurow mu no, nye beebiara a EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn amma hɛn ho kwan no.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 3
Content:
Israelfo Dzi Ɔge Do Konyim
(Nkanee 21.31-35)
1Nna yɛdanee, na yɛfowee kɔr Basan kwan do: na Basan hen Ɔge fiir edzi behyiaa hɛn, ɔno nye ne man nyinara, dɛ ɔrobɔko wɔ Edrei. 2Na EWURADZE see me dɛ, Mma nnsuro no: na meyi ɔno, nye ne man nyinara, nye n’asaase, ahyɛ wo nsa; na yɛ no dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ Amorifo hen Sihon a ɔtsenaa Hesbon no. 3Dɛmara na EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn yii Basanhen Ɔge so, nye ne man nyinara, hyɛɛ hɛn nsa: na yekum no araa kodur dɛ woenngyaa biara mma wɔannka amma no. 4Na yɛgyee no nkurow nyinara aber no mu; kurow biara nnyi hɔ a yɛanngye no hɔn hɔ; nkurow eduosia, Argob mbew nyinara, Ɔge n’ahenman a ɔwɔ Basan. 5Iyinom nyinara yɛ nkurow a no ho wɔ afasu atsentsen, mbotsen, nye adaban; ɔsor nkurow a ɔdɔɔ so piigyan a no ho nnyi afasu no. 6Na yɛsɛɛ hɔn pasapasa, dɛ mbrɛ yɛyɛɛ Hesbonhen Sihon no, yɛsɛɛ kurow biara a nyimpa tse mu no pasapasa, dze kaa mbaa nye mbofraba ho. 7Na ofiembowa nyinara, na nkurow no mu asadze no dze, hɛnara yɛfaa no afonam. 8Na yɛgyee asaase no wɔ Amorifo ahemfo beenu no a wɔwɔ Jordan egya no nsamu aber no mu, fi Arnon ɔbɔn mu kodur bepɔw Hermon ho; 9(Hermon no Zidonfo frɛ no Sirion, na Amorifo frɛ no Senir;) 10tɛtɛr mu nkurow nyinara, nye Gilead nyinara, nye Basan nyinara, kodur Saleka nye Edrei, Ɔge n’ahenman nkurow a ɔwɔ Basan. 11(Na Basanhen Ɔge nko na ɔkae wɔ Refafo nkaa no mu; hwɛ, nna ne mpadua ayɛ dadze mpadua; nnda ho nnsi Ammonmba Rabaa bi a? Ne tsentsen yɛ basafa anan nye fa, na ne tɛtɛr basafa ebien, dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa basafa tse.)
Asaase No Ne Nkyekyɛmu
12Na asaase yi na yɛfae wɔ aber no mu: ofi Aroer a ɔwɔ Arnon ɔbɔn ho, nye Gilead nkokodo nkurow ɔfa, nye no nkurow, na medze maa Reubenfo nye Gadfo; 13na Gilead nkaa, nye Basan nyinara, Ɔge n’ahenman no, na medze memaa Manaasɛ ebusuakuw ɔfa no; Argob mbew nyinara, mekyerɛ Basan nyinara. (Ɔnoara na wɔfrɛ no Refaim asaase no. 14Manaasɛ ne babanyin Jair faa Argob mbew nyinara, kodur Gersurfo nye Maakatfo ntoaado, na ɔtoo no dzin, mekyerɛ Basan a, dɛ mbrɛ ne dzin tse, Havot-jair, dze bodu ndɛ da yi.) 15Na medze Gilead memaa Makir. 16Na Reubenfo nye Gadfo na medze ofi Gilead araa dze kodu Arnon ɔbɔn ho, ɔbɔn no ne finimfin, nye no ntoaado memaa hɔn; mekyerɛ dze kodu esutsen Jabbok a ɔyɛ Ammonmba ɔhe no do; 17Araba so, nye Jordan nye no ntoaado, ofi Kinneret araa dze kodu Araba epo ho, Mbɛw Po no, wɔ Pisga ntserɛwee ase boka afamu.
18Na mehyɛɛ hom aber no mu dɛ, EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze asaase yi ama hom dɛ hom mfa: hom mmia ntwa mu ndzi hom nuanom Israelmba enyim, mbanyin a wɔyɛ ndam nyinara. 19Hom yernom, nye hom mbofraba, nye hom fiembowa dze (minyim dɛ hom wɔ fiembowa piigyan) wɔntsena hom nkurow a medze mama hom no mu; 20nkodu dɛ EWURADZE bɛma hom nuanom ahomgye, dɛ hom, na hɔn so wɔaakɛfa asaase a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze rema hɔn wɔ Jordan egya no: n’ekyir no na hom mu nyimpa biara nsan mbra n’enyadze do, dza medze mama hom no a. 21Na mehyɛɛ Josua aber no mu dɛ, W’enyiwa ehu dza EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze ayɛ ahemfo beenu yi nyinara: 22Mma hom nnsuro hɔn: na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn, ɔno nye nyia ɔroko ma hom.
Moses N’adzeserɛdze
23Na meserɛɛ EWURADZE aber no mu dɛ, 24Ao EWURADZE Nyankopɔn, ɔwo na ahyɛ ase dze wo kɛseyɛ, nye wo nsa dzendzen no akyerɛ w’akowaa: na onyame bɛn na ɔwɔ ɔsor anaa asaase do a obotum ayɛ dɛ mbrɛ wo ndwuma, nye mbrɛ w’akatakyidze tsetsee? 25Mepa wo kyɛw, ma muntwa nkɔ, na monkɔhwɛ asaase pa a ɔwɔ Jordan egya no, bepɔw fɛɛfɛw no, nye Lebanon. 26Na hom ntsi EWURADZE no bo fuuw me, na oenntsie me: na EWURADZE see me dɛ, Ma ɔndɔɔ wo so; mma nnye me nnkasa asɛm yi ho bio. 27Fow kɔ Pisga etsifi, na ma w’enyiwa do wɔ anee afamu, nye kwaamu afamu, nye pomu afamu nye boka afamu, na fa w’enyiwa hwɛ; na ɔwo runntwa Jordan yi. 28Mbom hyɛ Josua, na hyɛ no nsi, na hyɛ no dzen: na ɔno na obedzi ɔman yi enyim etwa, na ɔno na ɔbɛyɛ ma woeenya asaase a ibohu no edzi. 29Nna yɛtsenaa ɔbɔn no mu wɔ Bɛt-peor tsentsendo.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 4
Content:
Setsie Ho Kɔkɔbɔ
1Na afei, Israel, hom ntsie ahyɛdze nye atsɛmbu a mekyerɛkyerɛ hom dɛ hom nyɛ no; na hom eenya nkwa, na hom akɔ akɛfa asaase a EWURADZE, hom egyanom Nyankopɔn dze rema hom no. 2Mma hom mmfa hwee nnka asɛm a merehyɛ hom yi ho, nkyii so mma hom nyi do bi, na hom eedzi EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn mbransɛm a merehyɛ hom yi do. 3Hom enyiwa ehu dza osian Baal-peor ntsi EWURADZE yɛe; na nyimpa a wodzii Baal-peor ekyir no nyinara, EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn asɛɛ hɔn efi hom mu. 4Na hom a hom takyeer EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ho no dze, hom nyinara tse ase ndɛ da yi. 5Hwɛ makyerɛkyerɛ hom ahyɛdze nye ntsɛmbu, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ me no ara, dɛ hom nyɛ dɛm wɔ asaase a hom rokɔ do akɛfa no mu. 6Dɛm ntsi hom ndzi do na hom nyɛ; na iyi nye hom nyansaa nye hom ntseasee wɔ aman a wɔbɛtse ahyɛdze yi nyinara enyim, na wɔbɛse dɛ, Ampaara ɔman kɛse yi yɛ nyansa nye nyimdzee man. 7Na ɔman kɛse bɛn na ɔwɔ hɔ a ɔwɔ nyame a ɔbɛn hɔn dɛm, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn tse wɔ aber biara a yɛfrɛ no no? 8Na ɔman kɛse bɛn na ɔwɔ hɔ a ɔwɔ ahyɛdze nye atsɛmbu tsenenee dɛ mbrɛ mbra yi nyinara a medze risi hom enyim ndɛ da yi tse? 9Hom ho yie ara na nhwɛ, na hom nsie hom kra yie, bɛyɛ na hom werɛ efir ndzɛmba a enyiwa hunii no, na bɛyɛ na efi hom akoma mu hom nkwa nda nyinara mu; mbom ma wo mba nye wo mba hɔn mba nhu; 10da a hom gyinaa EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn enyim wɔ Horeb, aber a EWURADZE see me dɛ, Boaboa ɔman no ano ma me, na memma wontsie me nsɛm, na woeesuasua dɛ wosuro me wɔ nda a wɔdze tse ase wɔ asaase do nyinara, na wɔdze akyerɛkyerɛ hɔn mba no. 11Na hom twee pinii na hom begyinaa bepɔw no ase; ber a bepɔw no dzɛɛw gya kɔr sor tɔnn, sum, mununkum, nye sum kebii. 12Na EWURADZE fi gya no mu kasaa kyerɛɛ hom: hom tsee ne nsɛm ndze, na no su dze hom ennhu; ne ndze nko na hom tsee. 13Na ɔkaa n’ahyɛmu a ɔhyɛɛ hom dɛ hom nyɛ no kyerɛɛ hom, mekyerɛ mbransɛm du no; na ɔkyerɛɛw no wɔ abopon ebien do. 14Na EWURADZE hyɛɛ me aber no mu dɛ menkyerɛkyerɛ hom ahyɛdze nye ntsɛmbu, na hom aayɛ no wɔ asaase a hom rutwa mu akɛfa no do.
Abosonsɔr Ho Kɔkɔbɔ
15Dɛm ntsi hom nhwɛ homho yie papa; osiandɛ hom ennhu su biara da no a EWURADZE fi ogya no mu kasaa kyerɛɛ hom wɔ Horeb no: 16bɛyɛ na hom asɛɛ homho, na hom ayɛ ohonyi a wɔasen wɔ adze biara no su mu ama hom ho, ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa saso, 17abowa biara a ɔwɔ asaase do ne saso, etubowa biara a otu wɔ wimu ne saso, 18adze biara a ɔwea famu ne saso, nam biara a ɔwɔ nsu mu wɔ asaase ase ne saso: 19na bɛyɛ na hom ama hom enyiwa do wɔ sor, na sɛ hom hu ewia nye bosoom, nye nworaba, mekyerɛ sor dɔm no nyinara a, wɔatwe hom ma hom akɔsɔr hɔn, na asom hɔn, dza EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ahyehyɛ ama aman nyinara wɔ asaase nyina do no. 20Hom dze, EWURADZE afa hom, na oeyi hom efi dadze fononoo mu, efi Egypt dɛ hom mbɛyɛ n’egyapadze mma no, dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi. 21Nkyii so hom ntsi EWURADZE nyaa me ebufuw, na ɔkaa ntam dɛ murunntwa Jordan, na moronnkɔ asaase pa no a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ egyapadze no do. 22Emi dze muruwu wɔ asaase yi do, murunntwa Jordan: na hom dze wobotwa, na wɔakɛfa asaase pa no. 23Hom nhwɛ hom ho yie, bɛyɛ na hom werɛ efir EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ahyɛmu a ɔnye hom dzii no, na hom ayɛ ohonyi a wɔasen wɔ adze bi a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn abra wo no su do ama woho. 24Na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn yɛ ogya a ɔmen, Nyame nyinkufo a.
25Sɛ hom wowo mba, na hom mba so wo mba, na hom kyɛr wɔ asaase no do, na hom sɛɛ homho, na wɔyɛ ohonyi a wɔasen wɔ adze biara no su do, na hom yɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn enyiwa do, dze yi no ebufuw a: 26mefrɛ sor nye asaase dɛ wondzi hom dase ndɛ da yi, dɛ ɔhera na hom bɛhera ntsɛmara wɔ asaase a hom rutwa Jordan akɛfa no do; hom nda ronnwar wɔ do, mbom ɔsɛɛ na hom bɛsɛɛ pasapasa. 27Na EWURADZE bɔbɔ hom apetse aman mu, na ɔbɛka hom nyimpa kakrabaabi wɔ amanaman mu mbrɛ EWURADZE begya hom akɔ no. 28Na hɔ na hom bɔsom enyame, nyimpa nsaano edwuma, ndua nye abo a wonnhu, wɔnntse, wonndzidzi, wonnhua. 29Na sɛ hom fi hɔ hwehwɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a, hom bohu no, sɛ hom dze hom akoma nyinara nye hom kra nyinara hwehwɛ n’ekyir kwan a. 30Sɛ hom wɔ ahohia mu, na ndzɛmba yi nyinara ba hom do a, nda a odzi ekyir no mu no nsan mbra EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn nkyɛn, na hom ntsie ne ndze: 31na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn yɛ mbɔbɔrhufo Nyankopɔn; ɔremmpa hom, nkyii so ɔrennsɛɛ hom, no werɛ rimmfir hom egyanom ahyɛmu a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hɔn no so. 32Na afei hom nkaa tsetse nda a etwa mu kɔ no, fitsi da a Nyankopɔn bɔɔ nyimpa wɔ asaase do, na ofi ɔsor n’ano kor kodu kor so, kyerɛ dɛ biribi esi a ɔtse dɛ mbrɛ adze kɛse yi tse, anaa wɔatse dza ɔnye no sɛ? 33Ana ɔman bi atse Nyankopɔn ndze dɛ ofi gya mu rekasa pɛn, dɛ mbrɛ hom atse no, na woenya nkwa? 34Ana Nyankopɔn asɔ ahwɛ dɛ ɔbɔkɔ akɛfa ɔman bi efi ɔman kor so bi mu afa, wɔ nsɔhwɛ, nsɛnkyerɛdze, nye anwanwadze, nye ɔsa, nye nsa a ɔyɛ dzen, nye abasa a wɔatserɛw mu, nye suro akɛse mu, dɛ mbrɛ dza EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn yɛe maa hom wɔ Egypt wɔ hom enyiwa mu no nyinara tsetsee a? 35Hom na wɔdze kyerɛɛ hom, ma hom eehu dɛ EWURADZE nye Nyankopɔn; obi nnyi hɔ bio ka no ho. 36Ofi sor maa hom tsee ne ndze, ma ɔaakyerɛkyerɛ hom: na asaase do na ɔmaa hun ne gya kɛse no; na ofi gya no mu na etsee ne nsɛm. 37Na osiandɛ ɔdɔɔ hom egyanom ntsi, na ɔpaa hɔn asefo a wodzi hɔn ekyir no na ɔdze n’enyim nye no tum kɛse no, yii hom fii Egypt; 38dɛ orubotutu amanaman a wɔyɛ akɛse na wɔyɛ dzen sen hom efi enyim, dɛ ɔdze hom rokɔ mu, dze hɔn asaase akɛma hom dɛ ewungyadze, dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi. 39Dɛm ntsi hom nhu ndɛ da yi, na hom mfa nto hom akoma mu, dɛ EWURADZE nye Nyankopɔn wɔ sor nye asaase do: na obi nnyi hɔ bio. 40Na hom ndzi dzi n’ahyɛdze, nye ne mbransɛm a merehyɛ hom ndɛ da yi do, na eesi hom yie, na ɔnye hom mba a wodzi ekyir, na hom nda aawar wɔ asaase a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze rema hom no do daa.
Moses Yi Wipuei Guansumabew Ebiasa
41Nna Moses yiyii nkurow ebiasa wɔ Jordan egya a odzi ba wipuei no; 42dɛ onyimpakumfo a okum no nyɛnko awerɛfir mu, na ɔnntan no dada bi no, nguan nkɔ hɔ; na sɛ oguan kɔ nkurow yi kor mu a, oeenya nkwa: 43ɔno nye yi, oyii Bezer wɔ sar no do, wɔ ɔman tɛtɛr no mu maa Reubenfo; na Ramot wɔ Gilead, maa Gadfo; na Golan wɔ Basan maa Manaasɛfo.
44Na iyi nye mbra a Moses dze too Israelmba enyim: 45iyinom nye dase, nye ahyɛdze, nye ntsɛmbu a Moses kaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba, wɔ aber a wofii Egypt bae no; 46wɔ Jordan egya, Bɛt-peor tsentsendo ɔbɔn no mu, wɔ Amorifo hen Sihon a ɔtsenaa Hesbon a Moses nye Israelmba kum no wɔ aber a wofii Egypt bae no, n’asaase do: 47na wɔfaa n’asaase no yɛɛ hɔndze, na Basan hen Ɔge asaase no Amorifo ahemfo beenu no a wɔwɔ Jordan egya a odzi ba wipuei no; 48ofi Aroer a ɔwɔ Arnon ano no araa dze kodu bepɔw Sion a ɔnoara nye Hermon no ho, 49nye Araba nyinara wɔ Jordan egya boka afamu, mekyerɛ ɔdze kodu Araba epo ho, wɔ Pisga ntserɛwee ase.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 5
Content:
Mbrasɛm Du No
(Eksodɔs 20.1-17)
1Na Moses frɛɛ Israel nyinara, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ, Israel, hom ntsie ahyɛdze nye atsɛmbu a mereka no hom asomu ndɛ da yi, na hom eesua, na wɔaadwen do ayɛ. 2EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn nye hɛn dzii ahyɛmu wɔ Horeb. 3Nnyɛ hɛn egyanom na EWURADZE nye hɔn dzii ahyɛmu yi, mbom hɛn a, hɛnara a ndɛ da yi hɛn nyinara tsetse ase ha yi a. 4EWURADZE fii ogya no mu nye hom kasaa enyim nye enyim wɔ bepɔw no ho. 5Emi dze migyinaa EWURADZE nye hom ntamu aber no mu, dɛ merekyerɛ hom EWURADZE asɛm; na osian gya no ntsi hom suroi, na wɔammfow bepɔw no na ɔsee dɛ: 6Emi nye EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn a miyii wo fii Egypt asaase do, wɔ nkowaasom ofi mu no.
7Mma nnya enyame bi so nnka mo ho.
8Mma nnyɛ ohonyi bi, adze a ɔwɔ wimu ɔsor, anaa dza ɔwɔ asaase do famu, anaa dza ɔwɔ nsu mu wɔ asaase ase no su biara ne saso mma woho: 9mma mmbɔ wo mu adze mma hɔn, na nnsom hɔn: na emi EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn meyɛ Nyame nyinkufo a medze egyanom hɔn emumuyɛ mohwɛ mba kodu ebusuasantsen ebiasa nye anan a wɔtan me do; 10na muhu mpempem a wɔdɔ me na wodzi me mbransɛm do no mbɔbɔr.
11Mma mmbɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dzin gyangyan na EWURADZE nnkɛma nyia ɔbɔ ne dzin gyangyan no afa noho tɔtrɔtɔ.
12Dwen ahomgyeda no do sie no krɔnkrɔn, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ wo no. 13Nda esia na yɛ edwuma na dzi wo dwuma nyinara: 14na da a otsia esuon no yɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ahomgyeda: mma nnyɛ edwuma biara wɔ mu, ɔwo o, wo babanyin o, wo babaa o, w’akowaa o, w’afonabaa o, wo nantwi o, w’asoaso o, wo fiembowa mu biara o, wo hɔhoe a ɔwɔ wo kuropon mu o; ama w’akowaa nye w’afonabaa aahom dɛ ɔwo. 15Na kaa dɛ ɔwo yɛɛ akowaa wɔ Egypt asaase do, na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze nsa a ɔyɛ dzen nye abasa a wɔatsɛw mu yii wo fii hɔ: dɛm ntsi na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ wo dɛ sie ahomgyeda no.
16Dzi w’egya nye wo na nyi, dɛ mbrɛ wo Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ wo no: na wo nda aawar, na eesi wo yie, wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do.
17Mma nndzi ewu.
18Nkyii so nnto awar.
19Nkyii so nnwia adze.
20Nkyii so nngye wo nyɛnko ho dasewia.
21Nkyii so mma w’enyi mmber wo nyɛnko yer; nkyii so mma wo kɔn nndɔ wo nyɛnko fi, ne haban, anaa n’akowaa, anaa n’afonabaa, ne nantwi, anaa n’asoaso, anaa adze biara a ɔyɛ wo nyɛnko dze.
22Nsɛm yi na EWURADZE fi ogya, mununkum nye sum kebii no mu, dze ndze kɛse kaa kyerɛɛ hom baguaa no nyinara wɔ bepɔw no do: na wɔammfa bi annka ho. Na ɔkyerɛɛw no wɔ abopon ebien do, na ɔdze maa me.
Ɔman No No Suro
(Eksodɔs 20.18-21)
23Na ɔbaa dɛ, aber a hom tsee ndze no wɔ sum no mu, wɔ aber a bepɔw no dzɛɛw gya no, hom twee piin me nkyɛn, mekyerɛ hom ebusuakuw mu etsitsir nyinara, nye hom mpanyimfo; 24na hom see dɛ, Hwɛ, EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn eyi n’enyimnyam nye ne kɛseyɛ akyerɛ hɛn, na yɛatse ne ndze wɔ gya no mu: ndɛ da yi na yeehu dɛ Nyankopɔn nye nyimpa kasa, naaso ɔtsena ase. 25Dɛm ntsi afei ebɛnadze ntsi na yenwu? Osiandɛ gya kɛse yi rebɛhyew hɛn: sɛ yɛtse EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn ndze bio a, ɔno yebowuwu. 26Na honam nyinara mu woana na ɔatse Nyankopɔn tseasefo ndze dɛ ofi ogya mu rekasa, dɛ mbrɛ hɛn yɛatse yi, na ɔtsena ase? 27Woara twe pin, na tsie dza EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn bɛse nyinara: na woara bɛka dza EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn bɛka akyerɛ wo nyinara kyerɛ hɛn; na yebetsie, na yɛayɛ. 28Na EWURADZE tsee hom nsɛm no ndze, aber a hom kasaa kyerɛɛ me no; na EWURADZE see me dɛ, Matse ɔman yi nsɛm no a wɔaka akyerɛ wo no ndze: dza wɔaka no nyinara, wɔase no yie. 29Ao kɛtseankyɛ woeenya dɛm akoma wɔ hɔn mu, dɛ wɔdze bosuro me, na woedzi me mbransɛm nyinara do daa daa, na eesi hɔn na ɔnye hɔn mba yie daa! 30Kɔ kɛse hɔn dɛ, Hom nsan nkɔ hom asesee mu. 31Na ɔwo dze, gyina me nkyɛn ha, na menka mbrasɛm, nye ahyɛdze, nye atsɛmbu a edze bɛkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn no nyinara menkyerɛ wo, na wɔnyɛ no wɔ asaase a medze rema hɔn dɛ wɔmfa no do. 32Dɛm ntsi hom ndwen do nyɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ahyɛ hom no: mma hom nndan mmfa enyimfa anaa abankum. 33Hom nnantsew kwan no a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ahyɛ hom no nyinara mu, na hom aatsena ase, na eesi hom yie, na hom nda aawar wɔ asaase a hom rekɛfa no do.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 6
Content:
Mbrasɛm Kɛse No
1Afei iyi nye mbrasɛm, ahyɛdze, nye atsɛmbu a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa nkyerɛkyerɛ hom, na hom nyɛ no wɔ asaase a hom rutwa mu akɛfa no do: 2na eesuro EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, eedzi n’ahyɛdze nye ne mbransɛm a merehyɛ wo yi nyinara do, ɔwo, nye wo babanyin, nye wo babanyin ne babanyin, wo nkwa nda nyinara; na wo nda aawar. 3Dɛm ntsi, Israel tsie, na dwen do yɛ; na eesi wo yie, na hom aadɔr pii, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE, w’egyanom Nyankopɔn abɔ wo anohoba no, wɔ asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do no do.
4Israel, tsie: EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ EWURADZE kor: 5na fa w’akoma nyinara, na ɔnye wo kra nyinara na ɔnye w’ahoɔdzen nyinara dɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn. 6Na nsɛm yi a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi, ɔnko w’akoma do; 7na fa kyerɛkyerɛ wo mba yie, na twetwe ho nkɔmbɔ aber a etse wo fie, nye aber a enam ɔkwan mu, nye aber a ereda, nye aber a erosoɛr. 8Na fa yɛ asɛnkyerɛdze bɔ w’abaw do, na ɔnyɛ w’enyiwa ntamu nkaakyekyeree. 9Na kyerɛw no wɔ wo fie mpondua ho, nye wo mbobotsen ho.
Asoɔdzen Ho Kɔkɔbɔ
10Na ɔbɛba dɛ, sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze wo du asaase a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ w’egyanom, Abraham, Isaak nye Jakob, dɛ ɔdze rema wo no do; nkurow akɛse fɛɛfɛw a nnyɛ ɔwo na ekyekyeree, 11nye adan a ndzepa nyinara ahyɛ no amaama a nnyɛ ɔwo na edze hyɛɛ mu, nye mbura a woetutu a nnyɛ ɔwo na itutui, wenyin nture nye olive ndua a nnyɛ ɔwo na etsetsɛwee, na sɛ idzidzi na emee a; 12ɔno hwɛ yie bɛyɛ na wo werɛ efir EWURADZE a oyii wo fii Egypt asaase do, wɔ nkowaasom ofi mu no. 13Suro EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn; na ɔno na som no, na ka ne dzin ho ntam. 14Mma hom nndzi enyame fofor a wofi aman a woetwa hom ho ehyia no enyame mu ekyir; 15na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn a ɔwɔ wo mu no yɛ Nyame nyinkufo; bɛyɛ na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ebufuw adzɛw wɔ wo do, na ɔasɛɛ wo efi asaase enyi.
16Mma hom nnsɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn nnhwɛ, dɛ mbrɛ hom sɔɔ no hwɛe wɔ Massa no. 17Hom ndzi EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ne mbransɛm, nye ne dasesɛm, nye n’ahyɛdze a ɔdze ahyɛ wo no do yie. 18Na yɛ dza ɔtsen na oye wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do; na eesi wo yie, na aakɔ akɛfa asaase pa a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ w’egyanom no, 19na eetu w’atamfo nyinara efi w’enyim, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE aka no.
20Sɛ daakye bi wo babanyin bisa wo dɛ, Dasesɛm nye ahyɛdze, nye atsɛmbu a EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn dze hyɛɛ hom yi ase nye dɛn a? 21Ɔno se wo ba no dɛ, Nna yɛyɛ Farao no nkowaa wɔ Egypt; na EWURADZE dze nsa a ɔyɛ dzen yii hɛn fii Egypt: 22na EWURADZE kyerɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze, akɛse yayaayaw, wɔ Egypt, Farao, nye ne fi nyinara do, wɔ hɛn enyiwa mu: 23na oyii hɛn fii hɔ dɛ ɔdze hɛn reba, dze asaase a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hɛn egyanom abɛma hɛn. 24Na EWURADZE hyɛɛ hɛn dɛ yɛnyɛ ahyɛdze yi nyinara, yensuro EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn, wɔ hɛn yie ntsi, na ɔaagye hɛn nkwa, dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi. 25Na ɔbɛyɛ tsenenee ama hɛn, sɛ yɛdwen do dzi mbrasɛm yi nyinara do wɔ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn enyim, dɛ mbrɛ ɔahyɛ hɛn no a.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 7
Content:
EWURADZE Ne Man No No Krɔnkrɔnyɛ
(Eksodɔs 34.11-16)
1Sɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze hom du asaase a hom rokɔ akɛfa no do, na ɔpam amanaman pii wɔ hom enyim, Hitifo, Gergasfo, Amorifo, Keenanfo, Perizfo, Hivifo, nye Jebusfo, amanaman esuon a wɔyɛ akɛse na wɔyɛ dzen sen hom no; 2na sɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn yi hɔn ma wɔ hom enyim, na hom ku hɔn a; ɔno hom nsɛɛ hɔn pasapasa; mma hom nnye hɔn nndzi ahyɛmu, na mma hom nnhu hɔn mbɔbɔr so: 3nkyii so mma hom nnye hɔn nndzi awarwar; mma mmfa hom mbabaa mma hom mbabanyin, mma hom nngye hɔn mbabaa so awar mma hom mbabanyin. 4Na wɔbɛdan hom mbabanyin enyi ma woeegyaa m’ekyir dzi, na waakɔsom enyame fofor; ma EWURADZE ebufuw adzɛw hom do, na ɔasɛɛ hom ntsɛm. 5Mbom mbrɛ hom nye hɔn ndzi no nye yi; hom ndwuruw hɔn afɔrmbukyia na wombubu hɔn edum mu esinesin, na wontwitwa hɔn abosompɔw Aserim no ngu, na wɔmfa gya nhyew hɔn ehonyi a wɔasen no. 6Na hom yɛ ɔman krɔnkrɔn ma EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn: EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn asan mu eyi hom dɛ bɛyɛ nankasa no soronko ɔman wɔ aman a wɔwɔ asaase enyi nyinara mu. 7Nnyɛ dɛ hom dodow so sen ɔman biara ntsi na EWURADZE dze no dɔ sii hom do, na eso ɔsaan mu yii hom: na hom suar dodow wɔ aman nyinara mu. 8Mbom osiandɛ EWURADZE dɔ hom, na ɔpɛ dɛ odzi ne ntam a ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hom egyanom no do ntsi, na EWURADZE dze nsa a ɔyɛ dzen eyi hom, na ɔapon hom efi no mu, wɔ Egypthen Farao nsamu. 9Dɛm ntsi hom nhu dɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn, ɔno nye Nyankopɔn; Nyame nokwafo a osie ahyɛmu nye mbɔbɔrhu ma hɔn a wɔdɔ no na wodzi ne mbransɛm do dze kodu ebusuasantsen apem do; 10na otua hɔn a wɔtan no kaw dze bɔ hɔn enyim, dze sɛɛ hɔn: ɔrennyɛ nyaa mma nyia ɔtan no, obotua no kaw dze abɔ enyim. 11Dɛm ntsi dzi mbrasɛm, nye atsɛmbu a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi do, na yɛ.
Setsie Do Nhyira
(Deuteronomi 28.1-14)
12Na ɔbɛba dɛ, osiandɛ hom tsie atsɛmbu yi, na wodzi do, na wɔyɛ no, EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn so bedzi ahyɛmu nye mbɔbɔrhu a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hom egyanom no do ama hom: 13na ɔbɔdɔ hom, na oehyira hom, na ɔama hom adɔr: na so oehyira hom honam mu aba na hom asaase mu aba, hom eburow nye hom nsa hom wo ngo, hom anantwi mu ngu mu nye hom nguankuw mu mburwa, wɔ asaase a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hom egyanom dɛ ɔdze bɛma hom no do. 14Wobehyira hom asen aman nyinara: ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa anaa hom fiembowa biar rennyɛ ɔbɔnyin wɔ hom mu. 15Na EWURADZE beyi yarba nyinara efi hom do; na ɔremmfa Egypt yarba bɔn a hom nyim no bi nnto hom do, na ɔdze bɔto hɔn a wɔtan hom nyinara do. 16Na hom bɛhyew aman a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn beyi hɔn ama hom no nyinara; mma hom enyi nnhu hɔn mbɔbɔr: nkyii so mma hom nnsom hɔn enyame; na ɔno bɛyɛ efir ama hom. 17Sɛ hom se wɔ hom akoma mu dɛ, Amanaman yi dɔɔ so sen hɛn; na yɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yeetum etu hɔn a, 18mma nnsuro hɔn: kaa dza EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze yɛɛ Farao, nye Egypt nyinara no yie; 19nsɔhwɛ akɛse no a hom enyiwa hunii, nye nsɛnkyerɛdze, nye anwanwadze, nye nsa a ɔyɛ dzen, nye abasa a wɔatserɛw mu a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze yii hom no: dɛmara na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn bɛyɛ aman a hom suro hɔn no nyinara. 20Nkyii so EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn bɔsoma nkotokrodo wɔ hɔn mu, ekodu dɛ hɔn a wɔaka, na woesuma hɔnho no, bɛhera wɔ hom enyim. 21Mma hɔn ho nnyɛ hom hu: na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn wɔ hom finimfin, Nyame kɛse a no ho yɛ hu no a. 22Na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn bɛpam amanaman no efi hom enyim nkakrankakra: mma hom nnhyew hɔn prɛko, bɛyɛ na haban mu mbowa adɔɔ so hom wo do. 23Na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn beyi hɔn ama wɔ hom enyim, na ɔdze ɔkogu kɛse bɛka hɔn egu, ekodu dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ. 24Na obeyi hɔn ahemfo ahyɛ hom nsa, na hom aama hɔn dzin ayera efi wiadze: nyimpa biara runntum nngyina hom enyim, ekodu dɛ hom asɛɛ hɔn. 25Hom mfa gya nhyew hɔn enyame ehonyi a wɔasen no: mma hom enyi mmber hɔn ho dwetɛ anaa sika, na so mma hom nnyiyi mmfa, bɛyɛ na woesua hom efir wɔ mu: na ɔyɛ ekyiwadze ma EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn: 26na mma hom mmfa ekyiwadze nnkɔ hom fie, na hom aannyɛ ebusudze dɛ ɔno: ma ɔnyɛ hom tantan koraa, na hom nkyir hɔn koraa: na ɔyɛ ebusudze.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 8
Content:
Asetsena mu Ahwɛyie
1Mbransɛm a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi nyinara hom ndwen do nyɛ, na hom aatsena ase, na wɔaadɔr, na wɔaakɔ akɛfa asaase a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hom egyanom no. 2Na hom nkaa ɔkwan nyinara a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn egya wo wɔ mu mfe eduanan yi wɔ sar no do no, dɛ ɔrebrɛ hom adze, asɔ hom ahwɛ, ehu dza ɔwɔ hom akoma mu, dɛ hom bedzi ne mbransɛm do, anaa oho. 3Na ɔbrɛɛ hom adze, na ɔmaa ɔkɔm dzee hom, na ɔdze manna a hom nnyim, na hom egyanom so nnyim maa hom dzii; na ɔaama hom ehu dɛ nnyɛ edziban nko bi na nyimpa nam do tsena ase, na asɛm biara a ofi EWURADZE anomu so nyimpa nam do tsena ase. 4Hom nkataho ennsuw wɔ hom ho, nkyii so w’anan annhohon mfe eduanan yi mu. 5Na dwen wɔ w’akoma mu dɛ, dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa tsea ne ba no, dɛmara so na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn tsea wo. 6Na hom ndzi EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ne mbransɛm do, dɛ hom bɛnantsew n’akwan do, na hom esuro no. 7Na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze hom rokɔ asaase pa do, asaase a no do wɔ nworansu, nsunyiwa nye ebun a ofifi abɔn nye akoko mu pem no; 8asaase a ewifua nye atoko, nye wenyinndua nye adɔmbandua nye pɔmegranate ekutu wɔ do; asaase a olive na ewo wɔ do no; 9asaase a irinndzi edziban a wɔ do, adze biara so rinnhia wo wɔ do; asaase a n’abo yɛ dadze, na n’akokoe mu na hom botu boran. 10Na sɛ hom bedzidzi mee a, hom na nhyira EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn wɔ asaase pa a ɔdze ama hom no ntsi. 11Hom nhwɛ yie ɔno bɛyɛ na hom werɛ efir EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dɛ hom rinndzi ne mbransɛm, nye ne ntsɛmbu nye n’ahyɛdze a merehyɛ hom ndɛ da yi do: 12bɛyɛ so na hom edzidzi amee, na hom esisi adan fɛɛfɛw, atsenatsena mu; 13na sɛ hom anantwikuw nye hom nguankuw adɔr, na hom dwetɛ nye hom sika adɔɔ so, na adze a hom wɔ nyinara adɔɔ so a; 14nkyɛ hom akoma amema no ho do, na hom werɛ efir EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a oyii hom fii Egypt asaase do, wɔ nkowaasom ofi mu no; 15nyia ogyaa hom faa sar kɛse huhuhuhu no do, mbrɛ mbowatsena a bɔr wɔ hɔn ano nye nyankoma nketsebowa wɔ, nye asaase kwawee mbrɛ nsu nnyi; nyia oyi nsu fii ɔtwerɛbo botan mu maa hom; 16nyia ɔdze manna a hom egyanom nnyim nyɛɛn hom wɔ sar no do; dɛ ɔdze rebrɛ hom adze, na ɔasɔ hom ahwɛ, na ɔayɛ hom yie wɔ hom ewiei ekyir no mu: 17na sɛ wɔ hom akoma mu dɛ, Hɛn tum nye hɔn nsa ne dzen na wɔama yenya ahonya yi. 18Na hom nkaa EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn, na ɔno na ɔmaa hom tum dɛ hom mfa nya homho; na ɔaama n’ahyɛmu a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hom egyanom no etsim, dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi. 19Na ɔbɛba dɛ, sɛ hom werɛ fir EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn, na hom kedzi enyame fofor ekyir, na esom hɔn, na hom sɔr hɔn a, midzi hom dase ndɛ da yi, dɛ ɔsɛɛ na hom bɛsɛɛ. 20Dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE sɛɛ amanaman fi hom enyim no, dɛmara na hom bɛsɛɛ; osiandɛ hom enntsie EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ndze no.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 9
Content:
Israelmba Hɔn Asoɔdzen
(Eksodɔs 32.1-35)
1Israel, tsie: rubotwa Jordan ndɛ da yi, akɔ akɛfa amanaman a wɔyɛ akɛse na wɔyɛ dzen sen ɔwoara, nkurow akɛse a wɔatotow ho afasu edu sor, 2ɔman a wɔyɛ akɛse na wɔwowaree, Anakfo mbabanyin a inyim hɔn, na atse dɛ wɔka no hɔn ho dɛ, Woana na obotum egyina Anak mbabanyin no enyim? 3Dɛm ntsi hu ndɛ da yi, dɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn nye nyia odzi w’enyim rukotwa dɛ ogya a ɔmemen; ɔbɛsɛɛ hɔn, na ɔabrɛ hɔn adze wɔ w’enyim ma eetu hɔn, na ama wɔaasɛɛ ntsɛm, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE aka akyerɛ wo no. 4EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enya etu hɔn efi w’enyim egu no, mma nnka wɔ w’akoma mu dɛ, Me ndzeyɛtsenenee ntsi na EWURADZE dze me aba dɛ mebɛfa asaase yi: naaso na amanaman yi hɔn ndzebɔnyɛ ntsi na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn rutu hɔn efi w’enyim. 5Nnyɛ wo ndzeyɛtsenenee, anaa w’akoma ne tsenenee ntsi na erokɔ akɛfa hɔn asaase: mbom amanaman yi hɔn ndzebɔnyɛ ntsi na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn rutu hɔn efi w’enyim, na ɔaama asɛm a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ w’egyanom, Abraham, Isaak, nye Jakob no etsim. 6Dɛm ntsi hu dɛ nnyɛ wo ndzeyɛtsenenee bi ntsi na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze asaase pa yi rema wo dɛ fa; na ɔman akɔnkyefo nye wo. 7Kaa, mma wo werɛ mmfir, mbrɛ isii yii EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ebufuw wɔ sar no do; ofi da a ifii Egypt asaase do edze bodur dɛ hom baa bea yi do yi, hom atsew etua wɔ EWURADZE do. 8Na Horeb so hom yii EWURADZE ebufuw, na EWURADZE no bo fuuw hom dɛ nkyɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ hom. 9Aber a mofoow bepɔw no dɛ merekɛgye abopon no, mekyerɛ ahyɛmu a EWURADZE nye hom dzii n’apon no, nna metsenaa bepɔw no do adaduanan adzekyee nye adzesaa; menndzi edziban mannom nsu so. 10Na EWURADZE dze abopon ebien a wɔdze Nyankopɔn nsatseaba akyerɛw do no maa me; na no do na wɔakyerɛw nsɛm no nyinara a ofi gya mu wɔ bepɔw no do nye hom kasae wɔ nguabɔ da no mu no. 11Na ɔbaa dɛ adaduanan adzekyee nye adzesaa n’ewiei no, EWURADZE dze abopon ebien no, mekyerɛ ahyɛmu apon no, maa me. 12Na EWURADZE see me dɛ, Soɛr, fi ha sian ntsɛm; na wo man a ikeyii hɔn wɔ Egypt no asɛɛ hɔnho; wɔadan efi ɔkwan a mehyɛɛ hɔn no do ntsɛm; wɔayɛ ohonyi a woegu ama hɔnho. 13Nkyii so EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ me dɛ, Mehu ɔman yi, na, hwɛ, wɔyɛ ɔman asoɔdzenfo: 14gyaa me ma mensɛɛ hɔn, na mempepa hɔn dzin mfi ɔsor ase: na menyɛ wo ɔman a ɔyɛ dzen na ɔso sen hɔn. 15Nna medanee na mifii bepɔw no do sianee, na bepɔw no dzɛɛw gya: nna ahyɛmu apon ebien no kitsakitsa me nsamu. 16Na mohwɛe, na, hwɛ, hom ayɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn; hom ayɛ ɔnantwiba a woegu ama hom ho: hom adan efi ɔkwan a EWURADZE hyɛɛ hom no do afa nkyɛn ntsɛm. 17Na musuoo apon ebien no mu, na motowee fii me nsa ebien no mu gui, na mobobɔɔ no wɔ hom enyim. 18Na mohwee ase wɔ EWURADZE enyim, dɛ ahyɛse no, adaduanan adzekyee nye adzesaa; menndzi edziban, mannom nsu so; osian hom bɔn nyinara a hom yɛe no ntsi, dɛ wɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do, dze yii no ebufuw. 19Na musuroo ebufuw nye ebufuhyew a EWURADZE nyaa no hom ho dɛ ɔdze rebɛsɛɛ hom no. Na EWURADZE tsiee me aber no mu so. 20Na EWURADZE nyaa Aaron ho ebufuw dodoodow dɛ nkyɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ no; na mepaa kyɛw maa Aaron so aber no ara mu. 21Na mefaa hom bɔn a ɔyɛ ɔnantwiba no a hom yɛe no, ma medze gya hyeew no, na misiwii, nyaam no mokomoko kodur dɛ ɔyɛɛ fekɔfekɔ dɛ huntuma: na motoow no huntuma no guu ɔwora no a ofi bepɔw no do pem no mu. 22Na Tabera, nye Massa, nye Kibrot-hataava so hom yii EWURADZE ebufuw. 23Na aber a EWURADZE somaa hom fi Kades-barnea, dɛ, Hom mfow nkɛfa asaase a medze mama hom no, nna hom tseew etua wɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn mbrasɛm do, na hom anngye no enndzi, na woenntsie ne ndze so. 24Hom ayɛ EWURADZE do etuatsewfo ara fi da a muhun hom no. 25Dɛm ntsi na mohwee ase wɔ EWURADZE enyim adzekyee nye adzesaa adaduanan; osiandɛ EWURADZE ase dɛ ɔrebɛsɛɛ hom. 26Na mepaa EWURADZE kyɛw, see dɛ, Ao EWURADZE Nyankopɔn, mma nnsɛɛ wo man nye w’egyapadze a enam wo kɛseyɛ do apon hɔn a edze nsa a ɔyɛ dzen eyi hɔn wɔ Egypt no. 27Kaa wo nkowaa, Abraham, Isaak, nye Jakob; mma nnhwɛ ɔman yi hɔn asoɔdzen, nye hɔn ndzeyɛbɔn, nye hɔn bɔn so: 28ɔno bɛyɛ na asaase a iyii hɔn fii do no ase dɛ, Osiandɛ EWURADZE enntum ammfa hɔn annkɔ asaase a ɔbɔɔ hɔn ho anohoba no do, na osiandɛ ɔtan hɔn ntsi, na ɔdze hɔn efir edzi dɛ orukokuku hɔn wɔ sar no do. 29Naaso wɔyɛ wo man nye w’egyapadze a enam wo tum kɛse nye w’abasa a wɔatsɛw mu do eyi hɔn.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 10
Content:
Abopon No Ho Asɛm
1Aber no mu na EWURADZE see me dɛ, sen abopon ebien a ɔtse dɛ kan dze no ma woho, na fow bra me nkyɛn wɔ bepɔw no do, na yɛ duadaka ma woho. 2Na mebɛkyerɛw nsɛm a ɔwɔ nkan no apon a ebobɔɔ no no do no, wɔ apon no do, na fa hyɛ adaka no mu. 3Nna meyɛɛ akeesia duadaka, na meseen abopon ebien a ɔtse dɛ kan dze no, na mofoow bepɔw no, na apon ebien no kitsa me nsamu. 4Na EWURADZE kyerɛɛw apon no do, dɛ mbrɛ kan no nkyerɛwee no tse, mbransɛm du no a ɔnoara fi gya no mu kaa kyerɛɛ hom wɔ bepɔw no do nguabɔ da no: na ɔdze maa me. 5Na medanee fii bepɔw no do sianee, na medze apon no bɛhyɛɛ adaka a meyɛe no mu; na hɔ na ɔwɔ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ me no. 6Na Israelmba tui fii Beerot Bene-jaakan kɔr Mosera: hɔ na Aaron wui, na hɔ na wosiee no; na ne babanyin Eleazar hyɛɛ n’ananmu dzii ɔsɔfo. 7Wofi hɔ tui kɔr Gudgoda; na wofi Gudgoda kɔr Jotbata, asaase a nworansu wɔ do. 8Aber no mu na EWURADZE yii Levi ebusuakuw, dɛ wɔnsoa EWURADZE ahyɛmudaka no, wongyina EWURADZE enyim nsom no, na wonhyira wɔ ne dzin mu, a wɔayɛ araa dze ebodu ndɛ da yi. 9Dɛm ntsi na Levi ennya kyɛfa nye egyapadze wɔ no nuanom mu; EWURADZE nye n’egyapadze, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn kaa kyerɛɛ no no. 10Na misiankae wɔ bepɔw no do, dɛ asɔpɔn no, adzekyee nye adzesaa adaduanan: na EWURADZE tsiee me aber no mu so; na EWURADZE ammpɛ dɛ ɔsɛɛ wo. 11Na EWURADZE see me dɛ, Soɛr, tu wo kwan kedzi ɔman no enyim; ma wɔnkɔ nkɛfa asaase a mekaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hɔn egyanom dɛ medze mebɛma hɔn no.
EWURADZE N’apɛdze
12Na afei, Israel, ebɛnadze na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn rohwehwɛ wɔ wo hɔ, kyɛn dɛ ibosuro EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, ebɛnantsew n’akwan nyinara do, na adɔ no, na edze w’akoma nyinara nye wo kra nyinara asom EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, 13na edzi EWURADZE mbransɛm, nye n’ahyɛdze a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi do wɔ wo yieyɛ ntsi? 14Hwɛ, ɔsor dzi wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, nye ɔsor no sor, asaase, nye dza ɔwɔ mu nyinara. 15W’egyanom nko na EWURADZE nyaa hɔn ho enyika dɛ ɔbɔdɔ hɔn, na ɔsaan mu yii hɔn asefo a wodzi hɔn ekyir no, mekyerɛ homara, wɔ aman nyinara mu, dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi. 16Dɛm ntsi hom ntwitwa hom akoma twatsia na mma wɔnnyɛ asoɔdzen bio. 17Na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn, ɔno nye enyame mu Nyame, nye ewuradze mu EWURADZE, Nyame kɛse no, Otumfo a no ho yɛ hu a ɔnnhwɛ nyimpa enyim, na onndzi mboaba. 18Odzi egyanka nye okunafo hɔn asɛm, na ɔdɔ ɔhɔho, ɔma no edziban nye akataho. 19Dɛm ntsi hom ndɔ ahɔho: osiandɛ ho so hom yɛɛ ahɔho wɔ Egypt asaase do. 20Suro EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn; ɔno na som no; na ɔno na takyer no ho, na ne dzin ho na ka ntam. 21Ɔno nye w’ayɛyi, na ɔno nye wo Nyankopɔn a ɔayɛ ndzɛmba akɛse a ɔyɛ hu a w’enyiwa ehu yi ama wo. 22Nyimpa eduosuon na w’egyanom dze sianee kɔr Egypt; na afei EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ayɛ wo ɔdodow dɛ ɔsor nworaba.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 11
Content:
EWURADZE Ne Kɛseyɛ
