1Dɛm ntsi dɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, na sie n’ahwɛdodze, nye n’ahyɛdze, nye ne atsɛmbu, nye ne mbransɛm dabaa. 2Na hom nhu ndɛ da yi: na mennkasa nnkyerɛ hom mba a wonnyim, na wonnhun EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ntsea, ne kɛseyɛ, ne nsa a ɔyɛ dzen, nye n’abasa a wɔatserɛw mu, 3nye ne nsɛnkyerɛdze, nye no ndwuma a ɔyɛe no wɔ Egypt tsiaa Egypthen Farao, nye n’asaase nyinara; 4nye dza ɔdze yɛɛ Egyptdɔm, nye hɔn mpɔnkɔ, nye hɔn ntseaseanam; mbrɛ ɔmaa Mbɛw Po nsu praam hɔn do aber a woritsiw hom, na mbrɛ EWURADZE asɛɛ hɔn ebodu ndɛ da yi; 5nye dza ɔdze yɛɛ hom wɔ sar no do, bodur dɛ hom baa bea yi do; 6na dza ɔdze yɛɛ Datan nye Abiram, Reuben ne babanyin Eliab mbabanyin no; mbrɛ asaase buee n’ano, na ɔmeen hɔn, nye hɔn efifo, nye hɔn asesee, nye enyikandze biara a odzii hɔn ekyir, wɔ Israel nyinara finimfin no: 7na hom enyiwa ehu edwuma kɛse a EWURADZE yɛe no nyinara. 8Dɛm ntsi hom ndzi mbrasɛm a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi nyinara do, na hom ho aayɛ dzen, na hom aakɛfa asaase a hom rutwa mu akɔ do akɛfa no; 9na hom nda aawar wɔ asaase a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hom egyanom dɛ ɔdze bɛma hɔn na hɔn asefo no do, asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do. 10Na asaase no, mbrɛ irutwa mu akɔ do akɛfa no, ɔnntse dɛ Egypt asaase, mbrɛ hom fi bae no, mbrɛ epe w’aba, na edze w’anan petse do nsu, dɛ fan ture no: 11na asaase no, mbrɛ hom rutwa mu akɛfa no, yɛ akoko nye abɔn asaase, na ɔnom ɔsor nyankom mu nsu; 12asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn hwɛ do; EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn n’enyiwa wɔ do dabaa, ofi afe n’ahyɛse araa kodu afe n’ewiei.
13Na ɔbɛba dɛ, sɛ hom tsie me mbransɛm a merehyɛ hom ndɛ da yi yie, dɛ hom dze hom akoma nyinara nye hom kra nyinara bɔdɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn, na hom asom no a, 14ɔno mebɛma hom asaase do nsɔ atɔ wɔ n’aber mu, esusow nye ɔbɛsɛ, ma aaboaboa w’eburow, nye wo nsa, nye wo ngo ano. 15Na mebɛma wo haban mu aba nkyɛkyɛr ama wo fiembowa, na eedzidzi amee. 16Hom nhwɛ homho yie, ma wɔanndaadaa hom akoma, na hom aanndan ammfa nkyɛn, na hom aannkɔsom enyame fofor, na hom aannsɔr hɔn; 17na EWURADZE n’ebufuw aanndzɛw wɔ hom do, na ɔaanntow ɔsor mu, dɛ nsu nntɔ, na asaase mma no ndɔbaa; na hom aannhera ntsɛmara wɔ asaase pa a EWURADZE dze rema hom no do. 18Dɛm ntsi hom mfa me nsɛm yi nsie hom akoma nye hom kra mu; na hom mfa nyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze mbɔ hom abaw do, na ɔnyɛ nkaakyekyeree wɔ hom enyiwa ntamu. 19Na hom mfa nkyerɛkyerɛ hom mba, twetwe ho nkɔmbɔ aber a etse wo fie, nye aber a enam ɔkwan mu, nye aber a ereda, nye aber a erosoɛr. 20Na kyerɛw no wɔ wo fi mpondua ho, na wo mbotsen ho: 21ama hom nda, nye hom mba nda aadɔɔ so wɔ asaase a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hom egyanom dɛ ɔdze bɛma hɔn no do, dɛ ɔsor nda wɔ asaase do. 22Na sɛ hom bɔdɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn, hom anantsew n’akwan nyinara do, na hom atakyer no ho a; 23ɔnodze EWURADZE botutu amanaman yi nyinara efi hom enyim, na hom afa amanaman akɛse a wɔyɛ dzen sen homara. 24Beebiara a hom anamɔn betsia no bɛyɛ homdze: ofi sar no do, nye Lebanon, ofi esutsen Eufrates ho ara kodu ekyirekyir epo no ho bɛyɛ hom he. 25Nyimpa biara runntum nngyina hom enyim: EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze hom ho suro nye hom ho hu bogu asaase a hom betsia do nyinara do, dɛ mbrɛ ɔaka akyerɛ hom no.
Nhyira Na Ndom
26Hwɛ, medze nhyira nye ndom mirisi hom enyim ndɛ da yi; 27nhyira no, sɛ hom tsie EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn mbransɛm a merehyɛ hom ndɛ da yi a; 28na ndom no, sɛ hom enntsie EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn mbransɛm, na hom dan fi ɔkwan a merehyɛ hom ndɛ da yi do fa nkyɛn dɛ worikedzi enyame fofor a hom nnyim hɔn ekyir a.
29Na ɔbɛba dɛ, sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze wo du asaase a erokɔ akɛfa no do a, ibesi nhyira no wɔ bepɔw Gerizim do, na ndom no wɔ bepɔw Ebal do. 30Ana wonnyi Jordan egya, witɔree kwan no ekyir, wɔ Keenanfo a wɔtse Araba do no asaase do, Gilgal tsentsendo, wɔ More nsudur ho bi a? 31Na hom rubotwa Jordan akɔ akɛfa asaase a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze rema hom no, na hom bɛfa, na hom atsena do. 32Na hom ndwen do nyɛ ahyɛdze nye atsɛmbu a medze mirisi hom enyim ndɛ da yi nyinara.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 12
Content:
Beebi a Wɔnsom Nyankopɔn
1Iyinom nye ahyɛdze nye ntsɛmbu a hom ndwen do nyɛ wɔ asaase a EWURADZE, w’egyanom Nyankopɔn dze ama wo dɛ fa no do, nda a hom dze tse asaase do nyinara. 2Ɔsɛɛ na hom nsɛɛ mbeambea nyinara a amanaman a hom rekɛfa no som hɔn enyame, mbepɔw atsentsen do, nye akoko do, nye dua momon biara ase; 3na hom ndwuruw hɔn afɔrmbukyia, na wombubu hɔn edum mu esinesin, na wɔmfa gya nhyew hɔn Aserim; na hom ntwitwa hɔn enyame ehonyi a woesinsian no mu ngu, na hom nsɛɛ hɔn dzin mfi bea no do. 4Mma hom nnyɛ dɛm mma EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn. 5Mbom beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi wɔ hom ebusuakuw nyinara mu dɛ ɔdze ne dzin bɔto hɔ no, mekyerɛ ne tsenabew no na hom nhwehwɛ, na hɔ na hom kɔ; 6na hɔ na hom mfa hom ɔhyew afɔr, nye hom okum afɔr, nye hom ebupɛn du du nye hom nsamu ɔmado afɔr, nye hom anohobadze, nye hom ayamuyi afɔr, nye hom anantwikuw nye hom nguankuw mu mbakan nkɔ: 7na hɔ na hom ndzidzi wɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn enyim, na hom nye hom efifo, hom enyi ngye wɔ adze nyinara a hom dze hom nsa ka a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ehyira wo wɔ mu no mu. 8Mma hom nnyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ndzɛmba a yɛreyɛ wɔ ha ndɛ da yi mu biara tse yi a nyimpa biara yɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ nankasa n’enyiwa do no: 9na hom nnyae nndur ahomgye nye egyapadze a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze rema hom no mu. 10Mbom sɛ hom nya twa Jordan, na hom kɛtsena asaase a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn rema hom enya edzi no do, na ɔma hom ahomgye fi hom atamfo nyinara a woetwa hom ho ehyia ho, na hom tsena dwudwoodwo a; 11ɔno ɔbɛba dɛ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi ma ne dzin atsena hɔ no, hɔ na hom mfa dza merehyɛ hom no nyinara nkɔ; hom ɔhyew afɔr, nye hom okum afɔr, hom ebupɛn du du, nye hom nsamu ɔmado afɔr, nye hom soronko anohobadze a hom bɔ ma EWURADZE no nyinara: 12na hom mma hom enyi ngye wɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn enyim, hom, nye hom mbabanyin, nye hom mbabaa, nye hom nkowaa, nye hom mfonabaa, nye Levinyi a ɔwɔ hom kuropon mu, susuampa dɛ onnyi kyɛfa anaa egyapadze wɔ hom mu no. 13Hom nhwɛ hom ho yie mma hom aammbɔ hom hyew afɔr wɔ beebiara a hom hu; 14gyedɛ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE bɛsan mu eyi wɔ hom ebusuakuw kor mu, hɔ na hom mbɔ hom hyew afɔr, na hɔ na hom nyɛ dza merehyɛ hom nyinara. 15Naaso ku na dzi nam wɔ wo kuropon nyinara mu, dɛ mbrɛ wo kra no kɔn dɔ nyinara, dɛ mbrɛ nhyira a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze ehyira wo no tse: nyia no ho nntsew nye nyimpa no ho tsew ndzi bi, dɛ adoa, nye dɛ ɔtrɔm. 16Bɔgya no nko na mma hom nndzi; hue gu famu dɛ nsu. 17Mma nndzi w’eburow, anaa wo nsa, anaa wo ngo mu ebupɛn du du wɔ wo kuropon mu, anaa w’anantwikuw anaa wo nguankuw mu mbakan, nye w’anohobadze biara a ebɔ ho anohoba, nye w’ayamuyi afɔr, nye wo nsamu ɔmado afɔr: 18mbom dzi no wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim wɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi no, ɔwo, nye wo babanyin, nye wo babaa, nye w’akowaa, nye w’afonabaa, nye Levinyi a ɔwɔ wo kuropon mu: na ma w’enyi ngye wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim wɔ dza wo nsa ka nyinara ho. 19Hwɛ woho yie amma aammpow Levinyi aber tsentsen nyina a edze tse w’asaase do nyinara mu.
20Sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn trɛw wo he mu, dɛ mbrɛ ɔabɔ wo anohoba no, na ese dɛ, mibedzi nam, osiandɛ wo kra no kɔn dɔ dɛ obedzi nam a, dzi nam, dɛ mbrɛ wo kra no kɔn dɔ nyinara. 21Sɛ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi dze ne dzin ato hɔ no ɔnye wo ntamu twe dodow a, ɔno ku w’anantwikuw nye wo nguankuw a EWURADZE dze ama wo no mu bi, dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ wo no, na dzi wɔ wo kuropon mu, dɛ mbrɛ wo kra no kɔn dɔ nyinara. 22Mekyerɛ dɛ mbrɛ wodzi adoa nye ɔtrɔm no, dɛmara so na dzi bi: nyia no ho nntsew nye nyia no ho tsew nyina ndzi bi. 23Nsew ara na hyɛ mma enndzi bɔgya no: na mma mmfa nam no nnka bɔgya no ho nndzi. 24Mma nndzi; hue gu famu dɛ nsu. 25Mma nndzi; ma onsi ɔwo, nye wo mba a wodzi w’ekyir yie, aber a ereyɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do no. 26Wo ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn a ewɔ no nko, nye w’anohobadze, na fa kɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE bɛsan mu eyi no: 27na bɔ wo hyew afɔr, nam nye bɔgya no, wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn afɔrmbukyia no do: na wo kum afɔr bɔgyaa no wonhue ngu EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn afɔrmbukyia no do, na nam no na dzi. 28Dwen do tsie nsɛm a merehyɛ wo yi nyinara, ma eesi ɔwo, nye wo mba a wodzi w’ekyir yie daa, aber a ereyɛ dza oye na ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyiwa do no.
29Sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn twitwa amanaman fi w’enyim, mbrɛ erokɔ akɛfa hɔn no, na efa hɔn, na etsena hɔn asaase do a; 30hwɛ woho yie amma wɔasɛɛ hɔn efi w’enyim n’ekyir no, hɔn ekyirdzi aannyɛ wo efir; na eemmbisa hɔn enyame ekyir kwan, dɛ, Amanaman yi dua dɛn som hɔn enyame, na mo so menyɛ dɛmara? 31Mma nnyɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dɛm: na EWURADZE n’ekyiwadze a okyir no nyinara na wɔayɛ ama hɔn enyame; na hɔn mbabanyin nye hɔn mbabaa mpo na wɔdze gya hyew hɔn ma hɔn enyame.
32Adze biara a merehyɛ hom no, na hom ndwen do nyɛ: mma mmfa bi nnka ho, na mma nnyi do bi so.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 13
Content:
Kɔkɔbɔ Wɔ Ehonyisom Ho
1Sɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi bi, anaa ɔdaasonyi bi soɛr wɔ wo mu, na ɔma wo asɛnkyerɛdze anaa anwanwadze bi, 2na asɛnkyerɛdze anaa anwanwadze a ɔkasaa ho kyerɛɛ wo no ba mu, dɛ, Ma yɛnkɔ nkedzi enyame fofor a ɔwo nnyim hɔn no ekyir, na yɛnkɔsom no a; 3mma nntsie nkɔnhyɛnyi no anaa ɔdaasonyi no nsɛm no: na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn rosɔ hom ahwɛ, dze ehu kyerɛ dɛ hom dze hom akoma nyinara nye hom kra nyinara dɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn. 4Hom nnantsew ndzi EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ekyir, na hom nsuro no, na hom ndzi ne mbransɛm do, na hom ntsie ne ndze, na hom nsom no; na hom ntakyer no ho. 5Na nkɔnhyɛnyi no, anaa ɔdaasonyi no, wonku no; osiandɛ wɔaka etuatsew ho asɛm etsia EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a oyii hom fii Egypt asaase do, na ɔpoon wo fii nkowaasom ofi mu no, dɛ ɔdze rotwetwe wo efi ɔkwan a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ wo dɛ nantsew mu no do esi nkyɛn. Ama eetu bɔn no efi wo mu.
6Sɛ wo nuabanyin, wo na ne babanyin, anaa wo babanyin, anaa wo babaa, anaa wo yer a ɔda wo bo mu, anaa wo nyɛnko a ɔtse dɛ wankasa wo kra, daadaa wo nsumaa mu, dɛ, Ma yɛnkɔ nkɔsom enyame fofor a ɔwo nye w’egyanom nnyim no; 7aman a woetwa hom ho ehyia a wɔbɛn wo, anaa wɔnye wo ntamu twe, ofi asaase ano kor ara kodu asaase ano kor so hɔn enyame mu bi a; 8mma mmpen no, na nntsie no so; nkyii so mma w’enyiwa nnhu no mbɔbɔr, na nkora no do, na nnhuntsa no do so; 9na oku na ku no; wo nsa na ondzi kan ntɔ no do dɛ woboku no, na n’ekyir no na ɔman no nyinara nsa. 10Na siw no abo ma onwu; osiandɛ ɔhwehwɛɛ dɛ ɔtwetwe wo fi EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn a oyii wo fii Egypt asaase do, wɔ nkowaasom ofi mu no ho. 11Na Israel nyinara ntse, na wonsuro, na wɔannda ho ara annyɛ dɛm ndzebɔn a ɔtse dɛ mbrɛ iyi tse yi wɔ wo mu.
12Na sɛ etse dɛ wɔreka wɔ wo nkurow a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ tsena mu hɔ no kor bi ho, dɛ, 13Ebusuyɛfo bi efi wo mu asoɛr, na wɔadaadaa hɔn kurow mu atsefo dɛ, Hom mma yɛnkɔ nkɔsom enyame fofor a hom nnyim hɔn a; 14ɔno hwehwɛ mu, na bisabisa mu yie; na hwɛ, sɛ ɔyɛ nokwar, na asɛm no yɛ ampa dɛ dɛm ekyiwadze yi wɔayɛ no wɔ wo mu a: 15oku na fa nkrantsee ano ku kurow no mu atsefo no, na fa nkrantsee ano sɛɛ no, nye dza ɔwɔ mu nyinara nye no mu fiembowa so pasapasa. 16Na boaboa no mu asadze nyinara ano wɔ no brɔn finimfin, na fa gya hyew kurow no, nye no mu asadze no nyinara dɛ ɔhyew afɔr mu, fa ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn: na ɔnyɛ ɔmamfo daa; mma wɔnnkyekyer no bio. 17Na mma ebusudze no mu bi mmfam wo nsa ho: ama EWURADZE aadan efi n’ebufuhyew no ho, na oeehu wo mbɔbɔr, na oennya ayamuhyehye ama wo, na ɔaama adɔr dɛ mbrɛ ɔaka ntam akyerɛ w’egyanom; 18sɛ a itsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ndze, dɛ idzi ne mbransɛm a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi nyinara do, na eyɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyiwa do a.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 14
Content:
Mbowa A Hom Ndzi Na Dza Mma Hom Nndzi
1Hom yɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ne mba: mma hom mmbobɔ homho akam, na mma hom nnyɛ hom momapɔw do ahyɛnsewdze mma ewufo. 2Na ɔwo yɛ ɔman krɔnkrɔn ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, na EWURADZE asan mu eyi wo dɛ ebɛyɛ noara no soronko ɔman, wɔ aman a wɔwɔ asaase enyi nyinara mu.
3Mma nndzi ekyiwadze biara. 4Iyinom nye mbowa a hom ndzi: ɔnantwi, ɔkɔsɔw, nye apɔnkye, 5ɔtrɔm, nye adoa, nye ɔwansan, nye iwi, nye ɔtwe, nye eko, nye ɔwɛr. 6Na abowa biara a ɔwɔ anansa a no mu apae, na n’anansa no mu apae ebien koraa, na ɔkosa adzepuwii, wɔ mbowa mu no, ɔno na hom ndzi. 7Naaso iyinom na mma hom nndzi wɔ hɔn a wɔkosa adzepuwii mu, anaa hɔn a hɔn anansa mu apae koraa mu: efupɔnkɔ, nye asokɛtɛ, nye etwabowa, osiandɛ wɔkosa adzepuwii dze na hɔn anansa mu mmpaae, hɔn ho nntsew mma hom: 8na preko, osiandɛ n’anansa mu apae dze na ɔnnkosa adzepuwii, no ho nntsew mma hom: hɔn nam no mma hom nndzi bi, na hɔn efun no mma hom nnka.
9Iyinom na hom ndzi wɔ dza ɔwɔ nsu mu nyinara mu: dza ɔwɔ tɛterɛ nye abon no hom ndzi: 10na biara a onnyi tɛterɛ nye abon no mma hom nndzi; no ho nntsew mma hom.
11Nnoma a hɔn ho tsew no nyinara hom ndzi. 12Na iyinom nye hɔn a mma hom nndzi bi: ɔkɔr, nye ɔkɔrbia, nye nsukɔr; 13nye ɔkom pɛtɛ, nye ɔkom, nye ɔsansaa n’ahorow; 14nye akonkoran biara n’ahorow; 15nye sohor, na anadwe krɔma, nye epo akokɔ, nye akrɔma n’ahorow; 16patu ketseaba, nye patu kɛse, nye ambɛn patu; 17na nantwinoma, nye ɔpɛtɛ, nye epo akonkoran; 18nye esukɔnkɔn, nye bakanoma n’ahorow, nye esuakwa nye apan. 19Na ntumbowa a wɔwea nyinara hɔn ho nntsew mma hom: mma wonndzi. 20Ntumbowa a hɔn ho tsew no nyinara hom ndzi.
21Mma hom nndzi biribi a noara oewu: fa ma ɔhɔho a ɔwɔ wo kuropon mu ma ondzi; anaa tɔn ma ɔnanaben: na ɔwo yɛ ɔman krɔnkrɔn ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn. Mma nnoa apɔnkyeba wɔ ne na no numfonsu mu.
Ebupɛn Du Du
22W’aba a idua no ndɔbaa a ofi wo haban mu ba afrenhyia afrenhyia no, yiyi do ebupɛn du du. 23Na dzi wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim, wɔ beebi mbrɛ ɔbɛsan mu eyi dɛ ne dzin ntsena hɔ no, w’eburow, nye wo nsa, nye wo ngo do ebupɛn du du, nye w’anantwikuw, nye wo nguankuw mu mbakan; ama eesua dɛ isuro EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dabaa. 24Na sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn hyira wo na sɛ ɔkwan no war dodow ma wo ma irunntum nnsoa, osiandɛ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn asan mu eyi dɛ ɔdze ne dzin bɔto no nye wo ntamu twe dodow, 25ɔno dan no sika mu, na kyekyer sika no kitsa, na kɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn asan mu eyi no. 26Fa sika no tɔ adze biara a wo kra no kɔn dɔ, ɔnantwi, anaa oguan, anaa wenyin, anaa nsa dzendzen, anaa adze biara a wo kra pɛ no: na dzi no wɔ hɔ ara wo EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim, na ma w’enyi ngye, ɔwo nye wo fifo: 27na Levinyi a ɔwɔ wo kuropon mu no, mma nngya no ekyir; osiandɛ onnyi kyɛfa nye egyapadze ka wo ho.
28Mfe ebiasa biara n’ewiei no, yiyi afe no ara mu ndɔbaa do ebupɛn du du no nyinara, na fa gu wo kuropon mu: 29na Levinyi, osiandɛ onnyi kyɛfa nye egyapadze biara dɛ mbrɛ ewɔ, na ɔhɔho, nye egyanka, nye okunafo a wɔwɔ wo kuropon mu, mbra, na wombedzidzi mmee; na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn eehyira wo wɔ wo nsaano edwuma a eyɛ nyinara mu.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 15
Content:
Mfe Esuon Ho Mbra
1Mfe esuon biara n’ewiei no yɛ akwangya. 2Na mbrɛ wonsi ngya kwan nye yi: ɔdzefɛmfo biara dza ɔdze fɛm ne nyɛnko no ɔmfa nkyɛ no; mma ɔnnhyɛ ne nyɛnko nye no nua no nngye. 3Ɔnanaben dze hyɛ no gye: na adze biara a ewɔ wɔ wo nua hɔ dze fa kyɛ no. 4Naaso mma ohianyi bi mmba wo mu; (na nhyira na EWURADZE behyira wo wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ egyapadze a kɛfa no do;) 5sɛ iritsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ndze ara yie, dɛ erodwen do ayɛ ahyɛdze yi a merehyɛ wo da yi nyinara a. 6Na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn behyira wo, dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɔɔ wo anohoba no: na edze afemfɛm amanaman pii, na ɔwo dze erennkɛfɛm: na ɔwo bɔhom amanaman pii do, na hɔn dze, wɔronnhom wo do.
7Sɛ wo nuanom mu obi yɛ ohianyi wɔ wo nkyɛn, wɔ wo kuropon biara mu wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do a, mma mmpirim w’akoma, na mma mmua wo nsa so wɔ wo nua ohianyi no do: 8na obue na bue wo nsa ma no, na ɔfɛm na fɛm no dza ɔbɔso ne hia a ehia no no. 9Hwɛ yie ma adwen huhuw ammba w’akoma mu dɛ, Afe a otsia esuon no, akwangya afe no abɛn; na annyɛ bɔn enntsia wo nua ohianyi no, dɛ eremma no hwee; ma ɔaanntsea mu ammfrɛ EWURADZE enntsia wo, na aannyɛ bɔn amma wo. 10Ɔma na ma no, na mma ɔnnyɛ w’akoma mu yaw dɛ ebɛma no: osiandɛ dɛm adze yi ntsi na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn behyira wo wɔ w’edwuma nyinara mu, nye dza edze wo nsa bosuo mu nyinara mu. 11Na ohianyi remmpa wɔ asaase no do: dɛm ntsi na merehyɛ wo dɛ, Bue na bue wo nsa ma wo nua, wo kɔhweaban, nye wo hianyi, wɔ w’asaase do.
12Sɛ wɔtɔn wo nua Hebriwnyi ɔbanyin, anaa ɔbaa, ma wo, na ɔsom wo mfe esia a; ɔno afe a otsia esuon no gya no kwan na omfi wo nkyɛn mfa noho ndzi nkɔ. 13Na sɛ irigya no kwan ma oeefi wo nkyɛn afa noho edzi akɔ a, mma ɔmmfa nsapan nnkɔ: 14fa wo nguankuw mu bi, nye w’ewuporoweebea do bi, nye wo wenyintwer mu bi ma no kwa: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ehyira wo no na ma no. 15Na kaa dɛ eyɛɛ akowaa wɔ Egypt asaase do, na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn poon wo: dɛm ntsi na merehyɛ wo asɛm yi ndɛ. 16Na ɔmbra dɛ, sɛ ɔse wo dɛ, Mirimmfi wo nkyɛn nnkɔ; osiandɛ ɔdɔ wo nye wo fi ntsi, wɔ dɛ ɔtse no yie wɔ wo nkyɛn ntsi a; 17ɔno fa fitsii, na fa fitsi n’asowa mu suo abow mu, na ɔnyɛ w’akowaa daa. Na w’afonabaa no so yɛ no dɛmara. 18Mma ɔnnyɛ dzen mma wo, dɛ ibegya no kwan ma oeefi wo nkyɛn afa noho edzi akɔ; na ɔasom wo mfe esia ayɛ ɔpaanyi akatua mbɔho ebien ho adze: na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn behyira wo wɔ dza eyɛ nyinara mu.
19W’anantwikuw nye wo nguankuw mu mbakan enyin a wɔbɔwo hɔn no tu hɔn si nkyɛn ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn: mma mmfa wo nantwi abakan nnyɛ edwuma, na nnsusua wo nguankuw mu abakan ho nhwi so. 20Dzi no wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim afrenhyia afrenhyia wɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi no, ɔwo nye wo fifo. 21Na sɛ ɔwɔ dzɛm bi wɔ no ho dɛ ɔyɛ apakye anaa n’enyi efura, dzɛm bɔn biara wɔ no ho a, mma mmfa mmbɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn afɔr. 22Dzi no wɔ wo kuropon mu: nyia no ho nntsew nye nyia no ho tsew nyina ndzi, dɛ mbrɛ wodzi ɔwansan nye ɔforote. 23No bɔgyaa nko na mma nndzi; hue gu famu dɛ nsu.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 16
Content:
Afahyɛ Ahorow No Ho Mbra
1Hyɛ bosoom Abib nsew, na dzi apaho no ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn; na bosoom Abib mu na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn yii wo wɔ Egypt anadwe. 2Na bɔ apaho okum afɔr no ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, nguankuw nye anantwikuw mu, wɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE bɛsan mu eyi dɛ ne dzin ntsena hɔ no. 3Mma mmfa mbɔrkaw boodoo nnka ho nndzi; nda esuon na fa epitsi boodoo ka ho dzi, mekyerɛ amandzehu boodoo no; osiandɛ ɔhar mu na ifiir edzi fii Egypt asaase do: ama aakaa da a edze fiir edzi fii Egypt asaase do no wo nkwa nda nyinara. 4Na mma wonnhu wo nkyɛn mbɔrkaw wɔ w’ahe nyinara do nda esuon; nkyii so mma nam a iku hɔn da a odzi kan ewimbir no bi nnka anadwe no nyinara mma onnkodu anapa. 5Mma nnku apaho no wɔ wo kuropon a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no biara mu: 6gyedɛ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi dɛ ne dzin ntsena hɔ no, hɔ na ku apaho no ewimbir, wi rokɔtɔ no, wɔ wo Egypt fi aber no mu. 7Na toto na dzi no wɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi no: na anapa no san, na kɔ w’asesee mu. 8Nda esia na dzi epitsi boodoo: na da a otsia esuon no nyɛ asomdwee nguabɔ mma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn; mma nnyɛ edwuma wɔ mu.
9Adapɛn esuon na kan ma woho: da a erehyɛ ase dze kantankrankye aka eburow a osisi hɔ no na fi kan adapɛn esuon. 10Na hyɛ adapɛn afahyɛ no ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn fa ka wo nsa mu ayamuyi afɔr ntoboa a edze rema no no ho, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ehyira wo no: 11na ma w’enyi ngye wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim, ɔwo, nye wo babanyin, nye wo babaa, nye w’akowaa, nye w’afonabaa, nye Levinyi a ɔwɔ wo kuropon mu, nye ɔhɔho, nye egyanka, nye okunafo a wɔwɔ wo mu, wɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi dɛ ne dzin ntsena hɔ no. 12Na kaa dɛ eyɛɛ akowaa wɔ Egypt: na dwen do yɛ ahyɛdze yi.
13Hyɛ ntamadan afahyɛ nda esuon, aber a aboaboa w’ewuporoweebea do nye wo wenyintwer mu adze ano no: 14na ma w’enyi ngye wɔ w’afahyɛ no mu, ɔwo, nye wo babanyin, nye wo babaa, nye w’akowaa, nye w’afonabaa, nye Levinyi, nye ɔhɔho, nye egyanka, nye okunafo a wɔwɔ wo kuropon mu. 15Nda esuon na hyɛ fa ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn wɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE bɛsan mu eyi no: osiandɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn behyira wo wɔ wo ndɔbaa nyinara mu, na wo nsaano edwuma nyinara mu, na w’enyi bɛgye ara. 16Afrenhyia kor mu mpɛn ebiasa na wo mbanyin nyinara nkefir EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim wɔ beebi mbrɛ ɔbɛsan mu eyi no; wɔ epitsi boodoo afahyɛ no mu, nye adapɛn afahyɛ no mu, nye ntamadan afahyɛ no mu: na mma wɔmmfa nsapan mmbefir EWURADZE enyim: 17nyimpa biara mma dza obotum, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn nhyira a ɔdze ehyira wo no tse.
Atsɛmbuafo Na Atsɛntsenenee
18Hyɛ ntsɛmbuafo nye mpanyimfo wɔ wo nkuropon a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ mbrɛ w’ebusuakuw tsetsee nyinara mu: na wɔmfa ntsɛn tsenenee mbu ɔman no ntsɛn. 19Mma nndan atsɛmbu enyi; mma mmfɛr nyimpa: nkyii so mma nngye akyɛdze; na akyɛdze fura enyansafo enyi, na ɔdan atseneneefo nsɛm enyi. 20Dza ɔtsen ara na dzi ekyir, ama eenya nkwa, na eenya asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no edzi.
21Mma nntsɛw dua biara mmfa nnyɛ abosompɔw Asera wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn afɔrmbukyia a ebɛyɛ ama woho no nkyɛn. 22Nkyii so mma nnsi dum a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn kyir mma woho.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 17
Content:
1Mma mmfa ɔnantwi, anaa oguan a no ho wɔ dzɛm, anaa adzebɔn biara, mmbɔ okum afɔr mma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn na ɔyɛ ekyiwadze ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn.
2Sɛ wohu wɔ wo mu, wɔ wo nkuropon a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no biara mu, ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa bi a ɔyɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyi do dɛ ɔto n’ahyɛmu, 3na ɔkɔ kɔsom enyame fofor bi, ɔsɔr dɛ, ewia, bosoom, anaa ɔsor dɔm no mu biara a mennhyɛɛ ho mbra no, 4na wɔka kyerɛ wo, ma etse a, ɔno hwehwɛ mu yie na hwɛ, sɛ ɔyɛ nokwar, na asɛm no wɔ mu ampa, dɛ ɔayɛ dɛm ekyiwadze yi wɔ Israel a; 5ɔno fa ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa no a ɔayɛ dɛm adze bɔn yi fir edzi kɔ wo kuropon ho, na wonsiw no abo ma onwu. 6Adasefo beenu, anaa adasefo baasa anomu do na wɔmfa nku nyia ɔsɛ owu no; mma wɔmmfa ɔdasefo kor anomu do nnku no. 7Adasefo no nsa na ondzi kan wɔ no do nku no, na n’ekyir no ɔman no nyinara hɔn nsa. Ama eeyi mbusu no efi wo mu.
8Sɛ asɛm bi ho atsɛmbu yɛ dzen dodow ma wo, wɔ ewudzi nye nsa a apa ntamu, mansosɛm mu, na opira no, dɛ ɔyɛ akasakasa bi wɔ wo kuropon mu a, ɔno soɛr, na kɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi no; 9na kɔ asɔfo Levifo, nye nda no mu ɔtsɛmbufo a ɔwɔ do no nkyɛn na kebisa; na wɔnkyerɛ wo asɛm no n’atsɛmbu: 10na yɛ dɛ mbrɛ asɛm a wɔbɛkyerɛ wo wɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE bɛsan mu eyi no tse no ara; na dwen do yɛ dɛ mbrɛ wɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo no nyinara: 11dɛ mbrɛ mbra a wɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo, na mbrɛ atsɛmbu a wɔbɛka akyerɛ wo no tse no ara, na yɛ: mma nndan mmfi asɛm a wɔbɛkyerɛ wo no ho nnkɔ enyimfa anaa abankum. 12Na nyimpa a obedzi nkontompɔsɛm, dɛ orinntsie ɔsɔfo a ogyina hɔ som wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim, anaa ɔtsɛmbufo no, dɛm nyimpa no onwu: na yi mbusu no fi Israel. 13Na ɔman no nyinara ntse, na wonsuro, na wonndzi nkontompɔsɛm bio.
Ahensi Na Ɔhen N’asɛdze
14Sɛ idu asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do, na efa, na etsena do, na ese dɛ, Mibesi mo do hen, dɛ amanaman a wotwa mo ho hyia nyinara no a; 15nyia EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi no no noara na fa no si wo do hen: wo nuanom mu bi na fa no si wo do hen: mma mmfa ɔnanaben bi a ɔnnyɛ wo nua nnsi wo do. 16Mma ɔhen no mma no mpɔnkɔ nndɔɔ so mma no, nkyii so mma ɔmma ɔman no nnsan nnkɔ Egypt, nnkɛpɛ no mpɔnkɔ dodow: mber dodowara a EWURADZE ase hom dɛ ɔdzekɔr yi mma hom nnsan mmfa ɔkwan no do bio no. 17Nkyii so mma ɔmma ne yernom nndɔɔ so. 18Na ɔmbra dɛ, sɛ ɔtse n’ahendzi ahengua do a, onsusu mbra yi a ɔwɔ asɔfo Levifo no enyim no do nkyerɛw bi wɔ nwoma mu mma noho: 19na ɔnko ne nkyɛn, na ɔnkenkan mu no nkwa nda nyinara: na oeesua dɛ obosuro EWURADZE no Nyankopɔn, na odzi mbra yi mu nsɛm nyinara nye ahyɛdze yi do, na ɔyɛ: 20na n’akoma aamma noho do annsen no nuanom, na ɔaanndan emmfi mbrasɛm no ho ammfa enyimfa, anaa abankum: ama ne nda aawar wɔ n’ahendzi mu, ɔno nye ne mba wɔ Israel.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 18
Content:
Asɔfo Na Levifo Kyɛfa
1Levifo Asɔfo nye Levi ebusuakuw nyinara rinnya kyɛfa nye egyapadze wɔ Israel mu: EWURADZE ogya afɔr nye n’egyapadze na wondzi. 2Na worinnya egyapadze wɔ hɔn nuanom mu: EWURADZE nye hɔn egyapadze, dɛ mbrɛ ɔaka akyerɛ hɔn no. 3Na iyi nyɛ asɔfo no hɔn ndzinoa mfi ɔman no hɔ, mfi hɔn a wɔbɔ afɔr no hɔ, ɔnantwi o, oguan o, wɔmfa abasa, nye adadaw ebien no, nye efur no mma ɔsɔfo no. 4W’eburow, wo nsa, nye wo ngo mu nduadzewakan, nye wo nguan ho nhwi a woesusua no kan no, fa ma no. 5Osiandɛ ɔno na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn asan mu eyi no wɔ w’ebusuakuw nyinara mu, dɛ ongyina nsom wɔ EWURADZE ne dzin mu, ɔno na ne mbabanyin daa nyina.
6Na sɛ Levinyi bi fi wo nkuropon no biara mu, fi Israel mu beebiara mbrɛ ɔakɔsoɛ, na ɔdze ne kra ne pɛ nyinara ba beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE asan mu eyi no a; 7ɔno ɔnsom wɔ EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn ne dzin mu, dɛ mbrɛ no nuanom Levifo no a wogyina EWURADZE enyim hɔ no nyinara yɛ no. 8Wonnya kyɛfa dɛ hɔndze no ndzi, mfa nka dza ofi n’egyanom adzetɔn mu ba no ho.
Amanaman Ndzeyɛɛ A Ɔyɛ Ekyiwadze
9Sɛ inya du asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do a, mma nnsua amanaman no hɔn ndzeyɛɛ a ɔyɛ ekyiwadze no yɛ. 10Mma wonnhu wo mu obi a ɔma ne babanyin anaa ne babaa fa ogya mu, nyia ɔhyɛ mbusunkɔm, nyia ɔyɛ abayidze, anaa adzebisafo, anaa osumantunyi, 11anaa kaberkyernyi, anaa nyia ɔfrɛfrɛ esunsum, anaa anyɛn, anaa ɔsamamfrɛnyi. 12Osiandɛ obiara a ɔyɛ iyinom no yɛ ekyiwadze ma EWURADZE: na osian ekyiwadze yi ntsi na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn tutuu hɔn fii w’enyim yi. 13Enye EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ntsena no emudzi mu. 14Na amanaman yi a erekɛfa yi wotsie hɔn a wɔyɛ abayidze, na mbusunkɔnhyɛfo: na ɔwo dze, EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn mmaa wo kwan dɛ yɛ dɛm.
Nyankopɔn No Nkɔnhyɛnyi No
15Nkɔnhyɛnyi a ofi wo mu, ofi wo nuanom mu a ɔtse dɛ emi, na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛma no do ama wo; ɔno na hom ntsie no; 16dɛ mbrɛ dza ibisae wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn hɔ wɔ Horeb, wɔ nguabɔ da no tse nyinara, dɛ, Mma menntse EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn ndze bio, nkyii so mma munnhu ogya kɛse yi bio, na meennwu. 17Na EWURADZE see me dɛ, Dza wɔaka no, wɔaka no yie. 18Mebɛma nkɔnhyɛnyi do ama hɔn wɔ hɔn nuanom mu tse dɛ ɔwo; na medze me nsɛm bɛhyɛ n’anomu, na ɔaka dza mebɛhyɛ no nyinara akyerɛ hɔn. 19Na ɔbɛba dɛ obiara a onnketsie me nsɛm a ɔbɛka wɔ me dzin mu no, mibebisa noara. 20Na nkɔnhyɛnyi a ɔbɛka asɛm bi nkontompɔ mu wɔ me dzin mu a, mennhyɛɛ no dɛ ɔnka no, anaa nyia ɔbɛkasa wɔ enyame fofor bi dzin mu no, nkɔnhyɛnyi kor no bowu. 21Bi a nna ase wɔ w’akoma mu dɛ, Yɛbɛyɛ dɛn bohu asɛm a EWURADZE nnkae no? 22Ɔno nye dɛ, sɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi bi kasa wɔ EWURADZE ne dzin mu, na sɛ asɛm no annyɛ hɔ anaa ammba mu so a, nna asɛm a EWURADZE nnkae no nye no: nkɔnhyɛnyi no aka no ator mu, mma nnsuro no.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 19
Content:
Guansumabew Nkurow
1Sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn twitwa amanaman a ɔdze hɔn asaase rema wo gu, na itu hɔn, na etsena hɔn nkurow, nye hɔn adan mu a; 2yiyi nkurow ebiasa si hɔ ma woho wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ fa no mu. 3Siesie ɔkwan no ma woho, na paapaa asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn rema enya edzi no n’ahe mu ebiasa na onyimpakumfo biara eeguan akɔ hɔ. 4Na onyimpakumfo a onguan nkɔ hɔ na onnya nkwa no n’asɛm nye yi: nyia oku ne nyɛnko awerɛfir mu, na ɔnntan no dada bi; 5dɛ nyimpa nye ne nyɛnko kɔ kwaa mu rukotwa dua, na ne nsa ma abɔndua do dze eetwa dua no, na ne tsidadze no hɔn fi no kura mu, na ɔka ne nyɛnko no, ma owu a; onguan nkɔ nkurow yi kor mu na onnya nkwa: 6amma bɔgya ho ɔwerdzinyi no eenntsiw nyimpakumfo no, aber a n’akoma ayɛ hyew no, na osiandɛ ɔkwan no war ntsi ɔaannkɔto no, na ɔaammbɔ no ɔbɔtɔr; naaso na nyimpakumfo no nnsɛ wu, susuampa dɛ ɔnntan no dada bi no. 7Dɛm ntsi na merehyɛ wo dɛ yiyi nkurow ebiasa si hɔ ma woho. 8Na sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn tserɛw wo he mu, dɛ mbrɛ ɔaka ntam akyerɛ w’egyanom, na ɔdze asaase no a ɔbɔɔ anohoba dɛ ɔdze bɛma w’egyanom no nyinara ma wo: 9sɛ idzi mbrasɛm yi nyinara a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi do eyɛ, dɛ ebɔdɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, na anantsew n’akwan do daa a; ɔno yiyi nkurow ebiasa so ka ebiasa yi ho si hɔ ma woho: 10na wɔaannka bɔgya a onndzi so enngu wɔ w’asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ egyapadze no mu, na bɔgya eengu wo do. 11Na sɛ nyimpa bi tan ne nyɛnko, na ɔkɔ no atsɛwee, na ɔsoɛr no do, na ɔbɔ no ɔbɔtɔr ma owu; na oguan kɔ nkurow yi kor mu a: 12ɔno no kurow no mu mpanyimfo nsoma ma wɔnkɛfa no wɔ hɔ na wɔmfa no nhyɛ bɔgya ho ɔwerdzinyi no nsa, ma onwu. 13Mma w’enyiwa nnhu no mbɔbɔr, na yi bɔgya a onndzi so fi Israel, na eesi wo yie.
Adasefo Ho Asɛm
14Mma nntwe wo nyɛnko n’asaasehe a tsetsefo no dze esi, wɔ w’egyapadze a ibenya edzi wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ fa no do.
15Ɔdasefo baako nnsoɛr nntsia nyimpa bi wɔ emumuyɛ biara, anaa bɔn biara ho, wɔ bɔn biara a ɔyɛ ho: adasefo beenu anomu, anaa adasefo baasa anomu na wɔmfa do nsi asɛm gyinae. 16Sɛ ɔdasekrumfo bi soɛr tsia nyimpa bi dzi no mfom ho dase a; 17ɔno nyimpa beenu nyina a ɔham no da hɔn ntamu no, mbegyina EWURADZE enyim, wɔ asɔfo nye ntsɛmbufo a wɔwɔ hɔ nda no mu no enyim; 18na ntsɛmbufo no nhwehwɛ mu yie: na, hwɛ, sɛ ɔdasefo no yɛ ɔdasekrumfo, na oedzi no nua dasekrum a; 19ɔno hom nyɛ no dɛ mbrɛ ɔdween dɛ nkyɛ ɔbɛyɛ no nua no: ama eeyi mbusu no efi wo mu. 20Na hɔn a wɔaka no ntsi, na wonsuro na ɔdzekɔr yi wɔaammbɔ mbusu biara a ɔtse dɛm wɔ wo mu bio. 21Na mma w’enyiwa nnhu mbɔbɔr; nkwa nhyɛ nkwa ananmu, enyiwa nhyɛ enyiwa ananmu, ese nhyɛ ese ananmu, nsa nhyɛ nsa ananmu, anan nhyɛ anan ananmu.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 20
Content:
1Sɛ itu ɔsa nye w’atamfo aakɔko, na ihu mpɔnkɔ, nye ntseaseanam, nye ɔman a wɔdɔɔ so sen wo a, mma nnsuro hɔn: na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn a ɔdze wo fi Egypt asaase do bae no ka wo ho. 2Na ɔmbra dɛ sɛ hom rehɛn akono a, ɔsɔfo no ntwe mpin na ɔmbɛkasa nkyerɛ ɔman no, 3na ɔnse hɔn dɛ, Israel, hom ntsie, hom rebɛn akono ndɛ da yi nye hom atamfo akɔko: mma hom akoma nntu, mma hom nnsuro, na hom ho mmpopo, nkyii so mma hɔn ho nnyɛ hom hu; 4na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn nye nyia ɔnye hom rokɔ, nye hom atamfo rokɔko ama hom, na ɔaagye hom nkwa. 5Na ahwɛdofo no nkasa nkyerɛ ɔman no, dɛ, Nyimpa mmuana na oesi dan fofor, na ommbuei? Wɔmma ɔnsan nkɔ ne fie, ma ɔaanntɔ wɔ ɔko mu, na nyimpa fofor eennkobue. 6Na nyimpa mmuana na ɔatsew wenyin ture, na onnyae nnyii n’aba bi? Wɔmma ɔnsan nkɔ ne fie, na ɔaanntɔ wɔ ɔko mu, na nyimpa fofor eennkeyi n’aba no. 7Na nyimpa biara a ɔagye basia bi dɛ yer, na onnyae nnhyiaa no no, wɔmma ɔnsan nkɔ ne fie, ma ɔaanntɔ wɔ ɔko mu, na nyimpa fofor bi annkɛfa no dɛ ɔyer. 8Na ahwɛdofo no nwɔw do nkasa nkyerɛ ɔman no, na wɔnse dɛ, Nyimpa mmuana na osuro na n’akoma apa? Wɔmma ɔnsan nkɔ ne fie, amma no nuanom hɔn akoma eenntu dɛ n’akoma. 9Na ɔmbra dɛ, sɛ ahwɛdofo no wie ɔman no kasa kyerɛ a, wɔnhyehyɛ asafohemfo wɔ ɔman no ne tsir.
10Sɛ ebɛn kurow bi dɛ enye no rokɔko a, ɔno bɔ asomdwee ho dawur kyerɛ no. 11Na ɔmbra dɛ, sɛ ɔma wo asomdwee mbuae, na obue wo a, ɔno, ma nkorɔfo a ibohu hɔn wɔ mu no nyinara mbɛyɛ ɔtowyiman mma wo, na wɔnsom wo. 12Na sɛ ɔnnye wo ennsiesie, na otu wo do sa a, ɔno kɔ no ntoa: 13na sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn yi no hyɛ wo nsa a, ɔno fa nkrantsee ano bobɔ no mu mbanyin nyinara: 14na mbaa nye mbofraba, nye ofiembowa, nye dza ɔwɔ kurow no mu nyinara dze, mekyerɛ no mu asadze nyinara, fa no afonam fa ma woho; na dzi w’atamfo asadze a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze ama wo no. 15Dɛm na yɛ nkurow a wɔnye wo ntamu twe dodow nyinara a wɔnnyɛ amanaman yi nkurow bi no. 16Na aman yi nkurow a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ egyapadze no dze, mma nngye biribiara a ogu ahom no nkwa: 17mbom sɛɛ hɔn pasapasa; Hetfo, nye Amorifo, Keenanfo, nye Perizfo, nye Hivifo, nye Jebusfo; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ahyɛ wo no: 18amma wɔaannkyerɛ wo mma aannyɛ hɔn ekyiwadze nyinara a wɔyɛ ma hɔn enyame no bi; na hom aannyɛ bɔn enntsia EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn.
19Sɛ itua kurow bi ma ɔkyɛr, dɛ ereyɛ ho sa afa a, mma mmfa abɔndua nnsɛɛ no ho ndua; na no do aba bi na ibedzi, na mma nntwitwa nngu; ana haban mu dua yɛ nyimpa, na asɛɛ no? 20Ndua a inyim dɛ ɔnnyɛ ndua a wodzi no nko, na sɛɛ no na twitwa gu; na sisi nduaban wɔ kurow a ɔnye wo dzi ako no ho araa ma onkodu dɛ ɔbɔhwe ase.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 21
Content:
Nsumaa mu Ewudzi
1Sɛ wohu obi a woeku no da haban mu, wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ fa no do, na wonnyim nyia okum no a: 2ɔno wo mpanyimfo nye wo atsɛmbufo mfir edzi, na wonkosusu nkodu nkurow a etwa ehyia nyia woeku no no ho no do: 3na ɔmbra dɛ, kurow a ɔbɛn nyimpa a woeku no no nkyɛn no, mekyerɛ kurow no mu mpanyimfo no mfa anantwikuw mu ɔnantwiber a wɔmmfaa no nnyɛɛ edwuma, na ɔnntwee kɔndua pɛn; 4ɔnantwiber no nsian nkɔ ɔbɔn a nsu pem wɔ do a wɔnndɔwee na wonnduaa mu adze mu, na wombu ɔnantwiber no no kɔn wɔ ɔbɔn no mu: 5na Levi mbabanyin asɔfo no mbra ho; na hɔn na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn asan mu eyi hɔn dɛ wɔnsom no, na wonhyira wɔ EWURADZE ne dzin mu; na hɔn anomu asɛm do na wɔmfa ndzi ɔham biara nye ɔbɔ biara ho asɛm: 6na kurow no mu mpanyimfo a wɔbɛn nyimpa a woku no no, nhohor hɔn nsa ho ngu ɔnantwiber a wobuu no kɔn mu wɔ ɔbɔn no mu no do: 7na wombua nse dɛ, Nnyɛ hɛn nsa bi kaa bɔgya gui, nkyii so hɛn enyiwa ennhu. 8EWURADZE, fa fir wo man Israel a apon hɔn no, na mma bɔgya a onndzi so nnka wo man Israel mu. Na bɔgya no wɔdze bɛkyɛ hɔn. 9Ama eeyi bɔgya a onndzi so no efi wo mu, aber a ereyɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do no.
Mbasiafo A Wɔafa Hɔn Ndɔmmum
10Sɛ itu sa nye w’atamfo kɔko, na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn yi hɔn hyɛ wo nsa, na efa hɔn ndɔmmum, 11na ihu ndɔmmum no mu ɔbaa fɛɛfɛw bi, na inya no ho akɔndɔ, na epɛ dɛ efa no yɛ wo yer a; 12ɔno fa no bra fie; na onyi ne tsir na ombubu n’awerɛw; 13na onyi no ndɔmmum akataho no mfi noho, na ɔnka wo fie, na ongyam n’egya nye ne na bosoom ara mu: na n’ekyir no akɔ ne nkyɛn, na ayɛ no kun, na ɔayɛ wo yer. 14Na ɔmbra dɛ, sɛ emmpɛ no a, ɔno ma ɔnkɔ beebi mbrɛ ɔpɛ; na ɔtɔn dze, mma nntɔn no nngye sika, mma nnye no nndzi dɛ afonabaa, osiandɛ abrɛ no adze.
Abakan Ne Ndzinoa
15Sɛ ɔbanyin bi wɔ yernom beenu na, ɔdɔ kor, na ɔtan kor, na hɔn beenu no nyina awowo mba ama no; na sɛ abakan no nye nyia ɔtan no ne babanyin a: 16ɔno ɔmbra dɛ, da a ɔkyɛ n’adze a ɔwɔ mu ma ne mbabanyin no mma ɔmmfa nyia ɔdɔ no no ne babanyin nnyɛ abakan nndzi nyia ɔtan no ne babanyin a ɔyɛ abakan no enyim: 17mbom ɔngye abakan no nto mu, nyia ɔtan no no ne babanyin no, ɔmma no dza ɔwɔ nyinara mu kyɛfa mbɔho ebien: na ɔno nye n’ahoɔdzen ahyɛse; abakan ndzinoa yɛ nedze.
Ɔba Otuatsewnyi
18Sɛ nyimpa wɔ babanyin ɔsoɔdzennyi nye etuatsewnyi a onntsie n’egya ne ndze, anaa ne na ne ndze, na wɔtsea no so, na onntsie hɔn a: 19ɔno n’egya nye ne na nkyer no, na wɔmfa no mfir edzi nkɔ no kurow mu mpanyimfo nkyɛn wɔ no kuropon ano; 20na wɔnse no kurow no mu mpanyimfo no dɛ, Hɛn babanyin yi yɛ ɔsoɔdzennyi nye otuatsewnyi, onntsie hɛn ndze. Ɔyɛ ɔkɔhwinyi, nye ɔsabokwanyi. 21Na no kurow no mu mbanyin nyinara nsiw no abo, ma ɔntɔ: ama eeyi mbusu no efi wo mu; na Israel nyinara ntse, na wonsuro.
Mbra Ahorow Bi So
22Na sɛ nyimpa bi yɛ bɔn a ɔsɛ owu, na woku no, na edze no sɛn dua bi do a; 23mma ne nyimpadua no nnka dua no do anadwe no nyinara, na osie na sie no da no ara; na nyia wɔasɛn no no Nyame apa no; amma eenngu w’asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ egyapadze no ho fi.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 22
Content:
1Mma nnhu wo nua ne nantwi anaa no guan dɛ ɔatɔ gon, na mmfi hɔn ho nnkosuma: fa hɔn san brɛ wo nua. 2Na sɛ wo nua no mmbɛn wo, anaa sɛ innyim no a, ɔno fa no bra wo fie wo, na ɔnko wo nkyɛn nkodu dɛ wo nua no bɔhwehwɛ no, na aadan no ama no bio. 3Na dɛmara so na fa yɛ n’asoaso; anaa wo nua n’adze biara a ayew no a ehu no: mma nnguan mmfi ho.
4Mma nnhu wo nua n’asoaso anaa ne nantwi dɛ ɔahwe ase wɔ ɔkwan mu, na mmfi ho nnkosuma: boa no ma ɔmma hɔn do bio.
5Mma ɔbaa nnhyɛ adze a ɔyɛ ɔbanyin dze, nkyii so ɔbanyin nnhyɛ ɔbaa n’atar: na obiara a ɔyɛ iyinom no ɔyɛ ekyiwadze ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn.
6Sɛ ikopue anoma ne birebuw bi do awerɛfir mu wɔ ɔkwan mu, wɔ dua biara do anaa famu, mba anaa nkyirefuwa wɔ mu, na na no butuw na mba no, anaa nkyirefuwa no do a, mma nnkyer na no nnka mba no ho; 7ɔno ma na no nkɔ, na fa mba no; na eesi wo yie, na ama wo nda aawar.
8Sɛ isi dan fofor a, ɔno gye wo dan etsifi ban, ama sɛ obi fi do hwe ase a, aammfa bɔgya ammba wo dan no do. 9Mma mmfa aba horow ebien nndua wo wenyin ture mu: amma aannhwer nduadzewa no nyina, aba a edua no, nye wenyin ture no ndɔbaa no nyina.
10Mma mmfa ɔnantwi nye asoaso mmbɔ mu mmfuntum. 11Mma mmfura tam a wɔdze kuntu nye ndwera afora awen.
12Tu wo tam a edze kata wo do no ntoado anan no do ndwow.
13Sɛ ɔbanyin bi hyia yer, na ɔkɔ ne nkyɛn, na ɔtan no, 14na ɔdze enyimguasesɛm to no do, na ɔbɔ no dzin bɔn, se dɛ, Mihyiaa ɔbaa yi, na mokɔr ne nkyɛn no, mennhu no ho mbaabunyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze no a: 15ɔno akataasia no n’egya nye ne na mfa akataasia no ne mbaabunyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze no na wɔmfa mbra kurow no mu mpanyimfo nkyɛn wɔ kuropon no mu; 16na akataasia no n’egya nse mpanyimfo no dɛ, Medze me babaa maa ɔbanyin yi awar, na ɔtan no; 17na, hwɛ, ɔdze enyimguasesɛm ato no do, dɛ, Mennhu mbaabunyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze wɔ wo babaa yi ho; naaso me babaa ne mbaabunyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze nye yi. Na wɔntserɛw tam no mu wɔ kurow no mu mpanyimfo no enyim. 18Na kurow no mu mpanyimfo no mfa ɔbanyin no na wɔntwe n’aso; 19na wɔngye no mbratodze dwetɛ ɔha, na wɔmfa mma akataasia no n’egya, osiandɛ ɔabɔ Israel ɔbaabun dzin bɔn: na nwar no; mma ɔnnko no wɔ ne nda nyinara mu. 20Na sɛ asɛm yi yɛ nokwar, dɛ woennhu mbaabunyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze wɔ akataasia no ho dze a: 21ɔno wonyi akataasia no mbra n’egya ne fi abowano, na no kurow no mu mbanyin nsiw no abo ma onwu: osiandɛ ɔayɛ nkwaseadze wɔ Israel, dɛ ɔagor ndwamangor wɔ n’egya fie: ama eeyi mbusu no efi wo mu.
22Sɛ wohu ɔbanyin bi dɛ ɔnye ɔbaa a ɔwɔ kun da a, ɔno hɔn beenu nyina nwu, ɔbanyin a ɔnye ɔbaa no dae no, nye ɔbaa no: ama eeyi mbusu no efi Israel.
23Sɛ wɔdze akataasia bi a ɔyɛ ɔbaabun ma banyin bi awar, na banyin bi hu no wɔ kurow mu, na ɔnye no da a; 24ɔno hom mfa hɔn emu ebien nyina mfir edzi nkɔ kurow no n’abotsen ekyir, na hom nsiw hɔn abo ma wonwuwu; akataasia no, dɛ ɔwɔ kurow mu na ɔannkeka mu ntsi; na ɔbanyin no, dɛ ɔabrɛ ne nyɛnko ne yer adze ntsi: ama eeyi mbusu no efi wo mu.
25Na sɛ banyin bi hu akataasia ɔwarfo bi yer no wɔ haban mu, na ɔbanyin no kyer no, na ɔnye no da a; ɔno ɔbanyin a ɔnye no dae no nko na onwu: 26na akataasia no dze mma nnyɛ no hwee; bɔn a ɔsɛ owu nnyi akataasia no do: na dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa soɛr ne nyɛnko do, na oku no no, dɛmara so na asɛm yi tse: 27na haban mu na ohun no; na akataasia a wɔagye no yer no kekaa mu, na nna obi nnyi hɔ a ɔbɛgye no.
28Sɛ banyin bi hu akataasia a ɔyɛ ɔbaabun a wɔnngyee no yer, na ɔkyer no, na ɔnye no da, na wohu hɔn a; 29ɔno banyin a ɔnye no dae no, mfa dwetɛ dwetɛbona eduonum mma akataasia no n’egya, na ɔnyɛ ne yer, osiandɛ ɔabrɛ no adze; mma ɔnnko no ne nda nyinara.
30Ɔbanyin bi nnwar n’egya ne yer, na onnyi n’egya n’akatado.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 23
Content:
Nyia Ɔmfata EWURADZE Ne Bagua
1Nyia no ntɔhwɛbo abɔ, anaa ne banyin etwa no, mma ɔnnhɛn EWURADZE ne baguaa mu.
2Nyia wɔawo no wɔ edwaman bi nnhɛn EWURADZE ne baguaa mu; n’ebusuasantsen a otsia du mpo mu biara nnhɛn EWURADZE ne baguaa mu.
3Ammonnyi anaa Moabnyi nnhɛn EWURADZE ne baguaa mu; hɔn ebusuasantsen a otsia du mpo mu biara nnhɛn EWURADZE ne baguaa mu ara da: 4osiandɛ wɔammfa edziban na ɔnye nsu emmbehyia hom wɔ ɔkwan no mu, aber a hom fi Egypt reba no; na dɛ wɔkɔbɔɔ Beer ne babanyin Balaam a ofi Petor a ɔwɔ Mesopotemia no paa dɛ ɔmbɔdom wo ntsi. 5Naaso EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ammpɛ dɛ otsie Balaam; na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn daan ndom no nhyira maa wo, osiandɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dɔɔ wo. 6Mma nnhwehwɛ hɔn asomdwee nye hɔn eyiedzi wo nda nyinara daa.
7Mma nnkyir Edomnyi; na ɔyɛ wo nua: mma nnkyir Egyptnyi; osiandɛ ekɛyɛɛ n’asaase do ɔhɔho. 8Ebusuasantsen a otsia ebiasa mba a wɔbɔwo hɔn ama hɔn no na wɔnhɛn EWURADZE ne baguaa mu.
Ahotsew Wɔ Nseraban Mu
9Sɛ ifir edzi kɛkyer w’atamfo ho nsera a, ɔno sie woho yie wɔ adze bɔn biara ho. 10Sɛ ɔbanyin bi wɔ hom mu a no ho nntsew wɔ no ha a ɔsen anadwe bi ntsi a, ɔno omfi nseraban no mu nkɔ ekyir, mma ɔmmba nseraban no mu; 11na ɔmbra dɛ orudu ewimbir no, onguar noho wɔ nsu mu: na sɛ wi kɔtɔ a, ɔmbra nseraban no mu. 12Nya beebi so wɔ nseraban no ekyir, mbrɛ ibefir edzi akɔ: 13na nya ɔsɔsɔw wɔ wo ndadzedze mu; na ɔmbra dɛ, sɛ ekɔkotow ekyir hɔ a, edze eefun, na aasan ekyir akata dza ofi wo mu ba no do: 14na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn nenam wo nseraban mu, dɛ ɔregye wo, na ɔdze w’atamfo ama wɔ w’enyim; dɛm ntsi wo nseraban nyɛ krɔnkrɔn: amma oeennhu efifidze bi wɔ wo mu, na ɔaanndan emmfi wo nkyɛn.
Mbra Bi So
15Mma nnyi akowaa a oefi no wura nkyɛn eguan aba wo hɔ mma no wura: 16ma ɔnye wo ntsena, wɔ wo mu, wɔ beebi mbrɛ ɔbɛsan mu eyi no wɔ wo nkuropon no kor mu, mbrɛ ɔpɛ no dodow no: mma nnhyɛ no do.
17Mma Israel mbabaa mu biara nnyɛ edwaman, nkyii so mma Israel mbabanyin mu biara nndan edwaman. 18Mma mmfa ɔbaa edwaman apaabɔdze, anaa ɔkraman (banyin edwaman) n’akatua, mmba EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn fie wɔ anohoba biara mu: na ebien yi nyina yɛ ekyiwadze ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn.
19Mma mmbɔ wo nua bosa nngye nsiho: 20ɔnanaben na bɔ no bosa gye nsiho; na wo nua dze, mma mmbɔ no bosa nngye nsiho: na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn eehyira wo adze a edze wo nsa bɛka nyinara mu, wɔ asaase a erokɔ akɛfa no do.
21Sɛ ebɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn anohoba a, mma nnyɛ nyaa dɛ ebɔpon: na ampaara EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɔhwehwɛ no wɔ wo hɔ; na ɔbɛdan wo bɔn. 22Na sɛ ema anohoba no ka a, ɔnnyɛ bɔn mma wo. 23Dza efi w’anofamfa do epue no dwen do na yɛ; dɛ mbrɛ abɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn anohoba, ayamuyi afɔr a edze w’ano aka no.
24Sɛ idu wo nyɛnko no wenyin ture mu a, ɔno dzi esikyireamba no bi mee; mbom mma mmfa bi nngu w’adze mu.
25Sɛ idu wo nyɛnko n’eburow a osisi hɔ mu a, ɔno fa wo nsa pempan mbɛtsem no bi; mbom mma mma dadze do wɔ wo nyɛnko n’eburow a osisi hɔ do.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 24
Content:
Awar Na Awargyaa
1Sɛ ɔbanyin bi fa ɔbaa na ɔwar no, na ɔba dɛ, ɔbaa no nnya n’enyin enyimnyam, osiandɛ oehu no ho enyitodze bi ntsi a, ɔnkyerɛw awargyaa krataa mma no, na ɔmfa nhyɛ ne nsa, na ongya no kwan ma omfi ne fie nkɔ. 2Na sɛ ofi ne fie kɔ a, ɔnkɔ nkɛyɛ ɔbanyin fofor bi ne yer. 3Na sɛ kun fofor no so tan no, na ɔkyerɛw awargyaa krataa ma no, na ɔdze hyɛ ne nsa, na ogya no kwan ma ofi ne fie kɔ; anaa sɛ ekyir kun no a ɔfaa no yɛɛ ne yer no wu a; 4mma no kun a odzi kan no a ogyaa no kwan no, mmfa no nnyɛ ne yer bio, wɔ no ho fi a ogui no ekyir no; na ɔyɛ ekyiwadze wɔ EWURADZE enyim: na mma nnyɛ ma asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ egyapadze no do nnyɛ bɔn.
Mbra No Bi So
5Sɛ ɔbanyin bi hyia yer fofor a, mma ɔnnkɔ sa, nkyii so mma wɔmmfa edwuma biara nnto no do: ondzi noho wɔ fie afrenhyia, na ɔmma ne yer a oehyia no no akomatɔmu. 6Mma nyimpa bi nngye ewuyambo anaa ewuyambobaa a ɔda do no ahoba: nna tserɛ ɔregye nyimpa no nkwa dɛ ahoba.
7Sɛ wohu nyimpa a owia no nuanom Israel mu bi, na ɔtseetsee no, anaa ɔtɔn no a; ɔno owifo no nwu; ama eeyi mbusu no efi wo mu.
8Hwɛ yie wɔ kwata owuyar ho, na aadwen do yie ayɛ dɛ mbrɛ asɔfo Levifo no bɛkyerɛkyerɛ hom no nyi nara: dɛ mbrɛ mehyɛɛ hɔn no, dɛmara so na hom ndwen do nyɛ. 9Kaa dza EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze yɛɛ Miriam wɔ ɔkwan no mu aber a hom fi Egypt reba no.
10Sɛ ebɔ wo nyɛnko bosa biara a, mma nnkɔ ne fie nnkɛgye n’ahobadze. 11Abow enyim na gyina, na nyimpa a ebɔ no bosa no mfa ahobadze no mfir edzi mbrɛ wo wɔ abow enyim. 12Na sɛ ɔyɛ ohianyi a, mma mmfa n’ahobadze no nnda: 13sɛ wi kɔtɔ a, fa ahobadze no san kɛma no, na ɔnda wɔ n’atar mu, na onhyira wo: na ɔnyɛ tsenenee mma wo wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim.
14Mma nnhyɛ ɔpaanyi a ɔyɛ ɔbɔbɔnyi nye ohianyi no do, sɛ ofi wo nuanom mu o, ofi w’ahɔhoe a wɔwɔ w’asaase do wɔ wo nkuropon mu o: 15ne da mu na ma no n’apaadze, nkyii so mma wi nnkɔtɔ do; osiandɛ ɔyɛ ɔbɔbɔnyi, na ɔdze n’akoma esi do: amma ɔaannka mu ammfrɛ EWURADZE enntsia wo, na aannyɛ bɔn amma wo.
16Mma wonnku egyanom wɔ mba hɔn bɔn ntsi, nkyii so mma wonnku mba wɔ egyanom hɔn bɔn ntsi: nyimpa biara nankasa no bɔn ntsi na wonku no.
17Mma nndan ɔhɔho, anaa egyanka n’atsɛmbu enyi na nngye okunafo akataho ahoba: 18na kaa dɛ eyɛɛ akowaa wɔ Egypt, na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn poon wo wɔ hɔ: dɛm ntsi na merehyɛ wo dɛ yɛ iyi yi.
19Sɛ itwa wo ndɔbaa wɔ wo haban mu, na wo werɛ fir ifi bi wɔ haban no mu a, mma nnsan nnkɔ nnkɛfa mmba: ma ɔnyɛ ɔhɔho, egyanka, nye okunafo dze: na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn eehyira wo wɔ wo nsaano edwuma nyinara mu.
20Sɛ eporow wo ngodua a, mma nnkɔ n’abaw no do bio: ma dza aka no nyɛ ɔhɔho, egyanka, nye okunafo dze. 21Sɛ etsew wo wenyin ture mu esikyireamba a, mma nnkedzi w’ekyir mpɛpɛw: ma ɔnyɛ ɔhɔho, egyanka, nye okunafo dze. 22Na kaa dɛ eyɛɛ akowaa wɔ Egypt asaase do: dɛm ntsi na merehyɛ wo dɛ yɛ iyi yi.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 25
Content:
1Sɛ ɔham ba mbanyin ntamu, na wɔba asɛndzii, na ntsɛmbuafo rubua hɔn atsɛn a; ɔno wombu ɔtseneneenyi no bem, na wombu ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi no fɔ; 2na ɔmbra dɛ, sɛ ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi no sɛ hwe a, ɔtsɛmbuafo no mma ɔnda famu, na wɔnhwe no wɔ n’enyim, dodow dɛ mbrɛ no bɔn no tse. 3Mbaa eduanan na ɔsɛ no a, mma ɔmmbor: ɔno bɛyɛ na sɛ ɔbor, na ɔhwe no mbaa pii sen iyi a, wo nua no adan w’enyi do ɔhorohoraanyi.
4Mma nnkata ɔnantwi ano aber a oritsia ewu.
Onua Asodzii Wɔ Onua Ho
5Sɛ enuanom bɔ mu tsena, na hɔn mu baako wu, na onnyi ɔbabanyin a, mma owufo no ne yer nnkɔ ehuw mu nnkɔwar ɔhɔho: no kun no no nua na ɔnkɔ ne nkyɛn, na ɔmfa no nyɛ ne yer, na ɔnyɛ okun no nua asɛdze no mma no. 6Na ɔmbra dɛ, abakan a ɔbɔwo no no nhyɛ no nua a oewu no ne dzin ananmu, na ne dzin aammpepa emmfi Israel. 7Na sɛ ɔbanyin no mmpɛ dɛ ɔfa no nua yer no a, ɔno no nua ne yer no nkɔ mpanyimfo nkyɛn wɔ kuropon no ano, na ɔnse dɛ, Mo kun no nua pow dɛ ɔma dzin do ma no nua wɔ Israel, ɔmmpɛ dɛ ɔyɛ kun no nua asɛdze no ma me. 8Ɔno no kurow no mu mpanyimfo no mfrɛ no, na wɔnkasa nkyerɛ no: na sɛ ogyina hɔ, na ɔse dɛ, Memmpɛ dɛ mefa no a; 9ɔno no nua ne yer no mbra ne nkyɛn wɔ mpanyimfo no enyim, onyi banyin no n’ananadze mpaboa na onhima n’enyi do ntafi; na ɔnse dɛ, Dɛm na wɔnyɛ ɔbanyin a ɔnnkyekyer no nua ne fi. 10Na wɔmfrɛ ne dzin wɔ Israel dɛ, Nyia ne mpaboa efi n’ananadze no ne fi.
11Sɛ mbanyin beenu roko, na ɔbaako ne yer twe bɛn dɛ ɔrebɛgye no kun efi nyia ɔrohwe no ne nsamu, na basia no tsen ne nsa suo banyin kor no ne banyin mu a: 12ɔno twa ɔbaa no ne nsa, mma w’enyi nnhu no mbɔbɔr.
13Mma nnya wo foto mu abrambo ahorow, kɛse nye kakraba. 14Mma nnya wo fi mu esusudze ahorow, kɛse nye kakraba. 15Abrambo kwan mu a ɔtsen na nya; esusudze kwan mu a ɔtsen na nya: na wo nda aawar wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do. 16Na hɔn a wɔyɛ dɛm ndzɛmba nyinara, mekyerɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ dza ɔmmfa kwan mu nyinara, yɛ ekyiwadze ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn.
Wɔnsɛɛ Amalek
17Kaa dza Amalek dze yɛɛ wo wɔ ɔkwan no mu aber a hom fi Egypt reba no; 18mbrɛ osii behyiaa wo wɔ ɔkwan no mu, na ɔbɔɔ w’ekyirfo, hɔn a wɔyɛ mberɛw wɔ w’ekyir nyinara, aber a atɔ bahaw na aberɛ; na oennsuro Nyankopɔn. 19Dɛm ntsi ɔmbra dɛ, sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ma wo ahomgye fi w’atamfo a woetwa wo ho ehyia nyinara nsamu wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ fa yɛ egyapadze no do a, pepa Amalek nkaa fi ɔsor ase; mma wo werɛ mmfir.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 26
Content:
Nduadzewakan Afɔrbɔ
1Na ɔmbra dɛ, sɛ idu asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo dɛ egyapadze no do, na efa, na etsena do a; 2fa asaase no do nduadzewa a ibenya no wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do no, no nduadzewa a odzi kan no nyinara mu bi; na fa gu kɛntsɛn mu, na fa kɔ beebi mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsan mu eyi dɛ ne dzin ntsena hɔ no. 3Na kɔ ɔsɔfo a ɔbɛtsena hɔ nda no mu no nkyɛn, na se no dɛ ndɛ da yi mepaa mu meka kyerɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, dɛ medu asaase a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hɛn egyanom dɛ ɔdze rema hɛn no do. 4Na ɔsɔfo no ngye kɛntsɛn no wɔ wo nsamu, na ɔmfa nsi EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn n’afɔrmbukyia no enyim. 5Na bua na ka no wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim dɛ, Sirianyi a ɔreyɛ ahera nye m’egya, na osianee kɔr Egypt, na ɔkɛtsenaa hɔ, ne nyimpa kumaabi; na ɔyɛɛ ɔman kɛse a wɔyɛ dzen, na wɔdɔree wɔ hɔ: 6na Egyptfo no yɛɛ hɛn bɔn, na wohiahiaa hɛnho, na wɔdze nkowaasom dzendzen too hɛn do: 7na yɛkekaa mu frɛɛ EWURADZE, hɛn egyanom Nyankopɔn, na EWURADZE tsiee hɛn ndze, na ohun hɛn ahohiahia, nye hɛn fona, nye hɛn su: 8na EWURADZE dze nsa a ɔyɛ dzen, nye abasa a wɔatserɛw mu, nye suro akɛse, nye nsɛnkyerɛdze, nye anwanwadze yii hɛn fii Egypt firii: 9na ɔdze hɛn aba bea yi do, na ɔdze asaase yi ama hɛn, asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do. 10Na afei, hwɛ, medze asaase a ɔwo, EWURADZE, dze ama me no do nduadzewa a odzi kan no aba. Na fa si EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim, na sɔr wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim: 11na gye w’enyi wɔ adzepa a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze ama ɔwo, nye wo fi nyinara mu, ɔwo, nye Levinyi, nye ɔhɔho a ɔwɔ wo mu no.
12Sɛ iwie wo ndɔbaa mu ebupɛn du du nyinara yiyi wɔ afe a otsia ebiasa no a ɔyɛ ebupɛn du du yiyi afe no mu a, ɔno fa ma Levinyi, nye ɔhɔho, nye egyanka, nye ekunafo, ma wondzi wɔ wo kuropon mu, mmee; 13na se wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim dɛ, Meyi ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn no efi me fie, na afei so medze ama Levinyi, nye ɔhɔho, nye egyanka, nye okunafo, dɛ mbrɛ wo mbrasɛm a edze ahyɛ me no nyinara tse monntoo wo mbransɛm mu biara, nkyii so mo werɛ mmfirii. 14Minndzii bi wɔ m’eyiyɛ mu, nkyii so minnyii bi nnkyenee dɛ no ho nntsew ntsi, na memmfaa bi memmaa ewufo so: metsie EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn ndze, mayɛ dɛ mbrɛ edze ahyɛ me no nyinara. 15Fi wo tsenabew krɔnkrɔn no, wɔ ɔsor, hwɛ famu, na hyira wo man Israel, nye asaase a edze ama hɛn no, dɛ mbrɛ ekaa ntam kyerɛɛ hɛn egyanom no, asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do no.
16Ndɛ da yi EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn rehyɛ wo dɛ yɛ ahyɛdze nye atsɛmbu yi: dɛm ntsi fa w’akoma nyinara nye wo kra nyinara dzi do na yɛ. 17Ndɛ da yi, aka ato gua dɛ edze EWURADZE bɛyɛ wo Nyankopɔn, na anantsew n’akwan mu, na edze n’ahyɛdze, nye ne mbransɛm, nye ne ntsɛmbu do, na etsie ne ndze: 18na EWURADZE aka ato gua ndɛ da yi dɛ ebɛyɛ nankasa no soronko man, dɛ mbrɛ ɔabɔ wo anohoba no, na eedzi ne mbransɛm nyinara do; 19na ɔaama wo do akyɛn amanaman a ɔayɛ nyinara, wɔ ayɛyi mu, nye dzin mu, nye enyidzi mu; na aayɛ ɔman krɔnkrɔn ama EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, dɛ mbrɛ ɔaka no.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 27
Content:
Mbra No Wɔ Abopon Do
1Na Moses nye Israel mpanyimfo no hyɛɛ ɔman no dɛ, Hom ndzi mbrasɛm a merehyɛ hom ndɛ da yi nyinara do. 2Na ɔmbra dɛ, da a hom botwa Jordan akɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do no, fa abo akɛse sisi hɔ, na fa ntarho tetar ho: 3na kyerɛw mbra yi mu nsɛm nyinara wɔ do, aber a etwa no; na aakɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do, asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do no, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE, w’egyanom Nyankopɔn, abɔ wo anohoba no. 4Na ɔmbra dɛ aber a hom etwa Jordan no, hom mfa abo yi a merehyɛ hom ndɛ da yi, nsisi hɔ wɔ bepɔw Ebal do, na fa ntarho tetar ho. 5Na hɔ na si afɔrmbukyia ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, abo afɔrmbukyia a: mma emma dadze edwindze do wɔ do. 6Abo a wonntwae na fa si EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn afɔrmbukyia no: na bɔ ɔhyew afɔr wɔ do ma EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn: 7na bɔ asomdwee afɔr, na dzidzi wɔ hɔ; na gye w’enyi wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim. 8Na kyerɛw mbra yi mu nsɛm nyinara petee wɔ abo no do.
9Na Moses nye Levifo asɔfo no kasaa kyerɛɛ Israel nyinara dɛ, Israel, hom nyɛ dzinn, na hom ntsie; ndɛ da yi abɛyɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne man. 10Dɛm ntsi tsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne ndze, na dzi ne mbransɛm na n’ahyɛdze a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi do.
Koko Ebal Do Mpaa
11Na Moses hyɛɛ ɔman no da no ara, dɛ, 12Iyinom na wongyina bepɔw Gerizim do nhyira ɔman no, aber a hom etwa Jordan no; Simeon, Levi, Juda, Isakar Josef, nye Benjamin: 13na iyinom ngyina bepɔw Ebal do mpaa; Reuben, Gad Aser, Zebulun, Dan, nye Naftali. 14Na Levifo no mfa ndze kɛse ntsea mu, na wɔnse Israelfo no nyinara dɛ: 15Mpaa nka nyimpa a ɔbɛyɛ ohonyi a wɔasen anaa woegu, EWURADZE ekyiwadze, odwimfo nsaano edwuma, na ɔdze besi kokoa mu. Na ɔman no nyinara mbua nse dɛ, Amen.
16Mpaa nka nyia ɔyaw n’egya anaa ne na. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ, Amen.
17Mpaa nka nyia ɔtwe ne nyɛnko n’asaasehe. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ, Amen.
18Mpaa nka nyia ɔma onyifurafo fi ɔkwan do kyin. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ, Amen.
19Mpaa nka nyia ɔdan ɔhɔho, egyanka, nye okunafo atsɛmbu enyi. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ, Amen.
20Mpaa nka nyia ɔnye n’egya yer da; osiandɛ oeyi n’egya n’akataho. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ, Amen.
21Mpaa nka nyia ɔnye abowa biara da. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ, Amen.
22Mpaa nka nyia ɔnye n’akyerɛbaa da, n’egya ne babaa, anaa ne na ne babaa. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ, Amen.
23Mpaa nka nyia ɔnye n’asew da. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ, Amen.
24Mpaa nka nyia ɔbɔ ne nyɛnko adze nsumaa mu. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ, Amen.
25Mpaa nka nyia ɔgye mboaba dɛ oboku nyimpa a odzi bem. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ, Amen.
26Mpaa nka nyia ɔnnhyɛ mbra yi mu nsɛm dzen dɛ ɔbɛyɛ. Na ɔman no nyinara nse dɛ, Amen.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 28
Content:
Setsie Do Nhyira
(Levitikɔs 26.3-13; Deuteronomi 7.12-24)
1Na ɔbɛba dɛ, sɛ itsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne ndze yie, dɛ ebɔdwen do ayɛ ne mbransɛm a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi nyinara a, EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛma wo do akɔ sor asen asaase do amanaman nyinara: 2na nhyira yi nyinara bɛba wo do, na wɔabɔto wo, osiandɛ itsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ndze. 3Nhyira bɛka wo wɔ kurow mu, na nhyira aka wo wɔ haban mu. 4Nhyira bɛka wo honam mu aba, na w’asaase do aba, na wo fiembowa mu aba, w’anantwi ndɔree, nye wo nguankuw mu mburwa. 5Nhyira bɛka wo kɛntsɛn nye wo mbɔrkorow. 6Nhyira bɛka wo wɔ wo fie ba mu, na nhyira bɛka wo wɔ w’edzifir mu. 7EWURADZE bɛma w’atamfo a wɔsoɛr wo do no edzi nkogu wɔ w’enyim: wɔnam ɔkwan kor do bɛba wo do, na wɔnam akwan esuon do eguan wɔ w’enyim. 8EWURADZE bɛhyɛ ma nhyira aba wo do wɔ w’asan do, na dza edze wo nsa bɛka nyinara mu; na obehyira wo wɔ asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze rema wo no do. 9Sɛ idzi EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne mbransɛm do, na enantsew n’akwan do a EWURADZE dze wo betsim hɔ ma aayɛ ɔman krɔnkrɔn ama noara, dɛ mbrɛ ɔaka ntam akyerɛ wo no. 10Na asaase do aman nyinara bohu dɛ wɔdze EWURADZE dzin afrɛ wo; na wobosuro wo. 11Na EWURADZE bɛma yie ebu wo do, wɔ wo honam mu aba mu, nye wo fiembowa aba mu, nye w’asaase aba mu, wɔ asaase a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ w’egyanom dɛ ɔdze bɛma wo no do. 12EWURADZE bobue ɔsor n’adzepa korabea no ama wo na ɔaama w’asaase do nyankom atɔ wɔ n’aber mu, na oeehyira wo nsaano edwuma nyinara do: na edze bɛfɛm amanaman pii, na ɔwo remmfɛm. 13sɛ itsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne mbransɛm a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi dɛ ebɔdwen do ayɛ a, EWURADZE bɛma akɔ kan na ennkɛka ekyir; na ɔwo bɔbɔ do ara nko, na eremmba ase. 14Ne dɛm ntsi mma nndan mmfi nsɛm a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi ho, mmfa enyimfa, anaa abankum, nnkɔ nnkedzi enyame fofor ekyir nnkɔsom hɔn.
Asoɔdzen No Nsunsuando
(Levitikɔs 26.14-46)
15Na ɔbɛba dɛ, sɛ enntsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne ndze dɛ ebɔdwen do edzi ne mbransɛm nye n’ahyɛdze a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi nyinara do a; mpaa yi nyinara bɛba wo do, na wɔabɛmen wo. 16Mpaa bɛka wo wɔ kurow mu, na mpaa aka wo wɔ haban mu. 17Mpaa bɛka wo kɛntsɛn, nye wo mbɔrkorow. 18Mpaa bɛka wo honam mu aba, nye w’asaase mu aba, nye w’anantwi mu ndɔree, nye wo nguankuw mu mburwa. 19Mpaa bɛka wo wɔ wo fie ba mu, na mpaa bɛka wo wɔ w’edzifir mu. 20EWURADZE bɛma mpaa, nkogu, nye adapaabɔ aba wo do, wɔ dza edze wo nsa bɛka ayɛ nyinara mu, dze ekodu dɛ ebɛsɛɛ, na ayew ntsɛm; osian wo ndzeyɛɛ a enam do apow me ntsi. 21EWURADZE bɛma ɔyardɔm afam wo ho, dze ekodu dɛ ɔahyew wo efi asaase a erokɔ do akɛfa no do. 22EWURADZE dze asasawaw, nye etsiridii, nye ahohur, nye ahohyehye kɛse, nye nkrantsee, nye ɔhow, nye ɔpo bɔbɔ wo; na wobetsiw wo araa ekodu dɛ ebɛsɛɛ. 23Na ɔsor bɛyɛ dɛ boran ama wo, na asaase adan dadze ama wo. 24EWURADZE bɛma etudur na huntuma atɔ dɛ nsu egu wo do araa ekodu dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ wo. 25EWURADZE bɛma edzi w’atamfo enyim ɔkogu: enam ɔkwan kor do befir edzi ekehyia hɔn, na enam akwan esuon do eguan wɔ hɔn enyim: na wobedzi wo akɔnaaba wɔ asaase do ahendzi nyinara mu. 26Na wo fun bɛyɛ wimu ntumbowa nyinara, nye asaase do mbowa edziban, na obiara rennka hɔn. 27EWURADZE dze Egypt pɔmpɔ, tukuruw, satwem, nye ntwem a worunntum wo eduyɛ bɔbobɔ wo. 28EWURADZE dze abɔdam, nye enyifura, nye akoma mu ahodwuruw bɔbɔ wo; 29na ebɛkeka ewiaber ketee, dɛ ofurafo rekeka wɔ sum mu, na w’akwan mu rennyɛ wo yie: na ɔhyɛ nko na wɔbɛhyɛ wo na wɔafow wo dabaa, na obiara renngye wo. 30Ebɛgye ayewar, na ɔbanyin fofor bi nye no ada: ibesi dan, na erenntsena mu: ebɛtsɛw wenyin ture, na erenntsew n’aba bi. 31Woboku wo nantwi wɔ w’enyim, na irinndzi bi: wɔbɛfa w’asoaso enyimpi do wɔ w’enyim, na wɔrenndan mma wo: wɔdze wo nguan bɛma w’atamfo na innkenya obi ma ɔaagye wo. 32Wɔdze wo mbabanyin nye wo mbabaa bɛma ɔman fofor bi na w’enyiwa bɔhwɛ, na hɔn ho enyigyinae egura wo daa nyinara: na tum biara nnyi wo nsamu. 33W’asaase do aba, nye w’edwumadze nyinara, na ɔman a innyim hɔn bedzi; na ɔhyɛ nko na wɔbɛhyɛ wo na wɔadwerew wo dabaa: 34dɛm ntsi w’enyiwa do adze a ibohu no bɔbɔ wo dam. 35EWURADZE dze pɔmpɔ bɔn bɔbɔ wo wɔ anankoroma, nye aserɛ do a worunntum wo eduyɛ, efi w’ananadze ekodu w’etsifipampamu. 36EWURADZE dze ɔwo, nye wo hen a ibesi no wo do no, bɔkɔ ɔman a ɔwo nye w’egyanom nnyim no mu; na hɔ na ebɔsom enyame fofor, ndua nye abo. 37Na ebɛdan ahodwuruwdze, akasabɛbu, nye ifen, wɔ aman a EWURADZE bɛma akɔ no nyinara mu. 38Ebɔsoa aba pii akɔ haban mu, na kakrabaabi na ebɔboa ano aba fie; na mbɛbɛw bedzi. 39Ebɛtsetsɛw wenyin nture na esiesie mu, na ne nsa dze eronnom, na erenntsew esikyireamba no so; na mbowaba bedzi. 40Ibenya ngodua wɔ wo ntoado nyinara, na ngo no dze erennsera woho bi; na wo ngodua no bɔporow n’aba. 41Ebɔwo mbabanyin nye mbabaa, na wɔrennyɛ wodze; na wɔbɔkɔ ndɔmmum mu. 42Wo ndua nyinara nye w’asaase do aba no mbɛbɛw bɛfa. 43Ɔhɔho a ɔwɔ wo mu bɛkyɛn wo akɔ sorsorsor; na ɔwo dze ibesian aba famufamu. 44Ɔno na ɔdze bɛfɛm wo, na ɔwo dze, irinnya mmfɛm no: ɔno na ɔbɔkɔ kan, na ɔwo aka ekyir. 45Na mpaa yi nyinara bɛba wo do, na woetsiw wo, na wɔamen wo, ekodu dɛ ebɛsɛɛ; osiandɛ enntsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ndze, dɛ ibedzi ne mbransɛm nye n’ahyɛdze a ɔhyɛ wo no do: 46na ɔbɛyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze nye anwanwadze, wɔ ɔwo nye w’asefo do daa: 47osiandɛ ammfa enyigye, nye akoma pa annsom EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, wɔ adze nyinara no dodow mu ntsi: 48dɛm ntsi ebɔsom w’atamfo a EWURADZE bɔsoma hɔn ma wɔaaba wo do no, wɔ ɔkɔm, nsukɔm, adagyaw, nye ndzɛmba nyinara ho hia mu: na ɔdze dadze kɔndua bɔto wo kɔn do, ekodu dɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ wo. 49EWURADZE dze ɔman bi befi ekyirekyir efi asaase ano aba wo do, dɛ mbrɛ ɔkɔr tu; ɔman a enntse hɔn kasaa; 50ɔman a hɔn enyim yɛ hu a wɔmmfɛr akɔdaa enyim, na wɔnnkyerɛ enyimtsewee wɔ aberantsɛ do so: 51na obedzi wo fiembowa mu aba, na w’asaase do aba, ekodu dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ wo: eso orinngya wo eburow, nsa, anaa ngo, w’anantwi mu ndɔree, anaa wo nguankuw mu mburwa, ekodu dɛ ɔbɛma asɛe. 52Na ɔbɔkɔ wo ntua wɔ wo nkuropon nyinara mu, ekodu dɛ w’afasu atsentsen a ɔyɛ dzen no a edze wo werɛ hyɛ mu no bodwuruw egu famu, wɔ w’asaase nyina do: na ɔbɔkɔ wo ntua wɔ wo nkuropon nyinara a ɔwɔ w’asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze ama wo no nyinara do. 53Na ibedzi woara wo honam mu aba, wo mbabanyin nye wo mbabaa a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze ama wo no hɔn nam; wɔ ntua nye ahokyer a w’atamfo bɛma wo ho akyer wo no mu. 54Ɔbanyin a ɔdwe na ɔwɔ tsema wɔ hom mu no n’enyiwa bɛyɛ bɔn wɔ no nua, nye ne yer a ɔda no bo mu, nye ne mba nkaa a wɔama wɔaka no ho: 55dɛ ɔremma hɔn mu biara ne mba nam a oridzi no bi, osiandɛ biribiara annka amma no; wɔ ntua nye ahokyer a wo tamfo bɛma wo ho akyer wo wɔ wo nkuropon nyinara mu no mu. 56Hom mu ɔbaa so a ɔdwe na ɔsonsɔn no ho na ɔnam mberɛwyɛ ntsi ɔnnsɔe nnhwɛɛ pɛn dɛ ɔdze n’ananadze bɛka famu no, bɛyɛ nyimpa bɔn wɔ no kun a ɔda no bo mu, nye ne babanyin, nye ne babaa ho; 57na ɔbɔwe ne mba a ɔbɔwo hɔn no nye ekyiradze no wɔ nsumaa mu: wɔ ahohia a ofi ntua nye ahokyer a wo tamfo bɛma aba wo do wɔ wo nkuropon mu no ntsi. 58Sɛ eronndwen do nnyɛ mbra yi mu nsɛm nyinara a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ nwoma yi mu, na ennsuro enyimnyam dzin a no ho yɛ hu yi, EWURADZE WO NYANKOPƆN no a, 59ɔno EWURADZE bɛma wo yardɔm, nye w’asefo yardɔm ayɛ nwanwa; mekyerɛ ɔyardɔm akɛse a ɔkyɛr, nye yarba bɔn a ɔkyɛr. 60Na ɔdze Egypt yarba no a isuro no nyinara bɛba wo do bio; na ɔabɛfemfam wo ho. 61Eso yarba biara, nye ɔyardɔm biara a wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ mbra yi no nwoma mu no, ɔno na EWURADZE dze bɛba wo do, ekodu dɛ wɔbɛsɛɛ wo. 62Na ɔbɛka hom nyimpa kakrabaabi, naaso nna nkyɛ hom dodow tse dɛ ɔsor nworaba; osiandɛ hom enntsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne ndze. 63Na ɔbɛba dɛ, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’enyi gye hom ho dɛ ɔbɛyɛ hom yie, na ɔama hom adɔr no; dɛmara so na EWURADZE n’enyi bɛgye hom ho dɛ ɔbɛma hom ase etu, na ɔasɛɛ hom: na wɔbɛpempan hom efi asaase a hom rokɔ do akɛfa no do. 64Na EWURADZE bɔbɔ wo apetse aman nyinara mu, efi asaase ano kor araa ekodu asaase ano kor so; na hɔ na ebɔsom enyame fofor a ɔwo nye w’egyanom nnyim hɔn, mekyerɛ ndua nye abo. 65Na amanaman iyinom mu irinnya ahotɔ, na w’ananadze rinnya ahomgye: na EWURADZE bɛma wo ahopopo akoma, nye enyiwa a ayɛ siamoo, nye ɔkra a etwintwam wɔ hɔ: 66na wo nkwa bɛsɛn ehihim wɔ w’enyim; na ibosuro adzesaa nye adzekyee, na irinnya wo nkwa ho gyedzi biara: 67anapa ebɛse dɛ, Kɛtseankyɛ ewimbir a: na ewimbir so ebɛse dɛ, Kɛtseankyɛ anapa a: wɔ w’akoma mu suro a ibosuro, nye w’enyiwa do adze a ibohu no ntsi. 68Na EWURADZE dze ahɛn dze wo bɛsan akɔ Egypt, wɔ ɔkwan a mekaa wo ho asɛm dɛ irunnhu bio no do: na hɔ na hom bɔtontɔn homho ama hom atamfo ayɛ nkowaa nye mfonabaa, na nyimpa biara ronntɔ hom.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 29
Content:
EWURADZE Nye Israel Dzi Ahyɛmu Wɔ Moab
1Iyi nye ahyɛmu a EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses dɛ ɔnye Israelmba ndzi wɔ Moab asaase do, nka ahyɛmu a ɔnye hɔn dzii wɔ Horeb no ho no, no mu nsɛm.
2Na Moses frɛɛ Israel nyinara, na ɔsee hɔn dɛ, Hom ehu adze nyinara a EWURADZE dze yɛɛ Farao, nye no nkowaa nyinara, nye n’asaase nyinara, wɔ hom enyiwa mu, wɔ Egypt asaase do; 3nsɔhwɛ akɛse a w’enyiwa hunii, nsɛnkyerɛdze, nye anwanwadze akɛse no: 4naaso obodu ndɛ da yi, EWURADZE mmaa wo dɛm akoma a onyim dze, enyiwa a wɔdze hwɛ, nye asowa a wɔdze tsie. 5Na medzi hom enyim ma hom anantsew mfe eduanan wɔ sar no do; hom ntar nnsuwii wɔ hom ho, na wo mpaboa nntsetsewee wɔ w’ananadze. 6Hom nndzii paanoo, nkyii so hom nnoom wenyin anaa nsa dzendzen: ama hom eehu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn. 7Na aber a hom dur bea yi do no, Hesbonhen Sihon, nye Basenhen Ɔge, fiir edzi baa hɛn do nye hɛn bɔkoe, na yekum hɔn; 8na yɛfaa hɔn asaase, na yɛdze maa Reubenfo, nye Gadfo, nye Manaasɛfo ebusuakuw ɔfa no, dɛ egyapadze. 9Dɛm ntsi hom ndzi ahyɛmu yi mu nsɛm do, na hom nyɛ, na hom aayɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ dza hom yɛ nyinara mu.
10Ndɛ da yi hom nyinara hom ngyina EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn enyim; hom etsitsir, hom ebusuakuw ebusuakuw, hom mpanyimfo, nye hom ahwɛdofo, mekyerɛ Israel mbanyin nyinara, 11hom mbofraba, hom yernom, nye wo hɔhoe a ɔwɔ wo nseraban mu, ofi wo duatwafo do dze kodu wo nsusawfo do: 12ama aahɛn EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn n’ahyɛmu, nye ne nsew a Ɔnye wo ridzi ndɛ da yi mu: 13ama ɔdze wo eesi hɔ ndɛ da yi dɛ ɔman ama noho, na ɔno so aayɛ Nyankopɔn ama wo, dɛ mbrɛ ɔkaa kyerɛɛ wo, na dɛ mbrɛ ɔkaa ntam kyerɛɛ w’egyanom, Abraham, Isaak, nye Jakob no. 14Nkyii so nnyɛ hom nko na menye hom ridzi ahyɛmu yi nye nsew yi: 15mbom menye nyia ɔnye hɛn gyina EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn enyim ha ndɛ da yi, na eso menye nyia ɔnnye hɛn nnyi ha ndɛ da yi: 16(na hom nyim mbrɛ yesii tsenaa Egypt asaase do; na mbrɛ yesii twaa mu wɔ amanaman a hom faa hɔn mu baa no mu; 17na hom ehu hɔn ekyiwadze, na hɔn abosom, ndua nye abo, dwetɛ nye sika a ɔwɔ hɔn mu no:) 18Na hom nhwɛ yie amma hom mu ɔbanyin bi, anaa ɔbaa bi, anaa ebusua bi, anaa ebusuakuw bi n’akoma anndan ndɛ da yi emmfi EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn ho, dɛ ɔrokɔ akɔsom amanaman no hɔn enyame no: na ndwow bi aammba hom mu a ɔsow bɔr nye ɔbɔwen; 19na aammba dɛ, sɛ ɔtse mpaa yi mu nsɛm a, oeennhyira noho wɔ n’akoma mu, dɛ, mibenya asomdwee, kaansa menam m’akoma no sorow mu mpo a, amma wɔaannsɛɛ dza afɔw annka dza awow ho. 20EWURADZE remmfa nnkyɛ no, na mbom EWURADZE n’ebufuw nye ne nyinkuntwe bopun nyimpa no, na mpaa a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ nwoma yi mu no nyinara bodwir no do, na EWURADZE bɛpepa ne dzin efi asaase do. 21Na EWURADZE beyi no efi Israel ebusuakuw nyinara mu esi hɔ ama mbusu, dɛ mbrɛ ahyɛmu a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ mbra nwoma yi mu mpaa no tse nyinara. 22Na ebusuasantsen a wɔbɛba no, hom mba a wɔbɔsoɛr edzi hom ekyir no, nye ɔnanaben a ofi ekyirekyir asaase do bɛba no, sɛ wohu asaase no do yardɔm, nye nyarbanyarba a EWURADZE dze ama wɔayar no a, wɔbɛse dɛ; 23n’asaase nyinara ayɛ sɔɔfee nye nkyen, nye nkyewee, wonndua do adze, ɔnnsow, nkyɛkyɛr mpo mmfir do, ɔtse dɛ Sodom nye Gomora, Adma nye Zeboim mbutuwii a EWURADZE nam n’ebufuw nye n’ebufuhyew mu butuwii no: 24mekyerɛ amanaman nyinara bɛse dɛ, Ebɛnadze ntsi na EWURADZE ayɛ asaase yi dɛm yi? Ebufuw kɛse hyeehyew yi ase nye dɛn? 25Nna nkorɔfo bɛse dɛ, Osiandɛ wɔpoow EWURADZE, hɔn egyanom Nyankopɔn ahyɛmu a oyii hɔn wɔ Egypt asaase do no ɔnye hɔn dzii no; 26na wɔkɔree kɔsoom enyame fofor, na wɔsɔɔr hɔn, enyame a wonnyim hɔn, na ɔammfa hɔn amma hɔn: 27dɛm ntsi na EWURADZE ebufuw dzɛwee wɔ asaase yi do, ma ɔdze mpaa a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ nwoma yi mu nyinara aba do; 28na EWURADZE tutuu hɔn ase fii hɔn asaase do wɔ ebufuw, nye ebufuhyew, nye ahohyehye kɛse mu, na wɔatow hɔn egu asaase bi so do, dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi. 29Ndzɛmba a osuma yɛ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn dze: na ndzɛmba a wɔada no edzi no dze ɔyɛ hɛn nye hɛn mba dze daa, ama yeedzi mbra yi mu nsɛm nyinara do.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 30
Content:
Nnuho Ho Ekyir Nhyira
1Na ɔbɛba dɛ, sɛ ndzɛmba iyinom nyinara ba wo do, nhyira nye mpaa a, medze esi w’enyim yi, na ekaakaa no wɔ amanaman nyinara mu mbrɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn apam wo akɔ no, 2na sɛ ɔwo, nye wo mba san ba EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn nkyɛn, na edze w’akoma nyinara, na ɔnye wo kra nyinara tsie ne ndze na eyɛ dza merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi nyinara a; 3ɔno na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛdan wo ndɔmmumkɔ no, na oenya ayamuhyehye ama wo, na ɔasan aboa w’ano efi aman a ɔnoara EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn abɔ wo apetse mu no nyinara mu. 4Sɛ wo nyimpa a wɔapam hɔn no bi wɔ ɔsor ano no ho mpo a, ofitsi hɔ na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɔboa w’ano, na hɔ na ɔbɛfa wo efi: 5na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze wo bɛba asaase a w’egyanom nyaa no do, na aafa; na ɔbɛyɛ wo yie, na ɔama adɔr akyɛn w’egyanom. 6Na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛma ɔwo nye w’asefo akoma, a ɔdwe, na edze w’akoma nye wo kra nyinara, aadɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, na eenya nkwa. 7Na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze mpaa yi nyinara bogu w’atamfo, nye hɔn a wokyir wo a wohiahia wo ho no do. 8Na ɔwo dze, ebɛsan ebetsie EWURADZE ndze, na edzi ne mbransɛm a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi nyinara do. 9Na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn bɛma yie ebu wo do wɔ wo nsaano edwuma nyinara mu, wɔ wo honam mu aba mu, nye wo fiembowa aba mu, nye w’asaase do aba mu, wɔ wo yieyɛ ntsi: na EWURADZE n’enyi bɛsan agye wo ho wɔ wo yieyɛ ntsi, dɛ mbrɛ n’enyi gyee w’egyanom ho no: 10sɛ ibetsie EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ndze, dɛ ibedzi ne mbransɛm nye n’ahyɛdze a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ mbra nwoma yi mu no do, dɛ edze w’akoma nyinara, na ɔnye wo kra nyinara bɛsan aba EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn nkyɛn a.
11Na mbrasɛm yi a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi, ɔnnyɛ dzendzen dodow mma wo, nkyii so onnyi ekyirekyir. 12Onnyi sor, na aase dɛ, Woana na ɔbɔfow akɔ sor ama hɛn, na ɔakɛfa abrɛ hɛn, na ɔama yɛatse, na yɛayɛ. 13Nkyii so onnyi po n’egya, na aase dɛ, Woana na obotwa po ama hɛn, na ɔakɛfa abrɛ hɛn, na ɔama yɛatse, ma yaayɛ. 14Na asɛm no bɛn wo dodoodow, ɔwɔ w’anomu, na ɔwɔ w’akoma mu, ama aayɛ.
15Hwɛ, ndɛ da yi medze nkwa nye papa, nye owu nye bɔn, esi w’enyim; 16wɔ dɛ merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi dɛ dɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, nantsew n’akwan do, na dzi ne mbransɛm nye n’ahyɛdze nye ne ntsɛmbu do, na aatsena ase na aadɔr, na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ehyira wo wɔ asaase a erokɔ do akɛfa no do. 17Mbom sɛ w’akoma dan, na enntsie, na ema wɔtwe wo kɔ, na ekɔsɔr enyame fofor, na esom hɔn a; 18mepaa mu meka kyerɛ hom ndɛ da yi, dɛ ɔsɛɛ na hom bɛsɛɛ; na hom remma hom nda nnwar wɔ asaase mbrɛ irutwa Jordan akɔ do akɛfa no do. 19Mefrɛ ɔsor nye asaase dɛ wondzi hom dase ndɛ da yi, dɛ medze nkwa nye owu, nhyira nye mpaa esi w’enyim: dɛm ntsi fa nkwa, ma ɔwo, nye w’asefo nnya nkwa: 20na dɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, tsie ne ndze, na takyer no ho: na ɔno nye wo nkwa, nye wo nda ne tsentsen: ama aatsena asaase a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ w’egyanom, Abraham, Isaak, nye Jakob dɛ ɔdze bɛma hɔn no do.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 31
Content:
Josua Si Moses N’ananmu
1Na Moses kɔree kɛkaa asɛm yi kyerɛɛ Israel nyinara. 2Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ, Ndɛ yi, medzi mfe ɔha eduonu; emi a munntum nnkɔ, emi so a munntum mmba: na eso EWURADZE ase me dɛ, Irunntwa Jordan yi. 3EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn, ɔno na odzi w’enyim rukotwa; ɔno na ɔbɛsɛɛ amanaman yi efi w’enyim, na afa hɔn: na Josua na oridzi w’enyim ekotwa, dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE aka no. 4Na EWURADZE bɛyɛ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ Amorifo ahemfo, Sihon nye Ɔge a ɔsɛɛ hɔn, nye hɔn asaase no. 5EWURADZE beyi hɔn ama wɔ hom enyim, na hom ayɛ hɔn dɛ mbrɛ mbransɛm a mahyɛ hom nyinara tse. 6Hom nhyɛ dzen na hom nnya akokodur, mma hom nnsuro, mma hɔn ho nnyɛ hom hu so; na EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn no, ɔno na ɔnye wo rokɔ, ɔremmpa wo, na ɔrommpow wo so. 7Na Moses frɛɛ Josua, na ɔsee no wɔ Israel nyinara enyim dɛ, Hyɛ dzen na nya akokodur; na ɔwo na edze ɔman yi bɔkɔ asaase a EWURADZE aka ho ntam akyerɛ hɔn egyanom dɛ ɔdze bɛma hɔn no do; na ɔwo na ebɛma woenya edzi. 8Na EWURADZE, ɔno nye nyia oridzi w’enyim akɔ; obedzi w’ekyir, ɔremmpa wo, nkyii so ɔrommpow wo; mma nnsuro, nkyii so mma w’akoma nntu.
Mfe Esuon Biara Wɔnkenkan Mbra No
9Na Moses kyerɛɛw mbra yi, na ɔdze maa asɔfo Levi mbabanyin no a wɔsoa EWURADZE ahyɛmudaka no, nye Israel mpanyimfo nyinara. 10Na Moses hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ, Mfe esuon biara n’ewiei, akwangya afe n’aber a wɔahyɛ no mu, ntamadan afahyɛ no mu, 11aber a Israel nyinara rubopue wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn enyim wɔ beebi mbrɛ ɔbɛsan mu eyi no, kenkan mbra yi wɔ Israel nyinara enyim ma wɔntse. 12Boaboa ɔman no ano, mbanyin nye mbaa nye mbofraba, nye wo hɔhoe a ɔwɔ wo nkuropon mu, ma wontsie, na wonsua, na wonsuro EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn, na wɔndwen do ndzi mbra yi mu nsɛm nyinara do; 13na hɔn mba a wonnyim no ntsie, na wonsua dɛ wonsuro EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn, aber tsentsen nyina a hom tse asaase no do mbrɛ hom rukotwa Jordan akɛfa no.
EWURADZE Ka Asoɔdzen A Israel Bɛyɛ No Ho Asɛm
14Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ, Hwɛ, wo nda a ibowu abɛn: frɛ Josua, na wonkeyi homho nkyerɛ wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu, ma menhyɛ no mbra. Na Moses nye Josua kɔree, na wokeyii hɔnho kyerɛe wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu. 15Na EWURADZE nam mununkum dum mu yii noho edzi wɔ Buw no mu: na mununkum dum no begyinaa Buw no n’abowano. 16Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ, Hwɛ, ɔwo, iribetsiw wo nananom wɔ samanadze na ɔman yi bɔsoɛr, na woekedzi asaase no do enyame ekyir wɔ ndwamangor mu, wɔ mbrɛ wɔrokɔ akɔforafora hɔn mu no, na wɔbɔpow me na wɔato m’ahyɛmu a menye hɔn edzi no. 17Ɔno na m’ebufuw bɛdzɛw wɔ hɔn do wɔ da no mu, na mapow hɔn, na medze m’enyim esuma hɔn, na wɔamen hɔn, na mbusu nye ɔfona pii bɛba hɔn do; ama wɔaaka wɔ da no mu dɛ, Ana nnyɛ hɛn Nyankopɔn a onnyi hɛn mu ntsi na mbusu yi aba hɛn do bi a? 18Na suma ara na medze m’enyim mubosuma wɔ da no mu wɔ mbusu a wɔabɔ no nyinara ntsi, wɔ dɛ wɔadan akɔ enyame fofor nkyɛn ntsi. 19Dɛm ntsi afei hom nkyerɛw ndwom yi mma hom ho, na fa kyerɛkyerɛ Israelmba: fa hyɛ hɔn anomu, ma ndwom yi ndzi me dase ntsia Israelmba. 20Na sɛ minya dze hɔn du asaase a mekaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hɔn egyanom no a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do no do a wobedzidzi amee, na wɔayɛ abran. Ɔno nna afei wɔbɛdan akɔ enyame fofor nkyɛn, na wɔakɔsom hɔn, na woebu me enyimtsia, na wɔato m’ahyɛmu. 21Na ɔbɛba dɛ, aber a mbusu nye ɔfona pii aba hɔn do no, ndwom yi bɛyɛ dɛ ɔdasefo edzi dase wɔ hɔn enyim; osiandɛ ɔnnkɛpa hɔn asefo anomu: na minyim hɔn adwendwen a wɔrodwendwen no seseiara mpo, ansaana medze hɔn bodu asaase a mekaa ho ntam no do. 22Nna Moses kyerɛɛw ndwom yi da no ara, na ɔdze kyerɛkyerɛɛ Israelmba. 23Na ɔhyɛɛ Nun ne babanyin Josua mbra, na ɔsee dɛ, Hyɛ dzen na nya akokodur: na ɔwo na edze Israelmba bɔkɔ asaase a mekaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hɔn no do; na mibedzi w’ekyir.
Moses Dze Mbra No Hyɛ Levifo Nsa
24Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Moses wiee mbra yi mu nsɛm kyerɛw wɔ nwoma mu no, 25Moses hyɛɛ Levifo a wɔsoa EWURADZE n’ahyɛmudaka no, dɛ, 26Hom mfa mbra nwoma yi, na hom mfa nto EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn n’ahyɛmudaka no ho, ma ɔnko hɔ nyɛ dase ntsia hom. 27Na minyim hom etuatsew, nye hom asoɔdzen: hwɛ, meda ho ara menye hom tse ase ndɛ da yi mpo, na hom ayɛ etuatsewfo wɔ EWURADZE do yi; na afei mo wu ekyir ɛ? 28Hom mboaboa hom ebusuakuw ebusuakuw mu mpanyimfo nyinara, nye hom ahwɛdofo ano mbra me nkyɛn, ma menka nsɛm yi wɔ hɔn aso mu, na memfrɛ ɔsor nye asaase ma wondzi hɔn dase. 29Na minyim dɛ mo wu ekyir no ɔsɛɛ na hom bɛsɛɛ homho, na hom adan efi ɔkwan a mahyɛ hom no do; na mbusu bɛba hom do nda a odzi ekyir no mu; osiandɛ hom bɛyɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do, dze nam hom nsaano edwuma do eyi no ebufuw.
30Na Moses kaa ndwom yi mu nsɛm wɔ Israel bagua no nyinara asomu dze kodur dɛ owiei.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 32
Content:
Moses No Ndwom
1Ɔsor, hom nyɛ aso, na merebɛkasa;
Na wɔmma asaase ntsie m’anomu nsɛm:
2Me nkyerɛkyerɛ bɔsosɔ dɛ nyankom,
Me kasaa bogugu dɛ ɔbɔsu;
Dɛ nkyɛkyɛr do nsumpetsema,
Nye haban do nsutɔree:
3Na mobɔbɔ EWURADZE dzin akyerɛ:
Hom mfa kɛseyɛ mma hɛn Nyankopɔn,
4Ɔbotan no, n’edwuma dzi mu;
Na n’akwan nyinara yɛ atsɛmbu:
Nyankopɔn nokwardzifo a, na onnyi emumuyɛ,
Ɔyɛ pɛrpɛr na ɔtsen.
5Woedzi no asɛmbɔn, wɔnnyɛ ne mba, hɔn dzɛmdzi a;
Ebusuasantsen kɔntɔnkye a wɔakyea a.
6Ana EWURADZE na hom nye no dzi no dɛm yi,
Ɔman nkwasea a wɔnnyɛ enyansafo?
Ana nnyɛ ɔno nye w’egya a ɔawo wo bi a?
Ɔno na ɔayɛ wo na oetsintsim wo.
7Kaa tsetsentserdee nda no,
Dwen ebusuasantsen pii no hɔn mfe ho:
Bisa w’egya, na ɔnkyerɛ wo;
Wo mpanyimfo, na wɔnka nkyerɛ wo.
8Aber a Ɔsorsornyi no memaa amanaman hɔn egyapadze no,
Aber a ɔpaapaa nyimpa mba mu no,
Osisii aman hɔn ahe
Dɛ mbrɛ Israelmba hɔn dodow tse.
9Na EWURADZE ne kyɛfa nye ne man;
Jakob nye n’egyapadze kyɛfa.
10Ohun no wɔ sar asaase do,
Na kwaa tuntum sar predede do nkekabowa mu;
Otwaa no ho hyiae, ɔhwɛɛ no do yie,
Ɔkoraa no do dɛ n’enyiwa kyesua:
11Dɛ mbrɛ ɔkɔr huenyan ne birebuw,
Na otu bɔ ne ba do faafaa no,
Ɔtserɛɛw ne ntsaban mu faa hɔn no,
Ɔsoaa hɔn wɔ ne ntɛkyerɛ do:
12EWURADZE nkotoo na ogyaa no
Na onyame fofor bi annka no ho,
13Ɔmaa ɔfaa asaase mbea sorɔnsorɔm do tutui kɔree,
Na odzii haban mu ndɔbaa;
Na ɔmaa ohwieew ewo fii ɔbotan mu,
Nye ngo fii ɔtwerɛbo botan mu;
14Anantwi numfonsungo, nye nguan numfonsu,
Nye nguambaa seradze,
Nye Basan nnyɛmbowa mu nguannyin, nye mpɔnkye,
Nye ewifua ntan mu seradze;
Na enoom esikyireamba mu bɔgya wenyin.
15Na Jesurun yɛɛ ɔbran, na ɔtoow ntsia:
Ayɛ bran, ayɛ kɛse, wo mu ayɛ dur:
Nna ɔpoow Nyankopɔn a ɔyɛɛ no no,
Na obuu no nkwagye botan no tootooba.
16Wɔdze enyame nanaben yii no nyinkun,
Wɔdze ekyiwadze yii no ebufuw.
17Wɔbɔɔ afɔr maa abosom a wɔnnyɛ Nyame,
Dze maa enyame a wonnyim hɔn,
Dze maa enyame fofor a wɔbaa nkyinkyirii,
Dza hom egyanom ennsuro hɔn no.
18Ɔbotan a ɔwoo wo no anndwen no ho,
Na wo werɛ efir Nyame a ɔkyeem wo no.
19Na EWURADZE hunii, na okyiir hɔn,
Wɔ ne mbabanyin nye ne mbabaa ho ehi ntsi.
20Na ɔsee dɛ, Mibeyi m’enyim esuma hɔn,
Mobɔhwɛ mbrɛ hɔn ewiei bɛyɛ:
Na wɔyɛ ebusuasantsen kɔntɔnkye,
Mba a hɔn mu nnyi gyedzi.
21Wɔdze dza ɔnnyɛ Onyame eyi me nyinkun:
Wɔdze hɔn egyangyandze eyi me ebufuw:
Na medze hɔn a wɔnnyɛ ɔman biara no mibeyi hɔn nyinkun;
Medze ɔman nkwasea bi mibeyi hɔn ebufuw.
22Na ogya adzɛw wɔ m’ebufuw mu,
Na ɔrehyew ekodu samanadze ase,
Na ɔremen asaase nye no ndɔbaa,
Na ɔato mbepɔw mfapem mu ogya.
23Mobɔboa mbusu ano megu hɔn do;
Mobɔhwer m’egyen menaba wɔ hɔn do:
24Ɔkɔm bɔfɔn hɔn, na ahohyehye yaayaw
Nye ɔsɛɛ wenwen bɛmen hɔn;
Na mobɔsoma mbowa se ma wɔaaba hɔn do,
Nye huntuma mu nweaweambowa bɔr.
25Abɔntsen do na nkrantsee bohwim,
Adankyir so nketsenketse a;
Ɔbɛsɛɛ aberantsɛ nye ɔbaabun nyina,
Enumfoanoba nye nyimpa a oefuw gon nyina.
26Mesee dɛ nkyɛ mobɔbɔ hɔn apetse ekyirekyir,
Nkyɛ mebɛma hɔn nkaa tun do etwa efi nyimpa mu:
27Sɛ nnyɛ ɔtamfo ehiyi na musuroi a,
Bɛyɛ na hɔn ayɛfo anntse m’akwan ase,
Bɛyɛ na wɔase dɛ, Hɛn nsa na akrɔn,
Na nnyɛ EWURADZE na ɔayɛ iyi nyinara.
28Na wɔyɛ aman a egyinatu abɔ hɔn,
Na ntseasee bi nnyi hɔn mu.
29Ao kɛtseankyɛ woeehu nyansa, na wɔaatse iyi ase,
Na nkyɛ wɔaadwen hɔn ewiei ekyir no ho!
30Ɔbaako bɛyɛ dɛn etsiw apem,
Na beenu aka mpemdu egu,
Gyedɛ hɔn Ɔbotan atɔn hɔn ana,
Na EWURADZE eyi hɔn ama ana?
31Na hɔn ɔbotan nntse dɛ hɛn Ɔbotan,
Na hɛn atamfo ankasa mpo nye atsɛmbuafo.
32Na hɔn wenyindua fi Sodom wenyindua mu,
Na ofi Gomora haban mu:
Hɔn esikyireamba yɛ bɔr esikyireamba,
Hɔn esiaw yɛ wenwen:
33Hɔn nsa yɛ sasabɔnsam bɔr,
Nye nhurutsia owubɔr dzendzen.
34Ana wɔnnkora iyi do wɔ me nkyɛn,
Wɔnnsɔw ano wɔ m’akoradze mu bi a?
35Awerdzi yɛ medze, akatua so,
Aber a hɔn anan bɛpatser:
Na hɔn mbusu da abɛn,
Na ndzɛmba a ɔwɔ dɛ ɔba hɔn do no bɛba ntsɛntsɛm.
36Na EWURADZE bobu ne man atsɛn,
Na oenu noho wɔ no nkowaa ntsi;
Aber a obohu dɛ hɔn ahoɔdzen asa,
Na ɔdehye anaa akowaa biara nnyi hɔ bio,
37Na ɔbɛse dɛ, Henfa na hɔn enyame no wɔ,
Ɔbotan a wɔdze hɔn werɛ hyɛɛ mu no;
38Hɔn a wodzi hɔn okum afɔr seradze,
Na wɔnom hɔn ɔnom afɔr nsa no a?
Ma wɔnsoɛr mbɔboa hom,
Ma wɔnyɛ hom ntwitwagye.
39Afei hom nhu dɛ emi, mara nye no,
Na onyame bi nnka mo ho:
Emi na muku, na mema nkwa;
Mipira, na mesa yarba:
Na obi nnyi hɔ a obotum agye efi me nsamu.
40Na mema me nsa do wɔ ɔsor,
Na mese dɛ, Dɛ metse ase daa yi,
41Sɛ mesew me nkrantsee nyinamnyinam no,
Na me nsa suo atsɛmbu mu a;
Mibedzi hɔn a wɔnye me dzi esi do wer,
Na metua hɔn a wɔtan me kaw.
42Mebɛma bɔgya abow m’egyen menaba,
Na me nkrantsee edzi nam;
Atɔfo nye ndɔmmumfo bɔgyaa,
Ofi ɔtamfo Edzikamfo tsir do.
43Amanaman, hom nye ne man ndzi dɛw:
Na obedzi no nkowaa bɔgyaa ho wer,
Na ɔdze awerdzi etua n’ayɛfo kaw,
Na ɔapata ama n’asaase ama ne man.
44Na Moses baa bɛkaa ndwom yi mu nsɛm nyinara wɔ ɔman no asomu, ɔno, nye Nun ne babanyin Josua. 45Na Moses wiee nsɛm yi nyinara ka kyerɛɛ Israel nyinara: 46na ɔsee hɔn dɛ, Hom mfa hom akoma nsi nsɛm a miridzi hom ho dase ndɛ da yi nyinara do; ɔno na hom mfa nhyɛ hom mba, dɛ wɔndwen do ndzi mbra yi mu nsɛm nyinara do. 47Na mma ɔnnyɛ asɛnhun mma hom; osiandɛ ɔyɛ hom nkwa, na asɛm yi do na hom nam bɛma hom nda awar wɔ asaase a hom rukotwa Jordan akɛfa no do.
Nyankopɔn Soma Moses Wɔ Nebo
48Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses da no ara dɛ, 49Kɔfow bepɔw Abarim yi, kɔ bepɔw Nebo a ɔwɔ Moab asaase do, wɔ Jeriko tsentsendo no; na hwɛ Keenan asaase a medze merema Israelmba dɛ enyadze no: 50na wu wɔ bepɔw no a erofow akɔ do no do, na kɛka wo nananom ho wɔ samanadze; dɛ mbrɛ wo nua Aaron wui wɔ bepɔw Horeb do, na ɔkɛkaa ne nananom ho no; 51osiandɛ hom foom me wɔ Israelmba mu wɔ Meriba nsu a ɔwɔ Kades, wɔ Zin sar do no ho; osiandɛ hom annyɛ me krɔnkrɔn wɔ Israelmba mu. 52Na ibohu asaase no wɔ w’enyim; na mbom eronnkɔ asaase a medze rema Israelmba no do hɔ.

Title: DEUTERONOMI 33
Content:
Moses Hyira Israel
1Na iyi nye nhyira a Onyame nyimpa Moses dze hyiraa Israelmba ansaana oruwu. 2Na ɔsee dɛ,
EWURADZE fi Sinai bae,
Na ɔsoɛree fi Seir maa hɔn;
Ɔhyerɛɛn fi bepɔw Paran do,
Na ofi akrɔnkrɔmfo mpedu mpedu mu bae:
Na n’enyimfa wɔ mbra a ɔyɛ ogya ma hɔn.
3Nyew, ɔdɔ aman;
N’ahotseweefo nyinara wɔ wo nsamu:
Na wɔtsenatsenaa famu wɔ w’anan ho;
Obiara bɛgye wo nsɛm ato mu.
4Moses hyɛɛ hɛn mbra,
Jakob bagua egyapadze.
5Na ɔyɛɛ ɔhen wɔ Jesurun,
Aber a ɔman no mu etsitsir hyiae,
Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara bɔ mu no.
6Ma Reuben nnya nkwa, na mma onnwu;
Na eso mma n’ase nnhyew.
7Na iyi nye Juda nhyira: na ɔsee dɛ,
EWURADZE, tsie Juda ne ndze,
Na fa no kɔ fie no nkorɔfo nkyɛn:
Ma ne nsa nso no so,
Na yɛ ɔboafo fa tsia n’ayɛfo.
8Na Levi ho dze ɔsee dɛ,
Wo Tummim nye wo Urim wɔ wo nyamesuronyi no hɔ,
Nyia esɔɔ no hwɛe wɔ Massa no,
Nye no hamee wɔ Meriba nsu ho no;
9Nyia ɔsee wɔ n’egya, nye ne na ho dɛ, Munnhun hɔn;
Nkyii so ɔammpen no nuanom do no,
Na woennhu nankasa ne mba so no:
Na wɔadwen w’asɛm do:
Na woedzi w’ahyɛmu do.
10Wɔdze w’atsɛmbu bɛkyerɛ Jakob,
Na wo mbra akyerɛ Israel:
Wɔdze eduhuam bɔto w’enyim,
Na ɔhyew afɔr mu ato w’afɔrmbukyia do.
